text:
❤ Hey all music enthusiasts and geeks from Product Hunt!
😃 I am super excited to launch oMoo - the music player with Haptic.


Music has been my passion since childhood, thanks to my granny who introduced me to it. Now, as a piano and guitar player, I love performing, but granny's worsening hearing loss made it hard for her to hear my music.

I've explored advanced technologies to restore granny's hearing, but none were effective. She smiled as I played, but she could no longer hear the melodies.

🎵 Inspired by Apple's Haptic Engine, I build oMoo - a totally new music player, to offer a new way to experience music through hand, not just ear.
🧏 I believe oMoo will bring the power and beauty of music to everyone, including people who are deaf or hard of hearing like my granny.

🎁 Join us in the comments, we'd love to hear from you!

text:
Hello Product Hunters 👋,

I’m Aritra, creator of Supaboard. As a lifelong Data Scientist, I’ve built 1000+ dashboards and faced endless frustrations—Supaboard is my solution.

Why Supaboard?

1. Pulling data, writing SQL, and wrestling with clunky tools is overkill for a simple chart.
2. Even with ChatGPT or Copilot, you’re stuck explaining context just to get a half-decent query—then you still have to build the chart.
3. Most LLMs lack context, spitting out generic, useless insights.

So we built a BI tool that’s:

→ Simple: Just 3 buttons—Data View, AI Conversations, Dashboards.
→ Powerful: Handles complex questions effortlessly.
→ Smart: Fine-tuned AI analysts understand industry terms and deliver spot-on answers.
It automates everything—data connection to full dashboards—in minutes, not days.

What makes Supaboard special?

→ 18+ industry/job-specific AI analysts (more on the way) with deep domain expertise.
→ Embedded AI chat in dashboards, so end users can dig into data without back-and-forth.
→ We don't expose all your data to the LLMs, keeping it private and secure
→ Works anywhere—phone, laptop, you name it.
→ Supports NoSQL like MongoDB too.

Here what our customers are saying:

"Supaboard is a fantastic product! Easy to set-up, supports several sources and enables AI for easy analytics, it’s a great alternative to traditional building dashboards as it provides dashboards with several efficient AI agents.
We’ve used it in multiple projects and it consistently delivers in terms of quality and performance. Highly recommend it for anyone looking easy BI and analytics to your business." - Pratik Nayek, Global Marketing Head, PrimeNumbers

Give it a spin—we’re offering 90% off all plans for the first month! I’d love your feedback.

Cheers,

meta.parent_description: Supaboard is a next-gen BI tool that helps you build powerful dashboards from your data securely without any expertise. Unify data from multiple sources with almost no setup and get precise answers from industry-trained AI analysts even with minimal prompts.

According to Aritra, existing tools and large language models like ChatGPT or Copilot are insufficient, as they require extensive context explanation and still fall short in delivering meaningful insights. In contrast, Supaboard AI is designed to be simple, powerful, and smart, with a user-friendly interface featuring just three buttons, and fine-tuned AI analysts that understand industry terms and provide accurate answers. The tool automates the entire process, from data connection to dashboard creation, in a matter of minutes, and boasts features such as embedded AI chat, industry-specific AI analysts, and secure data handling. The creator's enthusiasm for Supaboard AI is echoed by customers, such as Pratik Nayek, who praises the product for its ease of setup, support for multiple data sources, and efficient AI agents, making it a great alternative to traditional dashboard building methods. Overall, Supaboard AI aims to revolutionize the field of business intelligence by providing a secure, easy-to-use, and powerful tool for building dashboards and gaining insights from data, and the creator is eager to receive feedback and offer a discounted introduction to the product.

Hey PH fam! 👋


Super excited to introduce Supaboard to the global Product Hunt community today! 🚀


Let me be real — most data analytics tools are either too complex for everyday users or too basic for meaningful insights. But Supaboard brilliantly bridges this gap.


What makes Supaboard special:


→ Just connect your data and ask questions in plain English — no SQL or coding needed

→ 18+ specialized AI analysts that actually understand your industry's terminology and needs

→ From raw data to beautiful dashboards in minutes, not days or weeks

→ Works across devices (mobile-friendly!) and supports both SQL and NoSQL databases

→ Chat directly with your dashboards for deeper insights on the fly


I've watched the founder @aritra_ghosh6 obsess over this product for months. He built over 1000 dashboards himself so has a great track record and his team doesn't just understand data science - they understand the PAIN of waiting for insights when decisions need to be made NOW. This founder-market fit is obvious when you see the product in action.


For anyone tired of wrestling with clunky analytics tools or waiting days for your data team to build reports — this is your moment! ⚡


Check it out and feel free to drop any questions below. The entire Supaboard team is here today and eager to hear your feedback! 👇


P.S. They're offering 90% off all plans for PH users this month, so definitely worth giving it a spin!

text:
Hey Product Hunt Fam! 👋

AI tools are everywhere—AI for content, AI for outreach, AI for lead gen, AI for AI… (Seriously, where does it end? 🤦‍♂️)

But here’s the thing: AI alone doesn’t deliver outcomes. It drafts, generates, and automates—but when it comes to actually getting stuff done? That’s still on us humans.

We pivoted Waxwing into a Human+AI marketplace because our early users told us exactly what was missing: accountability and real, finished work. So we built Waxwing 2.0 — the only marketplace where real experts take AI to the last mile.

What does that mean for you?

• AI-Generated Previews → See exactly what AI can do before you hire an expert. No surprises, no guesswork.
• 500+ AI-Powered Workflows → Crafted by true pros, fine-tuned for execution (not just outputs).
• DIY or Hire an Expert → Use our workflows yourself or bring in a pro to refine and execute.
• Context-Aware AI Copilot → It learns your brand, your tasks, and your goals—offering actually helpful suggestions.
• Centralized Knowledge Base → No more repeating the same brand details to every freelancer; Waxwing already knows your brand inside out.
• Multi-Agent, Multi-Expert Orchestration → Execute high-value, complex projects with a mix of AI agents and human experts working in sync.

We are going head-to-head with @agent.ai (by @dharmesh )

They are betting big on AI agents just like us. But here’s what we’ve learned: agents without humans still fall short. They hallucinate, miss context, and don’t deliver ownership or final outcomes.

We believe Human+AI > Just AI — and we’re doubling down on that.

Here’s why Waxwing is better:

  • More than agents: We offer outcomes. You don’t just get a chatbot—you get a result.

  • Real experts in the loop. When AI hits its limits, humans take over. Seamlessly.

  • Execution, not just automation. Work gets done—not just started.

  • Brand-aware workflows. No cold starts, no repetitive onboarding. We retain brand context across projects.

Why does this matter? Because businesses don’t need more AI tools—they need results. AI alone won’t take responsibility, make judgment calls, or avoid the dreaded hallucinations. That’s where humans step in.

With Waxwing, AI does what it does best (speed, drafts, automation) and experts do what they do best (creativity, strategy, accountability). The result? Real, tangible outcomes.

Let’s make AI human again. Let’s make AI great again.

Try it here: https://app.waxwing.ai/sign-up

Would love to hear your thoughts, feedback, and what you want from an AI-powered service marketplace. Let’s build the future together!

P.S. Huge shoutout to @rohanrecommends for hunting us, @gabe for the amazing feedback and @rajiv_ayyangar for building this amazing community! 🚀

text:
The use of AI in schools is both controversial and inevitable. According to my 15 year old, everyone in high school is "cheating with ChatGPT". Their English teacher has resorted to requiring students to write reports only in class and in long-hand, even though phones aren't banned (which creates an obvious loophole).


It's smart for Anthropic to drive a conversation around AI use in academia provide products to equip students and educators alike.


To that end, they've announced Claude for Education, including:

  1. Learning mode: A new Claude experience that guides students' reasoning process rather than providing answers, helping develop critical thinking skills

  2. University-wide Claude availability: Full campus access agreements with Northeastern University, London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE), and Champlain College, making Claude available to all students

  3. Academic partnerships: Joining Internet2 and working with Instructure to embed AI into teaching & learning with Canvas LMS

  4. Student programs: A new Claude Campus Ambassadors program along with an initiative offering API credits for student projects

meta.parent_description: Claude for Education revolutionizes learning with AI to guide critical thinking. Partnering with top universities, we're introducing Learning Mode, campus-wide access, and student programs that empower educators and learners to shape AI's future in academia.

standardized: The introduction of Claude for Education is a timely and strategic move, as the use of AI in schools is becoming increasingly prevalent, with many students already leveraging tools like ChatGPT to complete assignments, prompting some educators to implement measures such as in-class, handwritten reports to mitigate potential cheating. However, rather than simply trying to circumvent AI use, Anthropic is taking a proactive approach by developing products that can equip students and educators to effectively utilize AI in academia, which is a forward-thinking and commendable strategy. The features of Claude for Education, such as Learning Mode, which guides students' reasoning process to develop critical thinking skills, demonstrate a clear understanding of the need to harness AI in a way that supports academic integrity and fosters meaningful learning experiences. Furthermore, the partnerships with top universities and the introduction of student programs, including the Claude Campus Ambassadors initiative and API credits for student projects, underscore Anthropic's commitment to empowering educators and learners to shape the future of AI in academia, which is likely to resonate with educators and students alike, and position Claude for Education as a leader in the ed-tech space. Overall, the sentiment around Claude for Education is one of cautious optimism, recognizing both the potential benefits and challenges of integrating AI into education, and acknowledging the need for thoughtful and intentional approaches to ensure that AI is used in ways that support, rather than undermine, academic excellence.

text:
Hey Product Hunters! 👋


I'm Eric, founder of Genspark. Nine months ago, we launched our first beta right here on Product Hunt. Today, we're excited to introduce the Genspark Super Agent — a fast, reliable AI assistant that helps with your everyday tasks.


Our all-in-one Super Agent automatically uses multiple tools to handle whatever you throw at it:


✅ Writing, quick searches, and in-depth research
✅ Travel planning, financial insights, and product comparisons
✅ Image & video search and generation
✅ Creating slides, building websites, making calls, browsing, and more


Don't just take my word for it — check out these real examples you can jump into and continue:


• Plan a San Diego trip & use AI Call for Me to make reservations
• Make restaurant reservations with AI Call for Me
• Create a minute-long South Park episode about recent news
• Build a step-by-step Instagram Reel for a cod fish recipe


I know you've seen tons of AI agents lately, but Genspark is different. It's: • Faster (on par with regular search/chat) • More reliable (way fewer errors and hallucinations) • More steerable (easily guide and refine results)


We're not building just another demo. We've created a genuinely useful tool that will save you time right now.


Give it a try and let me know what you think: genspark.ai🚀

text:
We’ve been quietly building for a while now and today I'm very excited to share what we’ve been working on.

While many tools help devs write code faster, they often introduce churn, duplication, and bugs. The real challenge isn’t typing speed, it’s writing high-quality infra-aware code that fits your stack and scales with your team. That’s what we’ve built at AutonomyAI.

🧠 Our first product, The Magician, turns Figma designs into clean, production-ready React code by deeply understanding your codebase—its components, structure, and conventions.


To make that possible, we didn’t start with generation. We started with understanding.


We built ACE, our Agentic Context Engine, the secret sauce that enables agents to operate like a senior engineer who knows your codebase better than anyone. ACE is powered by our TripleR approach:
✅ Retrieval: Finding and extracting only the most relevant parts of the codebase, documentation, and dependencies. 
✅ Representation: Cleaning up and transforming retrieved data, ensuring AI processes only what matters in a way it can take action. 
✅ Repetition: Maintaining consistency across interactions, so even with LLM’s nondeterministic nature, our agents create reliable production-grade code.


With ACE, the Magician can reuse local components, respect your design system, adapt to your code style, and generate React that’s actually built for your stack.


This isn’t just a fancy wrapper. It’s a new foundation for how dev teams build—with agents that plug into your infra, use your tools, and act like real teammates.


Would love your thoughts, feedback, and support.


Built with love (and way too many late nights) by our amazing team—and alongside my co-founders @arik_faingold and @adir_ben_yehuda 💙

By developing the Agentic Context Engine, or ACE, which utilizes a TripleR approach of retrieval, representation, and repetition, the company has created a powerful tool that enables agents to operate with a deep understanding of a codebase, much like a senior engineer, and this is seen as a major differentiator for their product. The founder is eager to receive feedback and support, and their passion for the product and its potential to revolutionize the way development teams build software is evident, as they see AutonomyAI as a new foundation for software development that allows agents to plug into a team's infrastructure and work alongside them like real teammates. Overall, the tone is one of pride and anticipation, as the founder is confident that AutonomyAI has the potential to make a significant impact on the software development industry by freeing teams from repetitive tasks and allowing them to focus on creating exceptional products.

text:
Hello Product Hunt!

We’re thrilled to finally step out of stealth and introduce AutonomyAI and announcing our funding round! $4M

Unlike other dev tools, our agents are powered by our proprietary Agentic Contextual Engine (ACE), a breakthrough system that allows them to truly understand your codebase, its structure, and its style.

That means no more AI-generated spaghetti code. Just real, readable, consistent output that feels like your team wrote it.

👀 What’s in our first drop?

1. The Magician 🪄

Figma to code, in seconds. Clean, component-based, and production-ready.

2. The Visualizer 📊

Auto-generates crystal-clear visual explanations of any code for devs, PMs, or anyone who needs to get it fast.

This isn’t just another dev tool. It’s a new way to work with AI that actually works with you, no slowdowns, no translations, just instant understanding.

And it’s not just hype, over 40 companies are already using AutonomyAI, and they’re seeing incredible results across productivity, clarity, and dev velocity.

👉 Curious? Visit our site to book a demo and see AutonomyAI in action.

Drop any questions below, we’d love to hear from you!

text:
Hey Product Hunters!

I'm Daniel, co-founder of TwinMind. Last year, you made our Chrome extension a #2 Product of the Day—thank you!  We heard your biggest request: “We love TwinMind but how can it capture real-life moments away from my desk?”

Most important conversations happen in-person—coffee chats, lectures, meetings, and conferences—but over 90% of these memories are lost forever. Until now.

Today, we’re launching the TwinMind app for iPhones which can transcribe every word, even from inside your pocket:

🎙️ Transcribe in 100+ languages and ask AI anything about ALL your past conversations at once (no more information scattered across awkward meeting bots and voice recordings).

🎉 Free unlimited transcripts and AI chats: Every other AI note-taking app asks you to pay after a few hours, but we have no caps even on our free plan! You get access to standard LLMs and offline transcription forever.

🔐 Complete privacy: You audio is never stored anywhere. Use local speech model for fully on-device transcription. Choose Private Mode (no cloud backups) for your confidential conversations.


💡 Proactive talking points based on live context (e.g., “Predict what I want to know now”, “Fact-check what they just said”, “What should I say next to sound smart?”).

📅 Connects with your Calendars to get attendees, agendas, and key details right (never fumble a follow-up email).


💻 Syncs with TwinMind Desktop Chrome extension, so you can seamlessly sync memories across devices.


📱 No new hardware! Our AI models are optimized to run for 12+ hours without draining your phone's battery.


🧠 Train your personalized AI Twin that learns your style and acts like you. The more memories you collect, the smarter it gets.


🎁 Exclusive PH Launch Deal:

  • Free Forever: Unlimited transcription hours and chat with standard AI models on our free plan.  

  • 30-Days of Advanced Features: Automatic routing to the best LLMs for each task (ChatGPT, Grok, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini) + Web Search with sources (via Perplexity) + Multi-Step Reasoning.


Our 2,000+ early users helped shape this—huge thanks to them and to YOU for joining us on this journey! Try it out and tell us how we can make it even better.  


- Daniel & the TwinMind Team

Hello hunters! For those of you who are new to Langflow, we are building the easiest way for developers to build and ship AI-powered agents to production. And I'm excited to announce a huge milestone in this journey: Langflow Desktop!

Why did we build this? We wanted to streamline the process for getting folks up-and-running. No need to install Python, download dependencies or configure your environment. Just install Langflow Desktop and start building.

We're launching Langflow Desktop Alpha today for MacOS. Please download it and take it for a spin! We can't wait to hear what you think of it, please feel free to comment and the team and I will respond.

👋 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m the solo maker behind Neuron AI — launched it just 24 hours ago and already blown away by the early response (people are using the app and pay money for it)!

Neuron AI is a 100% on-device AI assistant — meaning it runs entirely locally on your phone. No internet required. No data leaves your device. Ever.

You can:
	•	Transcribe & summarize audio instantly (e.g. meetings, lectures)
	•	Chat with your preferred LLM privately
	•	Use it offline — even in airplane mode!
	•	And much more 

I built this because I wanted an AI tool that’s fast, private, and doesn’t siphon my data to the cloud. Hope you find it as useful as I do.

Would love your thoughts, feedback, and questions — happy to share more on the tech behind it too!

Hey PH! I've been creating and sharing prompts and realised a lot of the time you want to include some input from the person creating the prompt. Sure, you could just tell them to read the prompt and fill our the bits they need, but we all know nobody reads on the internet! 

So, I created this simple free tool which lets you drop in a prompt and set up what info people need to add. You can set the type of each field so you can ask for numbers, long/short text or even a selection from a dropdown.

Anyone you share the link with can then easily enter the required data and get their own version of the prompt to copy and paste. Meaning more consistent results and hopefully fewer questions on what they need to do!

text:
As a multilingual speaker as well as a constant language learner, I've noticed how Google Translate etc. often just translate idioms/figures of speech/slang etc.  literally into another language, losing the original meaning.  Or sometimes, they'd just translate the idiom into something equivalent in the target language. Thus losing the color of the original phrasing.  This is terrible for language learners.

Seeing this actually inspired me to build something specifically to help with that problem: BestFuckingTranslator.com. The goal is to provide translations that capture the meaning and nuance of idiomatic expressions, in addition to the literal words. Both of those things are important for language learners. 
 

Here an of example of how it handles things differently:

English to Spanish:

Phrase: "You need to bite the bullet and tell him."

Google Translate: "Tienes que agarrar la bala y decirle." (Doesn't make sense in Spanish)

BestFingTranslator: "Tienes que morder la bala y decírselo. (Necesitas enfrentarte a la situación y hablar con él.)"

Source text can be in basically any language in the world. The AI does a good job of detecting it. For target language, currently 60+ languages are supported. If you find your language missing, please let me know, I'll add it.

meta.parent_description: Traditional Translators like Google Translate and DeepL are too literal and constrained. We've made a translator that not only translates, it explains. You need to check it out. Supports most major languages of the world.

standardized: The founder of Best F*ing Translator has highlighted a significant pain point in existing translation tools, such as Google Translate, which often fail to capture the nuances and idiomatic expressions of languages, resulting in literal translations that lose the original meaning and context. This limitation is particularly frustrating for language learners, who require a deeper understanding of the language to effectively communicate. In response, the founder has developed Best F*ing Translator, which aims to provide more accurate and nuanced translations that convey both the literal meaning and the intended context of idiomatic expressions. The tool's ability to detect the source language and support over 60 target languages demonstrates its potential to cater to a diverse range of users, including global nomads and language enthusiasts. By providing examples of how the tool outperforms traditional translators, the founder showcases the value proposition of Best F*ing Translator, which is to offer a more comprehensive and culturally sensitive translation experience that goes beyond mere literal translation. Overall, the founder's comment suggests that Best F*ing Translator has the potential to fill a significant gap in the market by providing a more sophisticated and user-friendly translation tool that meets the needs of language learners and global communicators.

text:
Hi, I'm Subhash, the founder of NilgAI Travel!

We're thrilled to debut on Product Hunt and can't wait to hear your thoughts and feedback.

NilgAI Travel bridges the gap between travel inspiration and action by connecting what inspires you on social media and trusted recommendations with a seamless platform for planning and booking your trips. From discovering hidden gems to creating personalised itineraries, we make your travel experience effortless, enjoyable, and uniquely tailored to your preferences—all in one place.

How It Works:

1. Log in & add up to 5 destinations for your trip.
2. Select your budget to guide the planning process.
3. Choose flights, stays, rentals, and experiences (or skip any part you don’t need).
4. Make your booking seamlessly—your booking process continues with our trusted partners in this version 1.0.
5. Save your itinerary (visible only to you) or Publish it (make it visible for others to use).
6. Share it with friends and family so they can reuse your itinerary.


Here’s what sets NilgAI apart:

✨ Inspire, Discover, Plan, Book, and Share all in one place.
✨ Personalised journeys based on your budget.
✨ One-click updates for availability and prices.
✨ Reusable itineraries shared by others for inspiration.


Currently, our launch focuses on cities with airports only, but we’re expanding to include other cities and destinations in a phased manner.


As a bootstrapped startup, we’re committed to building NilgAI with the community’s feedback and support.

🙏 Your feedback is invaluable!


As we continue growing NilgAI, we’re excited about the possibilities ahead—including scaling faster with the right support. If you’re interested in being part of this journey, feel free to reach out!


Thank you for your support—happy exploring with NilgAI!

text:
Hello Product Hunt!


I'm Dave, founder of Zatomic AI. If you're involved in writing prompts for your AI apps and services, you know all too well how time-consuming it is to get your prompts to produce consistent, reliable results. It can take hours to work out all the little kinks, relying on a good amount of trial-and-error to get the results you need.


Zatomic helps you create great prompts in minutes, not hours. Our prompting toolset takes the guesswork out of prompt engineering:

  • Prompt generation: Auto-generate high-performing prompts specific to your use case in seconds.

  • Prompt scoring: Automated prompt scores from 0 - 100 based on a set of pre-defined criteria.

  • Scoring criteria: Auto-generate custom scoring criteria targeted for your use case.

  • Balance analysis: Check the structure of your prompts to reduce the likelihood of irrelevant or verbose responses.

  • Heatmaps: A visual representation of the attention that the AI model paid to the phrases in your prompts.

🎞️ Check out the short Loom video above to see our tools in action.


All of our prompting tools have been tested with over 90 models from 12 different AI providers so that you can use them with the models you care about. Securely connect to your existing AI provider and you're good to go.


Also included in Zatomic is a user-friendly prompt management system, complete with versioning and workspaces for easy organization.


And for you devs out there, we have a very robust API with everything exposed, allowing you to easily integrate our tools into your existing workflows.


It's completely free to get started, and by free we mean free forever. No trial end date, no credit card required, but it does have some limits.


However, if you need more, we're giving the first 100 paid customers 80% off for their entire first year! Seriously. Just use promo code PHLAUNCH80 on the billing checkout page.


Thanks for checking us out, let us know if you have any feedback or questions!

meta.parent_description: Zatomic enables anyone to craft great prompts in minutes instead of hours. Easy-to-use prompting tools such as auto-generation, prompt scoring, balance analysis, and heatmaps, Zatomic takes the guesswork and trial-and-error out of prompt engineering.

The fact that these tools have been tested with over 90 models from 12 different AI providers suggests a high level of compatibility and versatility, making it an attractive solution for developers who work with various AI models. The user-friendly prompt management system, robust API, and free-forever plan with optional paid upgrades also indicate a strong focus on user experience and accessibility. Overall, Zatomic AI seems to be well-positioned to address a significant need in the developer community, and the founder's enthusiasm and willingness to engage with feedback and questions suggest a commitment to continuous improvement and customer satisfaction.

text:
Hey hunters! We're excited to share this open source LLM Performance Tracker with the Product Hunt community! If you're building AI apps or features, you can use this to monitor your LLM calls for cost, usage, and performance issues.

The project includes a Tinybird backend to store and process LLM call events, and a Next app frontend to visualize critical LLM metrics such as cost by model, TTFT, total requests/tokens used, etc. All of the visualizations can be filtered and drilled down by a bunch of different dimensions.

We designed this to be used as is: you can deploy it to Vercel/Tinybird for free and instrument your app to start sending LLM calls (you can find examples for LiteLLM and Vercel AI SDK in the repo).

The app also includes a template for adding multi-tenancy via Clerk. This can be useful if you'd like to modify the components and integrate them into your app to give your users visibility over their LLM usage in your application.

We'd love to hear your feedback and how you might use/extend this. Of course, it's open source, and PRs are welcome!

If you have any questions, the Tinybird Slack community has answers :)

meta.parent_description: The LLM Performance Tracker is an open source Next + Tinybird app template built by the engineers at Tinybird to capture LLM call traces and analyze them in real-time.

The inclusion of a template for multi-tenancy and integration with popular services like Clerk and Vercel AI SDK further underscores the team's commitment to making the tracker a versatile and adaptable tool for the developer community. Overall, the sentiment is one of generosity, collaboration, and a genuine interest in helping developers build more efficient and effective AI-powered applications.

text:
Hi Product Hunters,

I’m Akad, an indie developer from Sydney, and I built Cue AI for people like me, who want better habits but feel overwhelmed by all the rigid, overcomplicated routine apps out there.

Cue AI is your personal assistant for habits, reminders, and routines - but way smarter!
Just tell it what you want (like “drink more water” or “get to work on time!”) and it’ll generate a mini app tailored to your life.

It recently got a huge upgrade that’s not even in the launch video yet:
🧠 Smart Suggestions – Cue now learns from how and when you complete tasks and starts suggesting helpful reminders and routines before you even ask. This turned out to be a game changer.

Some things I learned while building it:

- Habit stacking is 🔥 for consistency
- Context-aware reminders 2x task completion
- Personalized routines beat generic ones
- Real-time adaptability = longer-lasting habits
- Most of us don’t need more features—we need less friction

I’d love your feedback, this is my first big launch and every upvote, comment, and honest review helps me grow.

Thanks for checking it out! 🙏
(P.S. The free version gives you full access! only upgrade if it genuinely makes your life easier.)

text:
Vallo is a no-code platform that helps you automate your internal workflows and go beyond what Excel can offer. Things like:

- Merge files and clean up data
- Perform complex sorting, grouping, and VLOOKUPs
- Generate new charts and visualizations
- Extract structured data from PDFs

All can be done in a few minutes in 4 steps:
1. Upload your Excel, CSV, or PDF files to the Input nodes. 
2. Use the built-in AI to create tasks that get executed in the Task nodes. 
3. The Output node displays the results.
4. You can chain multiple nodes to create sophisticated, multi-step workflows.

Once you build a workflow, you can reuse it. In just a few minutes, accomplish work that typically would require the help of a business analyst!

Looking forward to your feedback!

text:
Hey ProductHunt community! 👋

I'm thrilled to introduce KitchenAI. The idea was born from my own frustrations as an AI engineer trying to manage prompt development across multiple projects.

I found myself constantly switching between text editors, Jupyter notebooks, and various testing scripts - with no consistent way to track versions, measure performance, or seamlessly deploy to production. My team was also struggling with knowledge sharing and standardization.

After talking with dozens of AI developers, I realized this wasn't just my problem - the entire industry is lacking proper tooling for prompt engineering, despite it becoming a crucial skill.

That's why we built KitchenAI as a complete studio that brings together experimentation, testing, metrics, and deployment in one sleek developer experience.

I'd love to hear from other AI developers and product teams:
- What's your current workflow for prompt engineering?
- Which part of the process causes the most headaches?
- What features would make your prompt development process 10x better?

Join our waitlist to get early access and help shape the future of professional prompt engineering!

meta.parent_description: KitchenAI is a prompt engineering platform designed to create, test, optimize, and deploy AI prompts at scale. It's a complete workbench that brings together experimentation, prompt versioning, testing, metrics, and deployment into a unified workflow.

This frustration stemmed from the tedious process of switching between various text editors, Jupyter notebooks, and testing scripts, with no consistent method for tracking versions, measuring performance, or deploying to production. The founder's conversations with numerous AI developers revealed that this issue is widespread in the industry, highlighting a significant need for proper tooling in prompt engineering. As a result, KitchenAI was developed as a complete studio that streamlines experimentation, testing, metrics, and deployment into a single, user-friendly experience. text:
Hey Product Hunt!


I’m the Co-Founder of Front Street, and our team has been deep in thought about this one thing: as consumers, we should have access to and be able to fully use all the data surrounding what we buy. Right now, that information is trapped in silos within each brand or retailer.


You know how you can export your Amazon purchases into a huge, intimidating Excel sheet? Well, we want to take that concept and apply it across every brand and retailer but provide our users valuable insights and personalized recommendations based on their entire purchase history. Imagine being able to ask anything about your purchases — like “What size shoes does my kid wear?” to “How often do I fill up my gas tank, and which station offers the cheapest prices?” or “Where’s the best deal on a 12-pack of Heineken within a 1-mile radius?” This is just the beginning, and we’re thrilled to share this idea with you.


Thanks for your time. We hope you’ll connect with our mission, sign up for our launch, and join us in taking control of your data to use it to your advantage!

text:
Hi everyone!

PaddlePaddle 3.0 is officially released – a major update to Baidu's open-source deep learning framework, rebuilt for the era of large models. 

This version focuses on efficiency with breakthroughs in automatic parallelism (simplifying distributed training), a neural network compiler (CINN) for faster computation, and enhanced scientific computing via higher-order auto differentiation. 

It maintains an integrated training/inference setup and adds broad multi-chip support, aiming for a "write once, deploy anywhere" experience across diverse hardware. 

It continues to be fully open source under the Apache 2.0 license.

text:
Hey Product Hunt 👋

I'm one of the makers of APEX API — a tool we built after realizing how difficult it is to evaluate visual AI models in the messy, unpredictable environments they’re meant to operate in.


🎯 What it does:
APEX is an API that helps you automatically red team your object detection models. You define the operational context (e.g. lighting conditions, object angles, occlusions), and we generate data and simulate those conditions to probe for weaknesses and failure modes — all via API.


🧠 Why we built it:
Visual AI is being deployed in high-stakes scenarios, but most testing still happens in overly controlled, idealized environments. We wanted a better way to uncover how models behave in context, before they fail in the wild.


💡 Who it’s for:
We’ve seen early interest from teams working across a variety of use cases, such as:

  • Defense: Evaluating aerial object detection systems for spotting vehicles in mountainous terrain — across varying times of day, weather conditions, and camera angles.

  • Autonomous systems: Stress-testing warehouse robot vision with low-light environments, cluttered shelves, shiny surfaces, and moving obstacles.

  • AgTech: Testing fruit detection and ripeness classification under inconsistent lighting, natural occlusions (branches, leaves), and different growth stages.

If you’ve ever asked “but will this model actually work in the real world?” — APEX is for you.


🔓 Today we’re opening API access for object detection models.
No waitlist. Just sign up, integrate, and start testing.
→ https://github.com/YRIKKA/apex-quickstart

We’re excited to hear what you think! Feedback, questions, use cases — drop them below 👇

meta.parent_description: Stress-test your object detection models in your desired contexts (e.g., lighting conditions, object view, weather conditions) - for free! Sign up at https://www.yrikka.com/api

standardized: The creators of YRIKKA APEX API are enthusiastic about their tool, which they designed to address a significant pain point in the development of visual AI models, specifically the challenge of evaluating their performance in real-world, unpredictable environments. They express a strong motivation to provide a solution that helps developers and teams test their object detection models in context, rather than in idealized settings, to uncover potential weaknesses and failure modes before they are deployed. The tone suggests a sense of excitement and eagerness to share their product with the community, as they open up API access for object detection models and invite feedback and questions. Overall, the sentiment is positive and solution-focused, indicating a strong confidence in the value proposition of YRIKKA APEX API in helping teams ensure the reliability and effectiveness of their visual AI models in high-stakes scenarios.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

Super excited to share QuickPoll with you all — a tool I built out of pure frustration with how tedious scheduling events can be. You know the drill: someone suggests a date, three people are unavailable, someone forgot the timezone, another replies late, and suddenly… the event never happens.

QuickPoll solves that in seconds.

You just describe your event in plain English/French/Spanish — like “Team meeting next week, Monday at 10am or Wednesday at 2pm” — and the AI does the heavy lifting:
→ It extracts the possible dates and times
→ Creates a clean, shareable poll
→ No signup required for you or participants
→ You get email notifications when people vote
→ And yes, you can add a password if you want to keep it private

Why does it matter?
Because the alternatives (like Doodle or When2Meet) still require a lot of clicking, form filling, and account creation. QuickPoll strips all that away. It’s fast, intuitive, and focused on doing one thing really well: helping people agree on a date, fast.

It’s completely free, and you don’t need to create an account to use it.

I’d love your feedback, ideas, and maybe even a little upvote if you think QuickPoll can help others like it helped me. 🙌

Thanks for checking it out!

text:
👋 Hey Hunters! I'm Zach, and here's my story…

About a year ago I started building custom AI chatbots for businesses—everyone from authors to e-commerce stores, insurance brokers, hospitality teams, even observatories were interested. But I kept running into the same problem:
Manually gathering data, embedding it, setting up RAG pipelines, and writing prompt logic over and adjusting it until they clients where happy was very tedious. The clients and I would meet for a hour or so, then I would code the prompts, then we would iterate on this process until they were happy. I thought there had to be a better way so we could do the part both I and the business owners enjoyed doing during our meeting which was training the assistants.

Eventually, I thought:
“What if business owners could just train and customize their own ai chatbot—without needing me to code it for them every time? Or what if we could manage it for them so we can quickly train them together in our meetings so they can have them deployed to their customers faster? (also less work for me lol)”

That sparked everything.
The first problem was what was the best way to input the business information that was the least amount of work. For the majority of clients uploading documents and using RAG was easy enough. But then other business owners didn't want to do that much work and requested an easier way. I checked out other solutions that used a UI you can drag & drop lines to different knowledge bases but I knew business owners would loose focus quickly. The second option was let them just add their url and the app would gather business information for them. This seemed to be the fastest way for them to create an ai chatbot and it was the most requested feedback, so I began creating an ai agent that would go out, scrape the data, return it. But this led to a problem where there was too much unnecessary data being scraped (as well as huge context windows for the LLMs) so I had to create another agent that could continuously look at the data coming in, organize it, and them re-organize it at the end to an official knowledge source that was useable by the businesses customer service chatbots.

So after iterating on the feedback now it's pretty much an ai studio that's a dashboard for designing and training customer service agents. It's general purpose since I currently using the app to solve my own problem by managing clients in various industries chatbots, but feel free to use it for your use case.

That’s how SmarterChatbots.com was born.

Now you can: ✅ Auto-train a chatbot from your website or documents
✅ Customize the look, tone, and behavior
✅ Embed it anywhere or share via QR code
✅ Go live in under 10 minutes

I’ll admit, I was nervous to hit “launch” here—Product Hunt is full of amazing products, and things might still break 😅—but this is my shot. I’d love for you to give it a try.

Some fun chatbot ideas people have created on our platform:
✅ An author of children's books trained various characters on the books and added the QR code to the end of her book so kids could interact and play a game with the characters. Each character was context aware of who they were and where they were in the story.
✅ My friend who owns a mobile auto mechanic business created one to diagnose preliminary auto issues and help him estimate pricing.
✅ A few businesses in the hospitality industry created chatbots trained to engage in customers to answer questions about what the experience is like, ticket pricing, menu & drink options and events that where hidden on their website.

💬 Feedback, feature requests, or even “this part was confusing” messages are all welcome.
This indie project is all about learning how to make training and deploying AI chatbots truly effortless.

Thanks for being here 🙏
— Zach

meta.parent_description: SmarterChatbots lets anyone train and launch powerful AI chatbots in minutes instead of hours. No coding. Just connect your site, customize the style, and deploy anywhere.

standardized: The founder of Smarter Chatbots, Zach, has shared a personal and insightful story about the origins of the product, highlighting the tedious process of manually gathering data, embedding it, and setting up pipelines for custom AI chatbots, which sparked the idea to create a more streamlined and user-friendly solution. He expressed frustration with the traditional method of building chatbots, where he would spend hours coding and iterating with clients, and instead envisioned a platform where business owners could easily train and customize their own AI chatbots without needing extensive coding knowledge. Through a process of iteration and feedback, Zach developed Smarter Chatbots into an AI studio that allows users to auto-train chatbots from their website or documents, customize their look and tone, and deploy them quickly, making it an attractive solution for businesses across various industries. The founder's goal is to make training and deploying AI chatbots truly effortless, and he is eager to receive feedback and feature requests to further improve the product, demonstrating a commitment to continuous learning and improvement. Overall, Smarter Chatbots aims to fill a significant gap in the market by providing a no-code, user-friendly platform for creating and deploying powerful AI chatbots, and the founder's personal story and vision underscore the product's potential to revolutionize the way businesses interact with their customers.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

    Super excited to share the Ithena SDK (@ithena-one/mcp-governance) today!

    We're seeing the Model Context Protocol (MCP) unlock amazing potential, letting AI models interact with everything from local filesystems and apps to complex enterprise systems. It's incredibly powerful!

    But here's the challenge: moving those cool MCP integrations from a local setup to a secure, shared production or enterprise environment brings a whole new set of critical requirements. Suddenly, you need robust answers to:

        Who is really making this request in a multi-user system? (AuthN)

        Are they authorized to use this specific tool or access that sensitive data? (RBAC)

        How do we securely manage and inject API keys for shared services without scattering secrets? (Credentials)

        How do we get reliable audit logs for security monitoring and compliance? (Auditing)

    Implementing this essential governance layer consistently across every MCP tool is complex, repetitive, and easy to get wrong.

    That's why I built the Ithena SDK! It's an open-source (Apache-2.0) TypeScript library designed specifically to provide this missing enterprise-grade governance layer for your MCP servers.

    Ithena gives you a pluggable pipeline to easily add Identity, RBAC, Credential Management, and Auditing capabilities, letting your team focus on building great MCP features, knowing the security and compliance aspects are handled consistently.

    While you could use parts of it locally, its real power is unlocked when deploying MCP services where security, compliance, and observability are non-negotiable.

    We also have a waitlist open for an optional Managed Platform if you want hosted, production-ready backends for these interfaces later.

    Dive into the GitHub repo and docs to see how it works!

    Curious to hear: How are you tackling security and governance when taking MCP tools beyond local experiments and into shared or production environments? What are the biggest hurdles you've faced?

    Cheers!

meta.parent_description: Open-Source SDK (@ithena-one/mcp-governance) A TypeScript library providing a robust governance pipeline and pluggable interfaces (Identity, Roles, Permissions, Credentials, Audit, Logging) to wrap your base MCP server.

standardized: The founder of Ithena is extremely enthusiastic about the potential of the Model Context Protocol, but also acknowledges the significant challenges that arise when transitioning from a local setup to a secure, shared production environment, particularly in terms of authentication, authorization, credential management, and auditing. They express that implementing a robust governance layer to address these concerns can be complex and prone to errors, which is why they created the Ithena SDK, an open-source TypeScript library designed to provide a pluggable pipeline for adding essential security and compliance features to MCP servers. The founder believes that Ithena's enterprise-grade governance capabilities will empower developers to focus on building innovative MCP features, while ensuring the security and compliance aspects are handled consistently, and they are eager to hear about the community's experiences and challenges in tackling these issues. Overall, the tone suggests that the founder is confident in the value proposition of Ithena and is seeking to engage with the community to further understand their needs and pain points in deploying secure and compliant MCP services.

text:
Hi Product Hunters!

I built LLMSymphony because I wanted a simple, clean, incognito by-default way to chat with the best remote AI models natively on windows, with an interface that will be familiar to MS Teams users.

I have tested a number of local LLM tools for privacy, but they can only run distilled or smaller models. And the ones I have checked - chats are saved unencrypted to disk by default! While some of them now supports remote models, I wanted a more simplified and efficient UI for switching AI models and providers.

With providers like DeepInfra.com / Together.ai with Nvidia H100 GPU's that can run high parameter / mixture of expert models like DeepSeek, and that chat logging is often off by default with developer accounts, this gave me the idea that I don't need run expensive servers with GPUs to get privacy, as long as the client is secure as well.

I have built pre-configured Profiles for GPT-4o, Claude, DeepSeek, Gemini, and Grok with a 'one-click' setup using your own API keys. In fact, it supports any remote or local LLMs (e.g. Ollama) as long as the model interaction is via OpenAI API Compatible spec.

The app is free to trial for 7 days, and just a one off $12 if you decide to keep it (lifetime of upgrades). It is certified by the Windows Store for your piece of mind.

So who is this for? Someone who wants to chat with advanced LLM models remotely, and want to minimize exposure to data breach events and (default) information harvesting practices if you were to use the public web models. Or just want to switch between AI models really fast in a single chat thread.

Would love your feedback, questions or launch support! AMA!

meta.parent_description: LLMSymphony is an incognito by-default Windows app for chats with frontier LLM/AI models using your API keys. Strong local encryption protects all your chats and API keys at rest.

standardized: The founder of LLMSymphony has created this product to address a significant concern in the AI chat model space, which is the lack of privacy and security in existing solutions, with many saving chats unencrypted to disk by default. By designing an app that is incognito by default, with strong local encryption to protect chats and API keys, the founder aims to provide a secure and private way for users to interact with advanced LLM models remotely. The motivation behind LLMSymphony stems from the founder's own experience testing local LLM tools, which were found to be limited in their ability to run high-parameter models and often compromised on privacy. The app's simplicity, efficiency, and familiarity, inspired by MS Teams, are intended to make it easy for users to switch between AI models, such as GPT-4o, Claude, and DeepSeek, using pre-configured profiles and one-click setup with their own API keys. Ultimately, LLMSymphony is positioned as a solution for individuals who value their privacy and want to minimize exposure to data breaches, while also seeking a seamless and efficient way to engage with cutting-edge AI models, all at an affordable price point of $12 for a lifetime of upgrades.

text:
Hello everyone! Paul here—co-founder and CEO of Recall.


It’s been 10 months since our last launch. It’s been an exciting, intense, and chaotic journey getting here (we delayed this launch several times to get it polished!) But now, we’re back with our biggest update yet: Augmented Browsing, Chat with Your Content, and more.

This feature seeded the inception of Recall. PKM has always been a passion of mine, but one question kept frustrating me:

"Where have I seen this before?"

I’d read something online, recognize something familiar, and then waste time searching through my messy notes —only to come up frustrated. I wanted a way to instantly resurface relevant knowledge as I browsed.


Introducing  Augmented Browsing—An overlay on your browser that highlights keywords that are stored in your existing Recall knowledge base. This brings utility and real time connections to what has historically been a very passive knowledge management space.  It is important to note that it is local first— nothing leaves your device while you browse. Do check out the tutorial of Augmented Browsing in action.

Here’s what’s in the release: 

  1. Augmented Browsing –  Resurfaces related content from your knowledge base as you browse. Since Augmented Browsing is local-first, our keyword extraction doesn’t rely on an LLM—it’s powered by our own model. We’re constantly refining it to surface meaningful connections rather than just frequent keyword

  2. Chat with Your Content – Our most requested feature! Ask questions and get insights from your saved sources.

  3. Store Full Content –  Use Recall as your go-to read-it-later app. Save entire pages and transcripts.

Together with our growing team - Igor, Sanks, Ali & Mason we are focused on a series of features that will continue to bring utility to the knowledge management space, so that you are consistently extracting value from the content you consume. This really is just the beginning for us, we hope this launch resonates with you. Truly excited to hear your candid feedback.

The new feature, Augmented Browsing, is designed to solve this problem by overlaying keywords from the user's existing knowledge base onto their browser, providing real-time connections and utility to the knowledge management space, all while maintaining user privacy by keeping data local on the device. Paul is eager to hear feedback on this launch, which also includes other highly requested features such as the ability to chat with saved content and store full pages and transcripts, and believes this is just the beginning of bringing value to the knowledge management space. Overall, the tone is one of enthusiasm and anticipation, as the team at Recall is focused on continuing to develop features that will help users extract more value from the content they consume.

text:
🗣️ Voice AI is taking off—but building reliable voice agents still takes most teams weeks or months of stitching together and scaling infrastructure. With Vapi, our goal is to compress that down to minutes. A single platform where developers can deploy and scale voice agents without wrangling telephony, speech models, or orchestration logic ☎️

Want to hear Vapi in action? Call me: 🤙 1-844-HEY-VAPI


What's New Since Our Last Launch


🔗 API Integrations: You can now connect Vapi to 100+ providers across transcription, LLMs, and TTS. We’ve also added integrations for SIP, cloud infra, observability tools, and native hooks into calendars, CRMs, and more.

🔧 Embedded Tools: Turn-taking orchestration, noise cancellation, voicemail detection, and a test rig for simulating complex call flows.

🎙️ Deep Customization: The assistant layer now includes a prompt composer, support for persistent memory, dynamic variables, real-time endpointing, multilingual output, OpenAI’s speech-to-speech model, and more.

📈 Infra at Scale: We’ve now powered over 44 million calls with <500ms latency. The system handles long calls (60+ minutes) and meets enterprise standards like HIPAA and SOC-2.

🌐 Deploy Anywhere: Telephony, Web, iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, Python.


🚀 New Features


🔍 Query Tool for Knowledge Bases: Attach structured or unstructured knowledge to your agent for more contextually grounded responses.

⚙️ Conversational Workflows: Visually build out flows that split complex conversations into manageable, deterministic steps.

🛠️ Assistant Tools: Call transfers, hang-ups, data retrieval, voicemail detection, keypad dialing, plus automation integrations with tools like Make and GHL.

🧩 Observability: Integrated with Langfuse. See transcripts, call outcomes, engagement metrics, quality ratings, and success/failure evaluations.

🎤 Vapi Voices: We trained 10 new voices on actual human conversations. One of them is mine—curious which? You know what to do 🤙1-844-HEY-VAPI


➡️ Why Vapi? 

  • We’re building for developers who want full control over the voice layer—without spending months on plumbing.

  • Our community includes 150,000 developers, from indie devs to Fortune 500 enterprises.

  • We’ve handled 44 million+ calls to date, all in sub-500ms latency.

➡️ Special Product Hunt Offer

To make it easier to get started, we’re covering telephony for up to 10 inbound phone lines in the US.

And if you create an account this week: 1,000 free minutes per month, for life.


Cheers,
Jordan


P.S. Call me to see what voice agents should feel like.  😉🤙1-844-HEY-VAPI

text:
Hey Product Hunt!


I'm Sashank, and we're excited to launch Exponent, a highly capable AI programming agent that collaborates on software engineering tasks in any environment.


After building and using many AI coding tools, we repeatedly found the same problems and limitations:

  • They are restricted to a single surface like an IDE, even though engineering work happens in many places

  • Behavior is opaque and you can't tell what they are doing and where they are going wrong

  • They go off the rails and are difficult to steer

We built Exponent to be the AI programming agent that we would want to use by focusing exclusively on a collaborative, agent-first experience:

  • It feels great to collaborate with, and is also powerful enough to complete work end-to-end, striking a balance between it being independent but asking you for help when it needs it

  • It runs anywhere: I can use Exponent to debug an issue in my local development environment, while another instance of Exponent can run within a Github actions pipeline which auto-fixes my type check errors, without needing any other tooling.

  • It has a clean, intuitive interface which shows me exactly what the agent is doing instead of obfuscating it

We first got some attention after collaborating with OpenAI on one of their API features last year, and we're ready to open to a wider audience.


You might like Exponent too if you want to improve at collaborating with AI instead of just being a passenger, if you want a consistent experience across environments, or if you use prosumer software like Raycast or Linear.


If you're not sure where to begin, pick the next task off of your to-do list, take a look at our docs here, or try a task you've been unsatisfied using other tools for.


Start using Exponent, the collaborative AI programming agent here: https://exponent.run/.


And if you’re on an engineering team that is being practical about adopting AI tooling to move faster, you’ll probably be interested in Exponent for Teams: https://www.exponent.run/teams

In response, Exponent has been built to provide a collaborative, agent-first experience that is both powerful and intuitive, allowing it to work seamlessly across different environments, including local development and Github actions pipelines, and providing a clean interface that shows exactly what the agent is doing. The founder believes that Exponent will resonate with users who want to improve their collaboration with AI, achieve a consistent experience across environments, and leverage prosumer software, and they are encouraging users to try Exponent on their next task, with resources available in their documentation and a team-focused offering for engineering teams looking to adopt AI tooling. Overall, the tone suggests that Exponent is poised to address the limitations of current AI coding tools and provide a more effective and user-friendly experience for software engineers.

text:
With most product categories, disruption happens when the existing incumbents start to feel broken and insufficient. For coding agents, that hasn't really been the case - even when the current tools seem great, it can be worth switching to new tools that make us even more powerful.

It's been incredibly exciting over the past year to watch assistants like Cursor take mindshare from the incumbent GitHub and to watch new entrants like Windsurf gaining traction despite Cursor having a lot of user love. It tells me that there's a ton of potential in this category, and we're nowhere near diminishing returns.

I'm excited to see what people think about Exponent. The fact that it works everywhere you do feels like a major unlock. It also looks like a well-crafted tool built by top engineers who love the craft of coding. Congrats Sashank and Tiger on the launch!

text:
I’ve been a beta tester of Exponent for about four months now. It’s insane. I feel like Exponent’s UX (DX?) and approach to AI augmented programming is the obviously right one, and every other tool will soon realise this and begin to copy it. The tool works everywhere, in your CLI, with whatever editor you want, and it has exactly the right kind of interaction model when it’s making changes in your codebase (or reading files on your filesystem, or running build commands for you). You trust it, quickly. It never oversteps or does something you don’t want it to do. It is also improving rapidly, meaning that if (or when) others copy their approach, the team will likely have improved further.

I don’t use any other tool for AI programming. Try it — it’s great.

text:
Hi Product Hunt,  

Do you really trust one AI model? 

We’ve created an AI answer aggregator.  A platform that brings together the best responses from top AI engines into one easy to use platform. No more jumping between platforms or second guessing the information you find.

🤖 The Problem: While AI can provide answers, they’re often inconsistent or inaccurate. We discovered a lot of misinformation and a lack of fact-checking.  These are massive issues that can impact everyone.

✅ Our Solution: Just ask a question, and you’ll receive answers from multiple leading AI models. You can compare them and find the most accurate, reliable response, saving you time and frustration.

🎯 Built for You: Our simple, drag-and-drop platform allows you to create custom AI agents for your tasks. You can even share these agents in our Agent Store, building a community of creators.

💡 What’s Coming: Soon, you’ll also be able to monetize your agents, turning your ideas into real opportunities.

Sign up today and start exploring. A pay-for-service model for higher-volume users will launch in Q3 2025 to help us scale with your needs.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋


I'm Andy Szybalski, designer/engineer who previously helped bring you Google Maps and Uber Eats. Six months ago on Product Hunt, we launched Cove, a visual workspace where humans and AI work together. We built Cove because single-threaded chat products make it awkward to establish a shared understanding with AI and to iterate on ideas over time. Cove lets you collaborate more naturally with AI, directly editing and building upon AI-generated ideas within a shared context.

We’ve been thrilled to see Product Hunters embracing Cove for planning travel, finding a new job, starting a business, and more, and I’m excited to be back on Product Hunt to announce the next big step in our vision:


⭐ Introducing AI Apps

Cove can now build AI Apps just in time, just for you. This is different from the vibecoding tools you may have used. Here’s how Cove apps are special:

  1. Cove suggests apps just for you as a natural part of your workflow. It’s not about building the next blockbuster app, it’s about giving you the right tool in the moment.

  2. Apps live in your Cove workspace and are context aware—they can access PDFs, web pages, and other information you’ve added and transform them into interactive tools

  3. AI is first class, so apps can do web research on your behalf, generate structured data on demand, and generate content, no API keys needed

  4. Multiplayer collaboration and storage is built in to the Cove runtime, so you can use them with your team in real time


We believe that the best answer to many questions isn’t text, it’s an interactive experience.

Imagine:

  • You are a student who has uploaded your class materials to Cove. Cove can build flash cards to help you get ready for the upcoming exam.

  • You own a dog grooming business and are planning your staffing levels. Cove can create a simulator to help you understand how grooming speed impacts customer wait times. 

  • You are a social media manager launching a new energy drink. Cove can make an app to rewrite social media posts to match your brand voice

  • You are preparing for a trip to Korea. Cove can make a customized audio tool to help you improve your comprehension of spoken Korean phrases.

  • You are planning a potluck and want to make sure your guests don’t all bring the same dish. Cove can make a multiplayer app to help them co-create a menu, suggesting dishes that go well together. 

  • You are researching ways to help your child calm down before bedtime. Cove can customize an app to teach breathing exercises to your future astronaut.

Not sure what you need? Start with a simple idea like "hot sauce finder," and as your thinking evolves, the app evolves with you. Or visit our App Gallery to discover, use, and extend apps from our growing community. 


🚀 Try it now

You can try making apps with Cove for free starting today. And for a limited time, Product Hunt users can use the code PH50 to get 50% off a Plus plan for the first 3 months—with unlimited AI credits to build apps. 


At Cove, we are on a long term journey to rethink how people interact with computers. We think in the future, we think the line between “using apps” and “building apps” will disappear, as software is dynamically generated to fit your needs at the moment. 


Whatever your project, big or small, we hope that you’ll try out Cove today and see how AI apps can help you think brilliantly.

text:
Hi Hunters! 👋

Abel and Alex here, co-founders of FlutterFlow. We're thrilled to be back on Product Hunt launching DreamFlow, our new AI-powered app builder for Flutter.

When we first launched FlutterFlow, your incredible feedback and support shaped our path forward. Today, we're taking things another step further, introducing a whole new way to turn your ideas into beautiful Flutter apps, instantly.


DreamFlow lets you go from simple text prompts to fully-functional Flutter apps in seconds, powered by our battle-tested FlutterFlow infrastructure and deep Flutter expertise.


Here’s what makes DreamFlow special:

✨ AI-First Flutter Development: Just describe your app idea, and DreamFlow instantly brings it to life.
⚡️ Fast & Easy: Generate apps instantly from your ideas. AI integrated app? Comes out of the box.
📱 Multi-platform Ready: Create high-quality apps for mobile, web, and desktop.
🔗 FlutterFlow Integration (coming soon!): Soon you'll be able to seamlessly edit and customize your DreamFlow apps directly in FlutterFlow.


We’ve seen our community build incredible apps already – from nostalgic puzzle games to quirky, delightful llama-themed creations. We can’t wait to see what YOU create!


Check it out and let us know your thoughts, we'd love your feedback and suggestions.


Thanks again, Product Hunt community—you’re the best! 💜

– Abel, Alex & the FlutterFlow Team

text: Hey PH community! Today, we’re launching DGi after months of hunkering down and pair programming with my CTO. Our journey over the past seven years has been full of ups and downs: we scaled a martech company to around 160 people, but when COVID hit, we couldn’t fully bounce back. Our team dissolved, and only my CTO stayed on to keep searching for product-market fit with almost no resources. Despite it all, we built a pretty cool data workflow product used by several Fortune 500 companies. It felt too cumbersome and time consuming—but it made us profitable. We took that lesson and poured our learnings into our next big bet. Rather than seeing the past as failure, we saw it as proof that every struggle, every pivot, and every lesson would lead us here, stronger than ever. What is DGi? Simply put, DGi is an AI agent specialized in data that builds and it is entirely built by AI. It isn’t locked into any fixed front or back end. At its core, it embodies “visual empathy”: we give you a sleek interface for adding credentials, so you’re not wrangling config files. We let you interact visually, not just via chat. And, of course, we deliver dashboards that are both appealing and easy to navigate. We built DGi using Next.js and Shadcn components because we admire Guillermo’s (Founder of Vercel) philosophy and wanted to bring that same level of tasteful design into the data space. In a nutshell with DGi you can: Connect to your data or upload files Create dashboards or ask questions about your data Run code Schedule tasks to orchestrate (just like Airflow) In essence we are a combination between ChatGPT, v0 and Airflow. More on DGi at www.dgintel.ai What’s next? We believe data exploration should be AI-based from the start. Eventually, tools like Excel and Power BI may fade away if a single product can handle everything—uploading a CSV, connecting a database, creating dashboards, asking questions, and automating workflows. That’s our dream, and DGi is the first step toward making it real. We hope you love it as much as we do. You can try it now, for free. Plus here’s our commitment, if you try it out and you find a bug or want a feature we don’t have, we will fix it or implement it right away. We know there’s many things to improve. For example we want to update users while DGi is “Thinking”. We will bring streaming very soon. Also, share what you built with the hashtag #dgi and tag us @datagran on X by April 15 for a chance to win $1,000. The most impressive implementation takes it. Finally we’ve raised more than $5m thus far but we are opening a community round on Wefunder to give anyone the chance to invest in the future of data https://wefunder.com/datagran

We're excited to unveil our newest launch: PDF-to-Video!

Symvol now transforms PDFs directly into bite-sized, memorable videos, preserving both text and images from your documents. Whether you're a creator, educator, or business professional, you can turn research papers, reports, and educational materials into dynamic video content with just a click of a button.

🚀 Key features:
🌍 27 languages supported
🗣️ 100+ premium voices
🎥 Multiple video models
💾 Downloadable videos
⏮️ Complete version history

No video editing or design skills needed - our AI handles everything for you!

Getting started is simple:
1. Create an account at https://www.symvol.io/

3. Choose your language, voice, and video model
4. Click Generate

Pro tip: For longer documents, split them into smaller files for more detailed videos.

We can't wait to hear what you think and see what you create!

Hey Product Hunt, I'm Adam, founder of 1Security! 👋

We started 1Security with one observation: nobody we spoke to could confidently tell us who has access to what files in their organization. It felt almost surreal and it got us building.

Managing access should not feel like navigating a labyrinth. 1Security makes it effortless to understand and control your permissions with intuitive access maps and powerful insights, ensuring no permissions are left unnoticed. See exactly what files and sensitive data are shared with users, apps, and AI agents.

Features:
🔍 Access maps - Effortlessly locate and control every permission, whether it’s tied to a user, app, group, or an AI agent.
🚨 Easy security wins in plain sight - Quickly find resources that need attention, like apps with access to a lot of credit cards numbers.
🎯 Advanced filters - Need to find stale shared files from over 2 years ago? No problem. We’ll show you exactly what you’re looking for.
🌐 All sharing data in one place - Analyze intuitive insights otherwise hidden among tens of separate dashboards, lists and API endpoints.

💡 More to come this month!
🚨 Sensitive data support - Analyze credit card numbers, addresses, and other sensitive data. Already available in demo!
👥 User mode - Empower teammates with intuitive permission analysis to help secure their files, groups, and sensitive data, while keeping company-wide views securely limited to admins.

✨ Next month:
🔧 Permission policies and automations - Simplify security management with customizable alerts and automated actions.

text:
👋 Hey PH community,


We’re excited to unveil Stock Sage 🚀 - an AI-powered solution tailored for Shopify merchants to revolutionize inventory management and demand forecasting. Whether you're running a growing Shopify store or managing a high-volume Shopify operation, Stock Sage empowers you to streamline stock levels, prevent stockouts, and scale smarter.


Why Stock Sage is a must-have for every business

Managing inventory and forecasting demand is no longer optional, it’s crucial for success. Without proper management, you’re left with:

  • Surplus inventory: Tying up cash flow, increasing risk of obsolescence, and raising holding costs.

  • Stockouts: Leading to frustrated customers, lost sales, and costly shipping.

With AI-powered insights, Stock Sage helps businesses optimize stock levels, prevent stockouts, and boost profitability - all while simplifying complex tasks.

How Stock Sage revolutionizes inventory management & forecasting

Inventory management pain points? We've got you covered. Stock Sage helps you solve these issues with:

  • Optimized stock levels: Keep the right inventory amount without overstocking or running out.

  • Advanced demand forecasting: AI-driven predictions that evolve with your business, so you're always ahead of the curve.

Real-time, data-driven insights

Stock Sage uses data from multiple variables to ensure better decisions:

  • Track lead times per item ⏱️ and ensure stock is constantly replenished at the right time.

  • Automatically detect anomalies 🔍in your operations and inventory, allowing you to review and confirm their accuracy before they cause significant disruptions.

  • Break down bundled products for accurate SKU-level forecasts 📦, helping merchants purchase at the item level from suppliers.

  • Forecast substitutions for new products 🔄, whether driven by market shifts or internal innovation, using data from existing products to stay ahead.

  • Customize service levels 🎯 to align with your business goals, priorities, and industry type.

Accurate, adaptive forecasting 📈

Stock Sage’s hybrid forecasting model combines the best of machine learning 🤖 and statistical analysis 📊 to deliver precise predictions:

  • Statistical analysis helps identify trends in historical data.

  • Machine learning customizes predictions based on your business’s unique data, making your forecasts more dynamic and adaptable.

Metrics that drive continuous improvement

Stock Sage isn't just about predictions; it’s about refining them. With bias and accuracy metrics, you can fine-tune your forecasting performance, bring transparency into how the models operate, and continuously improve your decision-making process.

Key benefits for your business:

  1. Optimized stock levels – Reduce waste and improve cash flow.

  2. Improved profitability – Prevent costly stockouts and excess inventory.

  3. Enhanced customer satisfaction – Always have the right product in stock.

  4. Data-driven growth – Empower your business with smart, data-backed decisions.

Ready to get started?

👉 Start your 7-day free trial now and experience how Stock Sage can streamline inventory management and forecasting.

Let’s supercharge your business with smarter inventory and forecasting! Try Stock Sage today and take control of your supply chain planning. 🚀


🤔 Got questions? We’re here to help! Drop them below and we’ll be happy to assist.


Built with ❤️ for businesses who want AI-powered forecasting and seamless supply chain optimization.

Growing businesses generate more data every day, and as that data piles up, it often becomes difficult to extract actionable insights. Ever wished you could talk to your favorite character—like really connect with them as a mentor, friend, or even a lover?
With Wisepals.ai, that wish comes true. 💖🌈

🧠 Whether it’s guidance from an inspiring figure, laughs with a virtual BFF, or late-night chats with your fictional crush—your dream connection is just a message away.

👇 Here’s how you can join the magic:

1. Create your own favorite character (https://wisepals.ai)
2. Jump into a chat and feel the spark.
3. Share your favorite moment from the conversation right here in the comments—we’d love to see the stories that unfold!

text:
Dear Community,

We built (are building) this product to help increase company's runway for success by identifying headcount overspending.

What are people forced to do now?

1️⃣ Companies announce emergency layoffs without much thought at the peak of obesity.

2️⃣ Some companies hire independent consultants to assess the team and perform a layoff based on the assessment report from these consultants. I have been an independent contractor that helped a company with this process. This is manual, tedious, and expensive. There is a lot of loss of information if not done in an elaborate way.

3️⃣ Some do manual spreadsheets with only obvious dimensions like cost. This is sometimes preventive, so this is much better than the above two methods but heavily manual and error-prone.

4️⃣ Some products exist that help with headcount planning with already structured data. This is more like a quarterly planning activity but not nearly as continuous as required for a company to stay agile and lean at all times. Moreover, a lot of important insights aren't taken into consideration because they exist in docs, pptx, and unstructured formats that current tools do not address.

What we are offering on this release

✅ Sandboxed MVP on request with facility to create reports, funnels, and dashboards without restrictions on pre-populated data.

✅ Guided onboarding for companies to use all the features, including creating knowledge bases with AI from scattered documents and insightful report generation.

✅ AI-based scenario planning with alteration on real data catering from optimistic to pessimistic scenarios is in progress.

📅 You can book a meeting with us to learn more.
