text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

I'm excited to introduce iFrameAI - born from a simple frustration: why are small businesses forced to choose between expensive AI or no AI at all?

The Problem We're Solving:
🤔 Small businesses need AI that understands their specific products and services
💰 Custom AI solutions are prohibitively expensive for most small businesses
🔧 Integration requires technical teams most small businesses don't have
⏱️ Training traditional AI takes months of expertise and data preparation

What Makes iFrameAI Different

We've built iFrameAI to be the simplest way for small businesses to deploy custom ai embeds:
🚀 Train in minutes - Upload your docs, website content, and FAQs
🔌 One line of code to add to your website
🧠 Actually understands YOUR business - not generic responses
💬 Full Card Embed - Widget Embed

Our users tell us the difference between generic AI and iFrameAI is like night and day. Their customers finally get accurate answers about specific products, policies, and services without the frustrating "I don't know enough about that" responses.

Key Features:

Unlimited Projects (Chatbots)
Unlimited Leads Collected
Monthly chatbot loads limit (20,000)
Monthly AI tokens limit (2,000,000) 
Up to 2M Characters of Context Per Account
Up to 500k Characters of Context per Embed
Multiple Training Sources (Websites, Files, Text)
Access to Lead Collector System
Chat Interface Customization
AI Preferences Customization
Detailed Conversation Analytics
Retrain AI from Past Conversations
Embed Code for Any Website Platform
24/7 Chatbot Operations
Built-in Leads Management System
Multilingual Chatbot

🎉 ProductHunt Launch Special

For our launch, we're offering an 60% discount for the first 100 slots!

This isn't just a promotion - it's our mission to democratize AI. We want small businesses to compete with the big players without needing their resources.

We're bootstrapped, focused, and building this for businesses like yours.

Try iFrameAI today and see how custom AI can transform your customer experience without breaking the bank.

Questions? Feedback? Roasts? I'll be here all day responding!

I’m a busy IT consultant and father of two, I want to spend more time with them but I find it very challenging to read to them stories everynight.

So I built Mom & Dad Tales 👩‍🦰​👨‍🦰​— a platform that helps busy parents tell hundreds of stories to their kids, narrated in their own voices, in just 2 minutes!

Any Industry: From real estate to banking, healthcare to automotive, startups to construction—AnalystX delivers insights across all sectors.

Flexible Prompts: Just ask, "Who are the top AI startups disrupting telehealth?" or "Compare pricing models for these CRM vendors," and get immediate answers.

text:
Hey there! 👋

Stan here—software engineer and founder at @Norman (a fintech SaaS making accounting & taxes simpler).

While building "Norman, our team constantly struggled with PR reviews—they were slow, repetitive, and lacked educational value. Reviews felt like a chore rather than an opportunity for growth.

That frustration led us to create @Tweakr—an AI-powered code reviewer that doesn’t just spot bugs but actively mentors developers, turning every review into a learning experience.

Key highlights of Tweakr include:
🚀 Instant PR Summaries: Quickly understand changes at a glance
🧠 AI-driven Feedback: Automatically identifies issues and suggests improvements
📚 Developer Mentorship provides clear explanations, best practices, and practical tips for continuously upskilling your dev team
🔄 Interactive Suggestions: Easily apply suggested fixes right from your PR
🐱‍💻 PR Optimization: Auto-split large PRs and stack branches to accelerate development

Initially built to solve our own pains, Tweakr has transformed our internal workflow—faster reviews, fewer bugs, a happier team, and most importantly, continuous learning.

We’re excited to open Tweakr to a broader community! It’s in beta, so join the waitlist for early access.

We’d love your feedback, suggestions, and support today—let us know how we can make Tweakr even better!

Cheers,
Stan and the Tweakr Team ✨

text:
Hey Product Hunt 👋,
I'm Julien, a student who tries to build things 🚀

A few months ago, I launched Anyquery here, a tool to query apps using SQL. Recently, I wanted to see if LLMs can leverage this tool to provide a personalized experience. This is why I'm launching Anyquery AI - an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for your apps.

What is Anyquery AI?

Now, ChatGPT (or Claude, Mistral, etc.) can access data from the apps you use (e.g., GitHub, Apple Reminders, your emails, Google Chrome, etc.). This allows it to provide more tailored information. It can even update these apps, letting you use natural language to chat with them.

Is it free?
Yes, Anyquery is free and open source. Check the GitHub.

Main features

  • 💬 Works with the most popular chat clients (ChatGPT, Claude, TypingMind, LibreChat)

  • 📱 Compatible with over 40 apps (and 200 data points)

  • 🏠 Local-first, no data collection

  • 👨‍💻 Open-source (AGPL-V3 licensed)


Anyquery has already been downloaded thousands of times. Follow the guide to connect your chatbot to your apps in under 10 minutes

meta.parent_name: Anyquery AI - MCP servers for all apps
meta.parent_description: Anyquery is an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for over 40 apps (GitHub, Notion, Airtable, Chrome, etc.). It allows your chatbot (e.g. ChatGPT) to access data from your apps, delivering a personalized experience (e.g. reading bookmarks, adding a To-Do).

standardized: The user, Julien, a student and founder of Anyquery AI, is extremely enthusiastic about the potential of his product to revolutionize the way users interact with their apps, and his tone suggests a sense of excitement and pride in the launch of Anyquery AI, an MCP server that enables chatbots like ChatGPT to access and update data from a wide range of apps, including GitHub, Apple Reminders, and Google Chrome. The fact that Anyquery AI is free, open-source, and compatible with over 40 apps, with a local-first approach that ensures no data collection, is seen as a major advantage, and the user's emphasis on these features suggests that they are a key differentiator for the product. Overall, the sentiment expressed is one of innovation and empowerment, with the user implying that Anyquery AI has the potential to unlock a new level of personalized experience for users, and the thousands of downloads already achieved suggest that there is a strong demand for this type of solution.

text:
Hi everyone!

This project started because we wanted to get a quick second opinion on some MRI imaging. AI is so involved in our everyday lives now, why not for this? We visited two doctors and got two different opinions, and amazingly, the AI actually confirmed exactly what both doctors said.

We built QuackRead to help everyone get these quick educational insights on their medical scans and lab results. One thing that frustrated us was how medical data comes in all these weird formats. So we made sure QuackRead can handle pretty much anything you throw at it - ISOs, PDFs, ZIPs, and even DICOM files. 

To be clear - QuackRead is purely an educational tool. It's not for medical diagnosis. We designed it to satisfy users' curiosity about what AI systems might observe in their medical data. Consider it as an additional perspective that can help you better understand medical information, but always defer to healthcare professionals for actual medical advice.

Please let us know what you think!

meta.parent_description: Upload your medical scans or lab results and get easy-to-understand reports that actually make sense. Pick from various AI specialists who'll break down your results with clear explanations, helpful annotations, and insights from various medical perspectives.

standardized: The founders of QuackRead have expressed a clear motivation for creating the product, driven by a personal experience where they sought a second opinion on MRI imaging and found that AI was able to confirm the opinions of two different doctors, highlighting the potential for AI to provide valuable educational insights into medical scans and lab results. The product aims to address a specific pain point, namely the complexity of medical data formats, by allowing users to upload a wide range of file types, including ISOs, PDFs, ZIPs, and DICOM files, and receive easy-to-understand reports. It's evident that the founders are keen to emphasize the educational nature of QuackRead, stressing that it is not intended for medical diagnosis, but rather as a tool to satisfy users' curiosity and provide an additional perspective to help them better understand their medical information, with the caveat that users should always consult healthcare professionals for actual medical advice. Overall, the tone suggests a sense of excitement and optimism about the potential of QuackRead to empower users and provide a unique service that leverages AI to demystify medical data.

text:
Hi Product Hunt community,


I built this app to let users make better decisions with the world's best AI. AI is great, when it doesn't hallucinate. But it often does (even the newest models still have a 20% hallucination rate) and it's hard to detect because it's so convincing. This app lets you see answers from five of the best AI companies, summarizes their answers for you, and provides a summary table. This process allows you to easily spot hallucinations in certain AI models and companies. And lets you make better decisions. Demo.


There is Debater that can debate any topic. Demo.


Then the app has a list of interesting questions to get you started with (think Quora). Demo.


There is also a social network where users can post questions and follow each other (think Twitter). Demo.


In addition to this, it has several interesting councils (groups of AI assistants) that give you perspectives from "across the aisle". For example there is a "Politics" council that has three opinions from a Democrat, Libertarian, and Republican. This way you can hear opinions from across the whole political spectrum. Or a "Parenting" council that has three opinions from a Permissive, Authoritative, and Authoritarian parent. This way you can see parenting advice from the whole parenting spectrum. Demo.


Please give it a try and let me know what you think. I'd greatly appreciate your honest feedback!

Thanks,
Alin Jula

Founder of Council AI.



https://councilai.app/

LinkedIn

YouTube

X

Instagram

meta.parent_description: Make better decisions using the wisdom of the AI crowd. Eliminate AI bias and detect hallucinations by seeing answers from the world's best AI (Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity, and xAI) in a summary table.

standardized: The founder of Council AI, Alin Jula, is enthusiastic about the potential of their product to revolutionize decision-making by leveraging the collective wisdom of multiple AI models, thereby mitigating the issue of hallucinations that can occur even with the most advanced AI systems. By providing a platform that aggregates and summarizes answers from top AI companies, including Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic, Council AI aims to empower users to make more informed decisions, unencumbered by the biases and inaccuracies that can arise from relying on a single AI source. The product's features, such as the ability to compare answers from different AI models, access to a range of pre-curated questions, and a social network for users to share and discuss their queries, all contribute to a comprehensive and collaborative decision-making experience. Overall, the tone of the founder's comment suggests a strong sense of excitement and optimism about the potential of Council AI to transform the way people make decisions, and a genuine desire to solicit feedback from the community to further refine and improve the product.

text:
Hey everyone!

I built Profolio out of personal necessity. Being mostly self-taught with a mix of freelance work and personal projects, my actual skills never really came across on my traditional resume.

The jobs I've landed as a systems developer came through people who already knew my work, but I got completely stuck when trying to find better opportunities through normal job applications. My resume was completely ignored by recruiters.

I got really frustrated by the thought of how different my chances would be if recruiters could actually see my projects instead of just reading about them.

So I built a simple tool to transform my plain text resume into something that showcased my actual work. Some positive feedback from friends in similar situations, and a few rabbit holes later, Profolio was born.

It's currently in beta with a free tier that lets anyone try the AI enhancements. While it's still evolving, I've got a roadmap of features that will make it even more powerful for job seekers.

If you've ever been overlooked because your resume couldn't capture what you can actually do, I'd love for you to try it out. Your feedback will help shape something that gives talented people a fighting chance, regardless of how their experience looks on paper.

I'm excited to keep building this alongside the community that needs it most. Hope it helps you stand out in your next job search!

meta.parent_description: Profolio uses AI to transform your static resume into a dynamic, interactive portfolio. Showcase your skills, impress recruiters, and land your dream job faster. Get noticed!

standardized: The founder of Profolio created this platform out of a personal need to effectively showcase their skills and projects, which were not being adequately represented on traditional resumes, and this pain point is likely to resonate with many self-taught and freelance professionals who struggle to get noticed by recruiters. The fact that the founder's own resume was being ignored by recruiters, despite having a strong portfolio of work, highlights the problem that Profolio aims to solve, which is to provide a more dynamic and interactive way for job seekers to demonstrate their abilities and increase their chances of landing better opportunities. By leveraging AI to enhance and transform static resumes into interactive portfolios, Profolio has the potential to level the playing field for talented individuals who may not have a traditional background or experience, and the founder's enthusiasm for community feedback and involvement suggests a commitment to continuously improving and refining the platform to meet the needs of its users. Overall, Profolio seems to be addressing a significant gap in the job search process, and its focus on showcasing skills and projects rather than just listing qualifications could be a game-changer for many job seekers.

text:
Hello everyone 👋 Anggie here, founder of MYNDIFY.


I've been working on MYNDIFY and it is great to be able to finally share how great it is and how it came to be.


The story is a bit personal. It started after the birth of my second daughter, Athena, when I was trying to find a way to effectively remember all the hacks and insights I learned each day. I needed a system that both kept me organized with as little work possible, but more importantly, one that reminded me of the information when I needed it.


Yes, I tried my phone's note-taking app (along with some others). We can all agree that the note-taking apps out there are messy, overly complicated, and cannot make the data actionable. There was no way they would help me remember to order a different meal next time I come back to this restaurant.🤦‍♀️


So I decided to build an all-in-one solution...an app that functions like a second brain.


MYNDIFY has:

✅ A pre-built infrastructure to organize your mental notes. Entries are connected as they are created so I don't have to spend time "making folders".

EG: my "don't order this meal again" entry will be tied to the Bob's Bistro record it pertains to (along with other entries like "there's better parking in the back" or "remember you have a coupon")

✅ Features allowing for each entry to become actionable. So when I go back to Bob's Bistro, MYNDIFY can remind me (automatically) not to order that meal again.

✅ AI generated answers to our questions. With MYNDIFY's Inky chatbot, you can get answers to questions like "What was the name of the place I took the kids apple picking?" or "Which of my friends is vegan?".


These are just some of the many features MYNDIFY has!


I, along with some of the other early adopters, are obsessed with how useful it is. I absolutely LOVE getting reminders like what to ask the doctor about during our pediatric visits. What about you? How useful is your notes app? What would you love to get reminders for?

meta.parent_description: Introducing MYNDIFY : Your pocket-sized second brain! Store your insights, your hacks, your "aha moments" as they occur and access them EXACTLY when you need it. No need to remember...to remember.

standardized: The founder of MYNDIFY, Anggie, has expressed her enthusiasm for the product, which she created to address her own need for a more effective and organized note-taking system, particularly after the birth of her second daughter. She found existing note-taking apps to be cluttered and unable to make data actionable, prompting her to develop an all-in-one solution that functions like a second brain. MYNDIFY is designed to organize mental notes in a pre-built infrastructure, connect entries as they are created, and enable features that make each entry actionable, such as automatic reminders. The app also utilizes AI-generated answers to questions through its Inky chatbot, allowing users to retrieve information like the name of a place they visited or a friend's dietary preference. The founder's personal experience and satisfaction with the product are evident, as she loves receiving reminders about important topics, like questions to ask during pediatric visits, and is eager to hear from others about their own experiences with note-taking apps and what features they would find useful. Overall, MYNDIFY aims to provide a seamless and intuitive way to store and access insights, hacks, and "aha moments" exactly when needed, making it a valuable tool for productivity and lifestyle management.

At Cygentive we create tailored AI voice agents that help businesses like yours to automate inbound and outbound voice call operations 24/7. 


Our AI agents can stay deeply integrated into your existing systems like CRMs, databases, client portals, ERPs, ESPs, etc., and perform operations like real-time customer support and answering queries, voice reception (appointment booking, rescheduling, cancellation, etc.), lead qualification, eCommerce operations, and CRM updates.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Ryan G. Cox, the founder of SELECTY, and am thrilled to introduce the DB-agnostic sidecar query assistant that's set to transform your data querying experience.

As data professionals, we often grapple with:

- Time-consuming query writing and debugging.
- Adapting to unfamiliar database schemas.
- Ensuring query performance and accuracy.

Selecty addresses these challenges head-on by providing an intuitive Workspace where you can:

- Generate queries from simple English prompts.
- Explain and understand complex queries effortlessly.
- Optimize and iterate as your use cases change.
- Format for consistency.
- Validate to catch errors before they occur.

Designed to integrate seamlessly into your existing workflow, Selecty supports multiple query languages and adapts to various database schemas that you can upload, making it a versatile tool for any data professional.

We believe Selecty will significantly enhance your productivity and accuracy when working with data. We'd love for you to try it out and share your feedback! The team and I are here all day to answer any questions and hear your thoughts. Let's make data querying faster and more efficient together! 🚀

Check it out and let us know what you think!

text:
Hi everyone!

Amazon joins the agent competition! 

Sharing Amazon Nova Act, a new AI model (currently in research preview) from Amazon's AGI lab. This model is designed to power agents that can reliably take actions inside a web browser.

While many AI agents struggle with complex web tasks, Nova Act focuses on reliable building blocks. Developers can use the associated Nova Act SDK to leverage the model, breaking down workflows into dependable "atomic" commands (like filling forms or picking dates). The SDK also allows combining these AI-driven commands with custom Python code, API calls, or direct Playwright manipulation for more control.

Key aspects:

🤖 Powers Browser Agents: The underlying AI model for web automation.
✅ Focus on Reliability: Designed for accurate execution of individual web interaction steps (claims >90% on internal tests).
💻 SDK for Developers: The primary way to build with Nova Act right now, offering fine-grained control.
📊 Strong Benchmarks: Amazon reports strong performance on UI interaction benchmarks like ScreenSpot and GroundUI Web.
🔬 Research Preview: This is an early release for experimentation.

Amazon sees this focus on reliable building blocks as key for future agent capabilities.

meta.parent_description: Amazon Nova Act is an AI model enabling agents to control browsers reliably. Build automations via the SDK using atomic commands, Python, & APIs.

standardized: The introduction of Amazon Nova Act marks a significant development in the AI agent landscape, as it prioritizes reliability in web automation, a crucial aspect that has hindered many existing AI models. By focusing on dependable building blocks, Amazon's new AI model aims to empower developers to create more efficient and accurate browser agents, capable of executing complex web tasks with ease. The associated Nova Act SDK provides a robust framework for developers to leverage the model's capabilities, allowing for fine-grained control through the combination of AI-driven commands, custom Python code, API calls, and direct Playwright manipulation. With reported strong performance on UI interaction benchmarks and a claimed accuracy of over 90% in internal tests, Amazon Nova Act demonstrates considerable potential for revolutionizing web automation, and its early release as a research preview suggests that the company is committed to continually refining and improving the model to drive future agent capabilities. Overall, the sentiment surrounding Amazon Nova Act is one of excitement and anticipation, as it promises to address a long-standing challenge in AI agent development and pave the way for more sophisticated and reliable web automation solutions.

💡 You can try Lumigo for free right now—no signup required! We’re constantly improving the platform, with features like price tracking and personalized recommendations coming soon.

We’re thrilled to share Lumigo with the Product Hunt community and can’t wait to hear your feedback! 😄

text:
👋 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m the founder of Surfly, where we’ve been building co-browsing technology since 2012. Over the last decade, we’ve helped companies enable real-time collaboration on the web. As part of co-browsing, you need to be able to share any web session. To do that, we built a technology that can take any existing web application and turn it into a virtual session — one that’s shareable, customizable, and collaborative. That underlying capability ended up being our biggest breakthrough.


Why we’re launching Webfuse


Over the years, we’ve seen a few of our most creative customers build incredible tools on top of our tech. They used it to translate legacy applications in real time, sandbox existing web application for privacy, inject new UI into legacy tools, and even power AI-driven assistants that run inside existing web apps.


We always wanted to explore this potential further — but we weren’t ready. the technology wasn’t mature enough to open up broadly. So we focused on a small group of customers, iterated quietly… and now, we’re finally ready to share what we’ve built with the world. Introducing Webfuse — world's first Web Augmentation Platform.



Why nobody else has done this


Until now, your options for modifying existing web apps were limited to:

  • 🔌 Browser extensions (local, requires installation)

    • eg: @Plasmo @ExtensionPay @Sider: AI Research Agent & Extension @Cloaked @Merlin - ChatGPT powered chrome extension (Cmd+M) @Frase @Monica @Subtly @Factory Confirm by Sourcify , ...

  • 🌐 Remote browsers (lower quality as you are streaming pixels)

  • 🛠️ CDN/Edge code injection (requires infrastructure control)

But Webfuse is different. We rewrite the application in real-time and run it in a controlled environment — one where we can change, monitor, and extend it as needed. It’s a technically complex problem, especially with how fast the web evolves — but after 10+ years of experience building in this space, we’ve finally cracked it.



How it works


Webfuse wraps any existing web application in a thin virtualization layer — a “virtual session” — where everything can be customized without touching the original source. Once you sign up, you can create a SPACE, which is essentially a smart, shareable link that opens a set of virtualized web apps. From there, you can:

  • Modify the UI

  • Add security/authentication

  • Inject automation

  • Record & monitor sessions

  • Share with others (like multiplayer mode for any app)

All without needing source code access.



Features

  • 🔐 Security Layers – Add auth, HTTP-only cookie isolation, audit logs

  • 📹 Session Recording – Full video streams of interactions

  • 📈 Monitoring & Logs – Real-time JSON-based session audit trail

  • 🤖 Automation – Remote control API for bots and agents

  • 🤝 Collaboration – Share sessions with multiple users in real-time

  • 🎥 Video Chat – Add video calls to any web app

  • 🧩 Custom Extensions – Build and inject your own logic using a browser-extension-like API

Why Webfuse is unique


Webfuse enables a new category: Web Augmentation. Instead of building a new app from scratch or waiting for vendors to release features, you can build on top of what already exists — instantly. You can even turn browser extensions into managed SaaS tools without client-side installs. Whether you're a developer, founder, automator, or hacker — this is your canvas to remix the web.



Our roadmap

We’re just getting started. Right now, Webfuse supports the basics of the browser extension API. Based on your feedback, we’ll expand the capabilities, improve performance, and build a full ecosystem around this idea — including:

  • Extension marketplace

  • No-code UI builder

  • AI assistants integration

  • Private cloud deployment

Join us early — let’s build together


We’re offering $100 in credits for Product Hunt users. Just sign up with this link: https://webfuse.com/studio/?utm_campaign=PH100CREDITS


We’d love to hear what you’ll build with Webfuse!


👉 https://www.webfuse.com

📚 Docs: https://docs.webfuse.com/webfuse/introduction/


I’ll be hanging out in the comments all day — AMA 🙌

text:
Hey Product Hunt!


I'm excited to launch Marauder Bot - a Chrome extension that solves online technical questions instantly.


What it does

  • Marauder Bot extracts algorithm and multiple choice questions from webpages, and solves them with AI.

  • It handles image-based questions automatically by OCR.

  • It operates stealthily on side panel or separate window, and remains invisible even during screen sharing.

Why we built it

Technical interviews often test arbitrary skills rather than real engineering talent. Engineers spend tens or even hundreds of hours on coding platforms practicing and memorizing algorithm puzzles that rarely appear in real work. The name Marauder Bot is inspired by the Marauder's Map from Harry Potter, a tool created by four rebellious students to secretly navigate Hogwarts. Just like the Map, Marauder Bot helps you break free from the nonsense of meaningless, outdated technical assessments. In the age of AI, there is no point in grinding useless algorithms. Marauder Bot is here to level the playing field and empower you to focus on what truly matters: getting the job and solving real-world problems.


Extra features

  • Custom shortcut. Trigger analysis by customizable hotkeys, zero click needed.

  • Advanced AI models. Choose among GPT-4o, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, and Gemini 2.5 Pro.

  • Comprehensive analysis. Marauder Bot provides not only the solution, but detailed comments in the code, unit test cases, as well as time and space complexity analyses.

Try it now

  • Visit https://www.marauderbot.com to get started! Free for the first month.


Thank you for your attention. I'd love your feedback in the comments!

text:
9 months ago, I quit my 6-year role at a startup. I felt lost and didn’t know what I was going to do with my life. One evening, I realized I had no time left in my day anymore, and something had changed. I was holding my iPhone 15 Pro Max, and I couldn’t understand why I was spending so much more time on it compared to my old slow Android phone. This phone was different. The shimmering colors on the screen invited me to keep using it, and everything was buttery smooth. Apps on the main screens were all bright and colorful, making it so easy to engage with.

I started thinking about how things were when I had my old Samsung my battery would die every 3-4 hours. Yet now, with this iPhone, I found myself constantly plugged in. It dawned on me that I didn’t even know screen time existed. On the iPhone, it’s buried somewhere hard to find, almost as if they were hiding it. It looked like something from the 1990s an old graph, nothing like the sleek and beautiful health app graphs they charge for.

That’s when I began digging deeper into how social media uses behavioral psychology to manipulate us. I learned how they employed thousands of psychologists to make their platforms as addictive as possible. One simple example? The little circles at the end of a story showing who viewed it. Suddenly, you're in the middle of doing something, but you want to check who saw your story. The pressure mounts, especially when you're somewhere expensive like traveling and you feel like you have to post about it. You’re not posting for you; you’re posting to be the mule for your friends who can’t live the life you’re living.

As someone who got into coding to build the life I wanted, I started noticing how the addiction to these platforms was making everyone else miss out on the real world. On a train, I saw 9 out of 10 people doomscrolling. Kids waking up, stuck on their phones all weekend. It hit me: I hated everything about social media.

I decided the next product I needed to create had to be about data science and AI, combining both passions to create something that could help people regain control of their time. That’s how Blissio.ai was born.

Blissio.ai is a personalized digital wellness tool. It asks simple questions like your age, profession, and hobbies, and based on those, it creates focus sessions tailored specifically for you. We block apps based on what you need, whether for work, your hobbies, or age group. This way, we’re not arbitrarily blocking things, but helping you focus on what matters most.

I’m so excited to share this with you all! How do you manage your screen time? Would love to hear your thoughts below! 👇

The founder's journey began with a realization that their new phone's engaging design and features were intentionally crafted to be addictive, and this sparked an interest in understanding how social media platforms use behavioral psychology to manipulate users, leading to a broader concern about the impact of screen time on people's lives. With a background in coding and a passion for data science and AI, the founder set out to create a personalized digital wellness tool that would help people focus on what matters most, and blissio.ai was born as a mobile app that uses AI to block distracting apps, reduce screen time, and suggest offline alternatives tailored to individual goals. text:
Not from repairs or apps but from lost opportunities. The 1,152 hours I spent mindlessly scrolling? That was billable time as a freelance designer. The 3am doom scrolling sessions? They became client delays with penalty fees.

Then blissio.ai showed me the receipts:

  • "You spent 11 hours last week just reopening Instagram"

  • "These 23 late-night TikTok sessions shortened your sleep by 14%"

  • "Your 'quick checks' add up to 19 full workdays per year"

Suddenly, blocking apps wasn’t about willpower – it was a financial survival tactic.

Now I’ve reclaimed 31 productive hours/month, landed two new clients, and finally took that photography course (with my phone helping instead of hijacking me).

blissio.ai isn’t just another blocker it’s the forensic accountant of your screen time, exposing the hidden costs of distraction so you can invest your attention wisely.

The user's tone suggests a sense of gratitude and admiration for the app, which they describe as a "forensic accountant of your screen time", highlighting its ability to expose the hidden costs of distraction and enable users to make informed decisions about how to invest their attention, thereby underscoring the app's value proposition as a tool for building a mindful relationship with one's phone and achieving a better balance between screen time and offline activities.

Hey Product Hunt! 👋


I'm Marco, and I built wand.email as a side project to tackle a frustration I've had for years: creating emails that actually look good everywhere.


If you've ever coded emails, you know the challenge. Each email client interprets code differently, breaking your carefully crafted designs in unexpected ways. What works perfectly in Gmail might fall apart in Outlook, and achieving consistent responsive design across platforms can be a major headache.


So I created wand.email - a simple AI-powered editor and chatbot that ensures your emails work flawlessly across all clients.


Some features I've built into wand.email:
✉️ AI-powered email creation in minutes
🎨 Email-safe components that are responsive by default
🔍 Built-in validation to prevent using elements that will break
🤖 AI copywriting assistance for better messaging
🏢 Brand upload feature to automatically style emails with your identity
📱 Fully responsive designs that work on all devices

I'd love to hear what you think! Any feedback or feature ideas are welcome.


- Marco

text:
Hey Product Hunt! I'm excited to introduce llms-txt.io today.

❓ WHAT IS LLMS.TXT?

AI systems like Claude and ChatGPT are becoming more and more important for retrieving information from websites, and bringing traffic to YOUR website.

But, these systems often struggle to understand website structure and content due to limited context windows.

llms.txt solves this by providing a standardized way for websites to present their content in an AI-friendly format — think of it as robots.txt but specifically designed for large language models.

🔑 LLMS-TXT.IO

Our free generator makes it easy (and free) to create these files for any website.

Just enter your URL, and we'll generate both the basic navigation structure (llms.txt) and full content version (llms-full.txt).

❤️ YOU

We would love your support, feedback and questions!

text:
Hello Product Hunt 👋

I’m Gaurav, founder of Purple Leaf, and I’m excited to introduce you to our platform! Purple Leaf is designed to make social media content creation easier and more efficient. Instead of spending hours brainstorming and writing posts, you can simply let our AI pull content directly from your website and create high-quality posts for you. Whether you’re a SaaS company, an e-commerce business, or a content creator, Purple Leaf does the heavy lifting when it comes to crafting social media posts that engage your audience.


I started Purple Leaf to solve a common problem: the time-consuming and repetitive process of generating social media content. As someone who has worked with different websites, I realized that content creation could be automated, saving hours of manual work. Purple Leaf automatically analyzes your website’s content and transforms it into compelling social media posts tailored to each platform. Plus, we offer an easy-to-use content calendar to help you plan your posts seamlessly.


Our core belief is simple: If the intent of social media marketing is to bring more traffic to your website, why look for inspiration elsewhere? Why not leverage the content that is already there? Purple Leaf taps into your existing content to generate posts that drive traffic back to your website, making the process both efficient and impactful.


Our goal is straightforward—help you spend less time creating content and more time growing your brand. If you're ready to take the guesswork out of social media and start creating impactful posts effortlessly, give Purple Leaf a try!


🚀 How to get started? Sign up at https://purpleleaf.ai and start generating social media posts for your website in minutes!

meta.parent_description: Boost your brand visibility with Purple Leaf's AI-powered social media post generator. Generate social media posts for your website from the website's content only (no extra inspiration needed!)

standardized: The founder of Purple Leaf, Gaurav, is clearly enthusiastic about introducing his platform, which aims to revolutionize the process of creating social media content by leveraging artificial intelligence to generate high-quality posts directly from a website's existing content. This innovative approach is designed to save users a significant amount of time and effort, typically spent on brainstorming and writing posts, and instead enable them to focus on growing their brand. By automating the content creation process, Purple Leaf addresses a common pain point faced by businesses and content creators, who often struggle with the time-consuming and repetitive task of generating social media content. The founder's vision is centered around the idea that social media marketing should drive traffic back to a website, and therefore, it makes sense to utilize the content that is already available on the website, making the process both efficient and impactful. Overall, the tone of the founder's introduction suggests that Purple Leaf has the potential to be a game-changer for social media marketing, offering a straightforward and effortless solution for creating impactful posts that can help boost brand visibility.

text:
Hi Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Aasmund, the solo founder behind InstaPage – a tool born from my own struggle to keep up with all the books I wanted to read. 📚
The Problem:
We all want to learn from great books, but who has time to read them all? Traditional summaries often feel rushed or miss key insights.
The Solution:
InstaPage offers in-depth summaries you can read or listen to in under an hour – carefully crafted to preserve the author's core ideas while saving you time.
Key Features:
📖 Text & Audio Summaries: Learn however you prefer – read or listen on the go.
🌍 Multi-Language Support: Many summaries available in English, Spanish, German, and more.
🔍 Smart Search: Find exactly what you need by title, author, or topic.
🔊 Custom Audio: Adjust playback speed, choose voices, and enable continuous playback.
💾 PDF Downloads: Take your summaries offline for anytime access.

I'd Love Your Feedback!
What features would make InstaPage even better for you?
What books or categories should I prioritize next?
A huge thank you to our early users and the PH community for your support! Let's make learning more efficient together. 💡

A huge thank you to the early users who helped shape InstaPage, and to the PH community for this opportunity! 🙏
Let's build something amazing together – your input will directly shape the roadmap! 🚀

Hello everyone! I’m Alberto Zurano, i'm the founder and CEO of Suitpax. As a passionate traveler and tech enthusiast, I’ve always believed in the power of technology to transform the way we experience travel. That’s why I created Suitpax—an AI-powered travel software designed to make airport services more seamless, efficient, and accessible for modern travelers.

Today, I’m excited to introduce the exclusive beta version of Suitpax, available only to a select group of users. This marks a major milestone in our journey, and we’re eager to hear your feedback as we refine the platform.

If you have any questions, ideas, or feedback, feel free to reach out! You can connect with us on our forum, across our social platforms, or directly at hello@suitpax.com. Welcome to the future of travel!

text:
Hey everyone! 👋 I'm excited to launch @loat, born from our frustrations while building a high-trust product in the complex tax space @Norman. We had to create different onboarding sequences for different products, educational nurture campaigns for newborn entrepreneurs, and tax tips newsletters. Existing tools (shoutout to Loops and SendGrid) are great, but creating, writing, and optimizing these campaigns consumed a massive chunk of my time. 


Hiring a dedicated CRM wasn’t an option for us.


We initially built internal tools to automate this and realized other founders could benefit from this approach. So, we've turned our solution into loat, a dedicated platform that lets founders maintain lean teams and still maximize email as a powerful growth and onboarding channel.

  • Create full campaigns from just one prompt.

  • Automatic performance-based optimization.

  • Save hundreds of hours in setup and management.

  • Convert leads into active users effortlessly.


I'd love your feedback, questions, or ideas to make loat better. Thanks for checking it out!

meta.parent_description: loat creates entire email campaigns in seconds. Our AI agent automatically generates engaging emails, sequences, and drip campaigns—then continuously tests and improves them based on performance. Convert and retain the leads you already have.

standardized: The founder of loat is clearly enthusiastic about the launch of their product, which was born out of their own frustrations with managing email marketing campaigns for their previous product, Norman, in the complex tax space. They express a sense of relief and excitement about having created a solution that automates the process of creating and optimizing email campaigns, which they found to be a massive time sink. The tone suggests that the founder is confident that loat can help other founders maintain lean teams while still maximizing the potential of email as a growth and onboarding channel. The fact that they're seeking feedback and ideas to make loat better indicates a willingness to listen and improve, which is a positive sign for the product's potential for growth and development. Overall, the comment conveys a sense of problem-solving and innovation, with the founder having identified a genuine pain point in the market and created a product that uses artificial intelligence to address it, making it easier for businesses to create effective email campaigns and convert leads into active users.

text:
🚀 Big day for us – thaink² is live on Product Hunt! 🎉


Hey everyone, Anis here – founder & CEO of thaink².


Bringing our platform to life has been a wild journey, and today, I'm very glad to finally be putting it out there for you to explore. If you’ve ever struggled with messy data workflows, expensive AI tools, or just trying to get insights without jumping through a million hoops, I have good news for you, because that’s exactly why we built thaink².


Our goal? Make AI and data work for you, not the other way around. We want you to enjoy a seamless experience, and focus on what matters.


It has no extra costs, nor unnecessary complexity - just everything you need to go from raw data to real insights in our dedicated all-in-one platform.


So, who is thaink² for?


👉 Startups & SMBs who want AI power without the enterprise price tag.
👉 Enterprises looking to simplify and optimize data operations.
👉 Business teams & data pros who need a tool that just works—no PhD required.


What makes thaink² different? I'm glad you asked 😎


✅ All-in-one platform – from data ingestion to AI-powered insights.
✅ No-code & easy to use – because tech shouldn’t be a roadblock.
✅ Cost-effective – powerful AI without the hefty infrastructure bills.


We’d love for you to give it a shot, I'm very confident in the value it'll provide you! Try it for free, tell us what you think, and tell us abous your use case so we can see how thaink² can help your team.

Let’s make data actually useful—without the headache 🪼


Anis & the thaink² Team


👉 www.thaink2.com/en

text:
Hi Product Hunt community!

I'm excited to introduce Kindred, a dating app born from a simple observation: meaningful relationships start with genuine conversation, not profile photos.
After years of watching friends struggle with dating apps that prioritize appearances, we asked: what if we built something different? What if we let people connect based on who they are, not just how they look?
That's Kindred. We hide photos until after 3 conversations, focusing first on compatibility and communication styles. Our AI-powered matching system analyzes communication patterns and values to connect people who interact in complementary ways - whether you're a thoughtful listener, animated storyteller, or curious questioner.
We're currently in development and building our waitlist. Join us if you're tired of superficial swiping and want to try a dating experience where connections form naturally through conversation.
I'd love your feedback and questions! What aspects of dating apps frustrate you the most? What would make you excited to try Kindred?

text:
Why We're Different
1. Chef-Designed, Not Engineer-Built
As an obsessive home cook from China, I built ChefWand to solve my own kitchen frustrations:
✅ Global Cuisine Freedom - Break free from "Chinese app syndrome" where you're stuck with local recipes. We cover 10 cuisines because cooking should be an adventure
✅ Leftover Alchemy - Our AI thinks like a chef and customizes recipes for you, nTell it "3 eggs + half cabbage + tired cilantro" and get actually useful recipes
✅ Creative Sandbox - Save your kitchen experiments (yes, even that "weird curry-pizza fusion") and let others remix them

2. Real AI,
❌ No random web scraping ❌ No recipes from databases
✔️ DeepSeek-Powered - Every recipe is freshly generated like consulting a master chef
✔️ Taste-Tested - If our AI suggests something ridiculous, I'll personally apologize in the app

3. Crazy Affordable Genius
"Why charge $9.99 when $1.29 covers server and API costs?" - Damon's Developer Diary
✨ 7-Day Free Trial - Test-drive full features risk-free
✨ Unlimited Recipes @ $1.29/mo - Less than the price of a garlic bulb. I just really hope it can help you to cook.

Features That Speak Cooks' Language
Generate Recipe
"Like having your grandma team up in your kitchen"

Smart Favorites
"Customize AI Recipe, Convenient Shopping list, Clear collections"

Complete Recipes
"Put your draft ideas and cookware, and wait for the magic"

Community
50% recipe sharing, 50% bragging rights - with emoji reactions for "This Actually Worked?!"

Our Origin Story:
"It started with a moldy cucumber..."
As newlyweds in Shanghai, my wife and I:
1️⃣ Hated wasting food but kept forgetting ingredients
2️⃣ Wanted to explore global cuisines beyond takeout
3️⃣ Needed a way to document our kitchen experiments

Please always remember that you are the hero in this app
While AI provides suggestions and help within the app, the most important aspect is your experimentation and the process of improving recipes. AI can never taste the actual flavors - you are the true protagonist of this app.

Call to Action
"I dare you to try breaking our servers"
👉 Free Trial - No card needed, just culinary curiosity

Grant funding is a game-changer, but the process is frustrating.
We built Grants8 because applying for grants feels like navigating a maze:

  • IP risks – Sharing ideas feels risky. How secure is your data?

  • Complicated eligibility – Ever spent hours only to realize you're ineligible?

  • Scattered sources – Finding the right grants takes forever.

  • Confusing templates – Grant docs are not user-friendly.

  • No reference applications – How much detail is enough?

  • No feedback on lost grants – Why didn’t it get approved?


With AI + expert insights, Grants8 simplifies the process—matching you with the right grants, drafting applications, and ensuring expert review.

text:
Hey Product Hunt,

I’m excited to introduce Abstractify—a Chrome extension designed to make academic research faster, clearer, and more structured.


Most research tools are either too complex or too generic. AI-powered assistants often misinterpret academic content, and managing citations, summaries, and deep analysis across multiple tools is frustrating. Abstractify brings everything together in one place, right in your browser.

🔎 What Makes Abstractify Different?

Tailored for Academia 
Unlike general-purpose tools, Abstractify is built with academic research in mind, offering task-specific configurations that provide more nuanced and relevant insights.

10+ Research-Specific Tasks 
A focused set of tools for common research challenges: 

✔️ Visualising topic and citation trends
✔️ Mapping connected papers via semantic and citation relationships
✔️ Crafting deep research reports informed by real web sources
✔️ Summarizing complex papers 
✔️ Paraphrasing tricky sections 
✔️ Extracting citations 
✔️ Comparing documents side-by-side 
✔️ Identifying biases and limitations 
✔️ Generating research ideas and highlighting key conclusions 
✔️ Proposing further reading suggestions

Browser Context Awareness 
Abstractify works directly in your browser, analyzing content in real-time so you don’t have to copy-paste or switch tabs constantly.

Extended Input Capacity
Handles up to 60k tokens, so it can process long and complex research papers without hitting token limits.

Direct Academic Database Integration 
Integrated access to resources like OpenAlex makes sourcing references and citations easier than ever.

🚀 Coming Soon: More Personalization – Abstractify will adapt to your field and interests, surfacing the most relevant insights for your work.

Abstractify is designed to be a streamlined yet powerful research tool—no clutter, no unnecessary complexity, just the core features you need to make research more efficient. It’s a personal project driven by my own experience with academic work, and I’m excited to keep improving it.

Would love to hear your thoughts; what works, what doesn’t, and what you’d like to see next!

Cheers, 
Carolina

meta.parent_description: Abstractify is a Chrome extension for academics. Ask questions, extract citations, and organize insights instantly. It also detects biases, visualises topic trends, and composes interactive citation networks, making research faster and more intuitive.

standardized: The founder of Abstractify, Carolina, is enthusiastic about introducing her Chrome extension, which aims to revolutionize academic research by providing a faster, clearer, and more structured approach. She highlights that existing research tools often fall short, being either too complex or too generic, and that AI-powered assistants can misinterpret academic content, leading to frustration when managing citations, summaries, and deep analysis across multiple tools. In contrast, Abstractify brings all these functions together in one place, right in the browser, making it a game-changer for academics. By being tailored specifically for academia, Abstractify offers task-specific configurations that provide more nuanced and relevant insights, addressing common research challenges such as visualizing topic and citation trends, mapping connected papers, and crafting deep research reports. The extension's ability to work directly in the browser, analyze content in real-time, and handle long and complex research papers without token limits, demonstrates its potential to significantly enhance research efficiency. Furthermore, the integration with academic databases and the promise of future personalization features, which will adapt to the user's field and interests, suggest that Abstractify is poised to become an indispensable tool for academics, streamlining their research process and surfacing the most relevant insights for their work. Overall, Carolina's passion for Abstractify is evident, and her commitment to continually improving the product, driven by her own experience with academic work, underscores her dedication to making research more efficient and intuitive.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I built Valid Spark because I was tired of seeing startups waste time and resources building things nobody wants. After talking with dozens of founders, I realized most were guessing about their market fit rather than validating with real data.

Valid Spark scans Reddit and Quora conversations to find actual customer pain points and validate business ideas with evidence, not hunches. 

The tool analyzes thousands of discussions to:
✅ Identify the most common user problems
✅ Assess market difficulty and competition
✅ Spot gaps that existing solutions miss
✅ Generate comprehensive and organized validation reports

This is my first major product launch, and I'm excited to get your honest feedback! What platforms would you like to see added? What validation metrics would be most valuable for your projects?

I'm actively developing new features and would love to know what would make this most useful for the Product Hunt community.

Thanks for checking out Valid Spark! 🚀

text:
Frustrated by Generic AI Content? So was I.


Hey everyone! I'm thrilled to finally share purposewrite with you all.

As someone who runs a content production company, I was getting increasingly frustrated by the flood of generic AI content out there. You know, the kind that adds no real value to the reader or the poster. I wanted something different—something that helps you come up with genuinely good content ideas and guides you to write in a strategic way that brings true value to your audience. That's how purposewrite was born.


Why purposewrite?

I wanted a tool that doesn't just churn out text but actually helps you think. purposewrite is your intelligent writing companion. It guides you through the strategic questions that turn good writing into great content. Whether you're building your personal brand or writing for a corporate one, purposewrite ensures every piece you write hits the mark.


Key Features You'll Love

  • Strategic Guidance: Helps you generate fresh content ideas that resonate with your audience.

  • Brand Voice Alignment: Ensures every piece aligns with your unique brand voice.

  • Custom Templates: Create templates for regular tasks and build brand voice guides.

  • AI-Driven Insights: Analyze successful content for insights and maintain consistent quality.



Exciting Times Ahead


I'm genuinely excited about what purposewrite can do for content creators like you. It's not just about writing; it's about writing with purpose. So, dive in, explore, and let me know what you think.


Thanks for being part of this journey. Let's make content creation smarter and more meaningful together! 😊 



Let's Build This Together


purposewrite is just getting started. We're planning to add more Guides (the mini apps inside purposewrite) and new features. And here's where you come in—I’d love to hear your thoughts, questions, or suggestions. 


What Guides or features would you like to see? Your feedback will help shape the future of purposewrite.

text:
👋 Hey Product Hunt Fam!

I’m Gaurav — co-founder of Infographics.so, and today I’m super excited to launch our AI-powered infographic maker with this amazing community.


🧠 Why we built Infographics.so

As a growth marketer and founder working across multiple startups, I constantly found myself needing to turn complex information into simple, shareable visuals. But every time I opened a design tool, I either:

  • spent hours tweaking layouts manually, or

  • gave up and used a bland template that didn’t quite fit the story.

So… we decided to fix that.


🎯 Introducing Infographics AI
The fastest way to turn your raw ideas into clean, professional infographics — without ever opening a design file or spending hours editing a pre-defined template.


Unlike other tools that rely heavily on rigid templates, Infographics.so understands your content and suggests the best-suited visual for it — fully customizable to your brand.

You can tweak layouts, icons, fonts, and colors, and even build your own custom design styles — all without starting from scratch.


And yes — it’s fully mobile optimized so you can create, edit, and share your infographics on the go.


✨ Key Highlights:

  • 🧠 From Text to Visual in Seconds – Paste your content and let our AI suggest a beautifully structured layout instantly.

  • 🎨 Custom Design Freedom – Not stuck with fixed templates. Build your unique visual style through our flexible canvas editor.

  • 📦 Export in SVG & PNG – High-quality exports for LinkedIn, X, decks, reports, blogs — wherever your audience is.

  • 🧩 Chrome Extension + Plugins (Coming Soon) – Turn anything you find online into an infographic without leaving your browser. More plugins for tools like Notion, Google Docs, and others coming soon!

👥 Who is it for?

  • Marketers creating scroll-stopping carousels

  • Founders designing pitch decks & product explainers

  • Educators simplifying complex concepts visually

  • Writers & bloggers breaking the text wall with strong visuals

🙏 Your feedback means the world
We’re building this in public — and would love to hear from you: → What types of visuals do you create most often?
→ Where do you struggle the most when designing?
→ What would make your workflow smoother and faster?

Drop your thoughts in the comments or DM me — we’re listening closely and shaping our roadmap with the community.

Thanks a ton for checking out Infographics.so — I truly hope it helps you create better, faster, and more impactful content 🚀


With love ❤️,
Gaurav
Co-founder, Web to Figma, Shoutout, LetzDM… now building Infographics.so for all the storytellers out there.

text:
Hey, Product Hunt!


I'm pumped to launch Marketplace for Claude today! There’s been a lot of excitement surrounding MCPs recently, along with several notable launches. Despite all the progress and collaboration, MCPs still primarily cater to geeks and engineers. Regular, non-technical users cannot handle the complexity of discovering, installing, and managing a single MCP server.


As a heavy user of AI and a big fan of agentic coding tools like Cline, Cursor, and WindSurf, I believe that everyday users (typical information workers) should have the same capabilities but with regular LLM apps like Claude acting as their agents and their everyday apps serving as tools.


Eliminating all the complexity and developing a secure, effortless solution for connecting Claude to various productivity apps took some time, but here it is. Meet WayStation and Marketplace for Claude powered by it!


I've seen businesses struggle to unlock AI’s full potential—stuck in walled gardens, facing hard-to-use integrations, and dealing with vendor lock-in. I created WayStation to solve this: a no-code hub that seamlessly links powerful AI (ChatGPT, Claude) to your daily productivity apps, making automation simple, secure, and truly accessible.


I'd love to hear your thoughts, feedback, or any questions—I'll be here all day!


Let's make AI work for everyone! 🚀

text:
MappingSpace revolutionizes ALM by integrating AI-driven agility, precision, and cost efficiency, particularly in automotive, semiconductor, and robotics industries. It replaces static tools like Polarion with a dynamic mind-mapping interface for visualizing requirement interdependencies, enabling real-time collaboration.


AI validates requirements, resolves ambiguities, and auto-generates test cases/architecture diagrams, boosting test coverage from 67% to 92%. Its NLP-powered traceability matrix dynamically aligns requirements with test scripts, reducing ASPICE review cycles by 80% despite frequent changes.


The platform enables granular workflow customization, automated triggers for task assignments/baseline locks, and coverage detection to ensure ASPICE compliance without manual intervention. Multi-dimensional dashboards visualize metrics (bug severity, task completion) and support root-cause analysis via node-specific filters, while state duration reports benchmark timelines for process optimization. AI tools include a Smart Compliance Assistant for audit-ready documentation, knowledge graphs to reduce redundancy by 60% via reusable requirements, and self-healing traceability for auto-updated test mappings.


Built for scalability, its cloud-native architecture handles large datasets with minimal latency, integrates with Feishu/DingTalk for real-time collaboration, and disrupts costs via perpetual free licenses for strategic industries.


By addressing legacy ALM limitations—rigid workflows, poor traceability, high costs—MappingSpace empowers ASPICE compliance, accelerates software-defined innovation, and optimizes resource allocation, positioning it as a strategic enabler for digital transformation.

text:
Meetings and calls are a vital part of my everyday journey. On average, I have around 2-6 calls per day. Alongside that, I take up other tasks and meet a lot of people. And sometimes, my brain just can’t handle it all together - it explodes, giving me a headache.

To keep track of meeting notes and activities that need my future attention, I started using Google Keep. At some point, it felt overwhelming, so I switched to Notion. But I hit my breakpoint when I had too much to sift through while searching for something important, and Notion’s pricing plans didn’t help either.

𝗦𝗼, 𝗜 𝗳𝗶𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝘁 𝗺𝘆 𝗦𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗱 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻.

A place where I can store notes and organize them exactly the way I want. And even better - I can chat with my notes to clear my queries.

It follows a Master - Daughter - Entry format: 

Let’s say you're a Startup Founder using this tool. You can create Master Threads as major categories for your activities - like Sales & Partnerships, Marketing Team, User Feedback & Insights, etc.

Under each Master Thread, you can create Daughter Threads to categorize information further. For example, under User Feedback & Insights, I have subcategories like Customizable Dashboard Requested, Early User Feedback, and more.

Within each Daughter Thread, I add entries. For instance, under the user feedback category "Request for Mobile App," I log all feedback related to that request.

This architecture not only helps me stay organized but also allows me to chat with my notes using AI. Before a call, I just hit the ‘Get Synopsis’ button, and it gives me a summary of all relevant entries.

Until last week, in the application, I was using GPT-3.5 Turbo and Gemini 2.0 for personal AI purposes. And then, I decided to turn this tool into something everyone can use - allowing users to enter their Gemini API Key and unlock AI features.

meta.parent_description: Second Brain is a powerful knowledge management system that helps you organize, track, and analyze your conversations and meetings with AI-powered insights.

standardized: The user's experience with Second Brain has been a game-changer in managing their overwhelming schedule of meetings and calls, which can range from 2 to 6 per day, alongside other tasks and interactions. They had previously struggled to keep track of meeting notes and future activities using Google Keep and Notion, finding the latter's pricing plans and information overload to be major drawbacks. In contrast, Second Brain has provided a highly customizable and organized system, allowing them to categorize information into Master Threads, Daughter Threads, and entries, which has been instrumental in staying on top of their workload. The ability to chat with their notes using AI has been particularly valuable, enabling them to quickly summarize relevant information before calls, and the recent integration of Gemini API has further enhanced the AI features, making it an indispensable tool for the user. Overall, the user's sentiment towards Second Brain is extremely positive, highlighting its effectiveness in addressing their productivity and organization needs, and demonstrating the potential for the product to make a significant impact in the market.

text:
This is such a relatable problem, and I love how you’ve approached it. The Master–Daughter–Entry structure feels like a smart way to manage context without things getting buried, which happens way too easily in tools like Notion.

The ability to chat with your notes and get a quick synopsis before a call is a game changer, especially for people juggling multiple teams or projects each day. Also really cool that you're giving users the option to plug in their own API keys for Gemini.


Congrats on turning something personal into a product others can benefit from. Wishing you lots of traction and great feedback ahead!

text:
CandidateX streamlines hiring by analyzing resumes and candidate's background against job descriptions using AI. It evaluates candidate qualifications beyond keywords, considering experience, skills, education, and fit. When submitted, the system examines resumes against requirements and delivers immediate "approved" or "declined" decisions with reasoning. The app integrates with "RecruitCRM", automatically updating candidate hiring stages. Approved candidates move to recommended, while declined candidates are marked rejected—without manual work. Features include human-level AI assessment, automatic status updates, detailed hiring decision explanations, and fast processing within platform constraints. This tool reduces hiring managers' workload by eliminating manual initial screening, allowing focus on pre-qualified candidates who passed AI evaluation.

text: Howdy! 🤠 As far as we're concerned, the whole job market is severely lacking at the moment. Job seekers have to scour job sites that aren't built for their success and compete against thousands of other applicants for a role that they aren't really qualified for or that they aren't really interested in, all for the HR team to not even read their resume or cover letter and eventually just give the role to the first qualified person that sent in an application. Similarly, hiring managers are bombarded with thousands of applications with inefficient tools for filtering and searching for a really good match that will actually join the company and contribute to its success. Recruiters have helped to alleviate this problem for the hiring side, but recruiters are **expensive** and **slow** and nowadays most of what they do can be automated. Savvy is revolutionizing the entire system that jobs are hired for by leveraging the technology that the system has been severely lacking in. Specifically, - Hyper-specialized AI-powered recommendation systems that learn more about you the more you use and chat with Savvy. No more being shown roles you are not qualified for or are not interested in. - Automation of the whole hiring process, from matching to outreach to pitching to screening to calendar management. As a hiring manager, all you need to do is chat with Savvy and wait for final interviews with highly qualified and interested to role in. If this is a problem you can relate to, if you want to directly help revolutionize the recruitment industry, or if you just want to support us in our journey, please leave a comment, upvote, and share this product! We really appreciate it! Feel free to shoot me an email at ben@trysavvy.co if you have any other questions or feedback! I look forward to what's next! 🤠

text:
Comparing LLM models is tricky. Prices shift, models update, and deprecations occur constantly—our spreadsheet solution quickly became unmanageable.

To simplify, we built a straightforward tool which we are making available today to all. It has two components:

1. Interactive Model Explorer Table: Easily filter and search to identify the right models based on cost and capabilities. It has the following data about each model and hosting platform: vendor, hosting platform, model name, description, input price, output price, max context window, max response length, thinking support, text in support, image in support, audio in support, text out support, image out support, audio out support, training cutoff date, last checked date (by us), supported languages


2. LLM Model Recommender AI Chat Agent: Leveraging our experience, it asks targeted questions to recommend models suitable to your use case. We use our data, combined with our decision making process for model suitability and selection.


We know you can download the data in the table; but be aware how dynamic this data is, so use care. In fact, its so dynamic with pricing changes and new models that we suggest use this tool for guidance and narrowing options. We do our best though, and use and maintain it daily.

And we sure would appreciate any feedback or comments you have to make it more useful (there is a "contact us" button on the bottom right of the page), and if you would share it with others you think could benefit.

Troy and Chris

meta.parent_description: Comparing LLM models is hard—so we built an interactive table and AI chat agent to simplify finding the right one. Filter by capabilities, cost, and more, or let our Model Recommender guide you to the perfect match. Built for us, shared with everyone.

standardized: The founders of LLM Model Explorer & Recommender have expressed their own pain points in comparing large language models, highlighting the challenges of constantly shifting prices, model updates, and deprecations, which led to the development of a straightforward tool to simplify this process. They have created a solution that consists of an interactive model explorer table and an LLM model recommender AI chat agent, which provides users with a comprehensive set of data about each model and hosting platform, including cost, capabilities, and supported languages. The founders emphasize the dynamic nature of this data, cautioning users to use the tool for guidance and narrowing options rather than relying solely on the data, and encouraging feedback and sharing to make the tool more useful. This suggests that the product is designed to address a significant pain point in the developer community, and the founders are committed to maintaining and improving the tool to meet the evolving needs of their users. Overall, the tone of the comment is informative, helpful, and collaborative, indicating a strong desire to support the community and provide a valuable resource for developers working with large language models.

text:
Hi everyone!

Sharing OWL from the CAMEL-AI team – an impressive open-source framework for building multi-agent AI systems that collaborate to automate real-world tasks.

Unlike single autonomous agents, OWL focuses on dynamic interaction between multiple specialized agents to tackle complex workflows. This means specialized AI agents can work together dynamically to handle complex processes. It's positioned as a powerful open answer to some of the closed agent systems generating buzz lately.

Key aspects:

🤝 Multi-Agent Collaboration is the core focus, enabling AI agents to work together effectively.
🧰 Over 30 extensive toolkits are included, covering web search, browser automation, multimodal processing, code execution, MCP, and many more.
🤖 Flexible model support allows using various models (GPT-4o, Claude, Qwen, DeepSeek) and local deployment via Ollama, vLLM, etc.
🏆 It ranks #1 among open-source general agent frameworks on the GAIA benchmark, demonstrating strong capabilities.
🌐 A Gradio web interface and easy Docker setup are included for accessibility.
🔓 The codebase is fully open source under the Apache 2.0 license for use and contribution.

Built on the CAMEL-AI framework, OWL offers a powerful and accessible way to start building sophisticated multi-agent applications.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋

I'm Shamil, and this is my first-ever launch on Product Hunt!

As someone who’s been on both sides of the hiring table—job seeker and recruiter—I’ve always felt there’s a smarter, fairer way to handle the hiring process. That’s what inspired me to build vkncy.

I have a big vision for vkncy:
An AI-powered hiring assistant that handles everything — from screening to scheduling the final interview with top candidates.

Today, I’m excited to share the first step toward that vision.

🚀 CV Battle is an AI-driven screening tool where CVs compete in head-to-head "battles" using an Elo-style ranking system ♟️.

Here’s how it works:

  1. Every CV is first analyzed and given an initial score.

  2. Then it’s compared in 1v1 “battles” with randomly selected candidates who already applied.

  3. If it “wins,” it gets an Elo boost. If it loses, the score drops.


This creates a dynamic, constantly evolving ranking of applicants for each job — no manual sorting needed.

Right now, you can try it out for free with 1 job post and see how it works.

Would love to hear your thoughts — on both the product and the vision! 🙏


Find me on Twitter/X if you want to connect 💬

meta.parent_description: vkncy is an AI-powered CV screening tool that ranks applicants using an Elo-style system. Every new CV competes against others in head-to-head battles, dynamically adjusting rankings to surface top candidates automatically.

standardized: The founder of vkncy, Shamil, has expressed enthusiasm and ambition for his product, which aims to revolutionize the hiring process with an AI-powered hiring assistant, and has taken the first step towards this vision with the launch of CV Battle, a screening tool that utilizes an Elo-style ranking system to compare and rank applicants. The tone of the comment suggests that Shamil is passionate about creating a smarter and fairer hiring process, drawing from his personal experience on both sides of the hiring table, and is eager to receive feedback on both the current product and his long-term vision. The fact that CV Battle is being offered for free with one job post indicates that Shamil is confident in the tool's potential and is encouraging users to try it out and provide their thoughts, demonstrating a commitment to continuous improvement and user-centric development. Overall, the sentiment of the comment is one of excitement, optimism, and a desire for collaboration and feedback, highlighting the potential of vkncy to make a positive impact in the hiring and career space.

text:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Vibe Draw, a cool open-source tool (AGPL license) that makes 3D creation feel more intuitive. It basically lets you sketch out ideas in 2D and then uses AI to turn them into 3D models and build entire worlds.

The workflow is really straightforward: you start with a rough sketch, hit an "Improve Drawing" button for the AI to clean it up, and then click "Make 3D." You can build scenes by adding multiple models, tweak them further with more sketches or even text prompts, and finally export the result as a standard .glTF file. The whole process seems designed to be quite fast.

It aims to lower the barrier for 3D creation, focusing more on getting your ideas out there than on complex technical skills. Keep in mind you'll need your own API keys for the underlying AI models (like Claude, Gemini, etc.) to run it locally.

text:
Science Search is your free AI research companion that instantly connects everyday reading and video content to academic knowledge. Whether you're exploring an article, watching YouTube videos, checking facts, or diving deep into research, Science Search helps you discover relevant scientific papers and insights with just one click.

Key Features:
🔍 Instant Access to Science
Select any text while browsing to get AI-curated research from relevant academic papers, powered by Semantic Scholar's vast database of over 200 million publications from leading publishers like arXiv, Springer Nature, Wiley, PubMed, and IEEE.

🎬 Video Transcript Research
Extract valuable knowledge from YouTube videos by selecting specific segments directly on the progress bar. Simply click and drag across any portion of a video to instantly access the transcript content for academic citations and research purposes.

🤖 AI Knowledge Assistant
Ask questions about any topic and get research-backed answers drawn from peer-reviewed academic sources. Science Search analyzes your queries using advanced Machine Learning to deliver the most relevant scientific insights.

📚 Smart Research Management (coming soon)
Build your personal knowledge base by saving papers and insights as you explore, creating an organized collection of scientific discoveries for future reference.

Seamless Accessibility:
• Works instantly on any webpage, PDF, or YouTube video
• Customizable site preferences and domain filters
• Compatible with all chromium-based browsers

Perfect for:
• Casual readers seeking scientific context
• Students verifying information or citing video content
• Researchers streamlining literature reviews
• Anyone curious about the science behind what they read or watch

🌍 Science Search is and will always remain free, counting on collective contributions to ensure curiosity will never be limited by access to knowledge.

Hi everyone,

Hey Product Hunt! 👋
We're thrilled to introduce FinancialInsights - the result of our mission to democratize professional financial analysis.
After years of working in finance, we realized that the tools and data that drive Wall Street decisions are locked behind expensive paywalls. We set out to change that. FinancialInsights brings together cutting-edge AI with premium financial data sources to deliver institutional-quality analysis without the institutional price tag.
What makes us different is our focus on actionable insights - we don't just provide data or answer questions, we deliver the same depth of analysis that professional investors use to make decisions.
We've built an extensive toolkit with features like:

Real-time financial news analysis
SEC filing data extraction and interpretation
Market sentiment quantification across news and social media
Advanced financial metric calculations
Interactive visualizations of complex data

We're particularly proud of our dual-mode approach - use the Chat mode for quick questions or the Research mode for comprehensive reports that would typically take analysts hours to compile.
We'd love to hear what you think! What financial data tools would you like to see added next? Any specific markets or asset classes you'd want deeper coverage on?
Thanks for checking us out. We're actively working on new features and would appreciate your feedback as we continue to develop!
