Sharing Ai2 Paper Finder, a new LLM-powered tool from the Allen Institute for AI (Ai2) for academic literature search. What's interesting is its approach: it tries to mimic how a human researcher actually finds papers, going beyond simple keyword matching.

Instead of just returning results, Paper Finder:

  1. Analyzes your natural language query.

  2. Plans a search strategy.

  3. Iteratively Searches: Runs queries, follows citations, evaluates results.

  4. Refines: Uses findings to run follow-up queries.

  5. Summarizes: Presents relevant papers with explanations of why they match your specific need.

The goal is to surface those hard-to-find, niche papers that basic search often misses, especially when you have a complex research question. It uses LLMs throughout the process for analysis, planning, and judging relevance.  

See what insightful stuff you can find with Ai2 Paper Finder!

text:
Hi there! 👋

A few weeks ago, I was randomly scrolling on Reddit when I saw a post about podcast preparation. Podcast hosts were saying they spend hours preparing. Some even 4 hours, for just a 10-minute episode. Wild! 😲

After some market research and talking to podcast hosts, I figured out that there's no app out there helping them save this effort. One podcast host said that she managed to reduce 4 hours to 30 minutes with ChatGPT. Better! 😐

But what if I tell you that you can get a detailed guest report with smart question suggestions in 3 minutes?

  • 30 minutes ➜ 3 minutes = -90% 🤯

  • 240 minutes ➜ 3 minutes = -99% 🤯🤯🤯

Now, imagine using these time savings for making more episodes. You could easily double the number of episodes produced annually! Don't believe my words? Use the savings calculator I built.


With PodcastPrepper you can do exactly that! All you have to do is pick your next guest with a little bit of context (e.g., their job title and location) and let PodcastPrepper handle the research so you can focus on creating engaging episodes!


During beta, reports are delivered within 24 hours into your email inbox, but they're actually generated in just 3 minutes! In the future, instant delivery will be available. Still, even with 24-hour delivery, how much effort do you need to put in? Zero! 👌


You might ask, what exactly do I get in each report? Each report covers the following areas:

  • Guest's background

  • Guest's key interests

  • Guest's career milestones

  • Guest's achievements

  • Guest's current projects

  • Guest's notable contributions

  • Guest's online presence

  • Guest's controversies

  • Smart question suggestions for the guest

Want to add something else to the list? Shoot me a DM! ✉️


Want to give it a try? Shoot me a DM! ✉️ I don't have a free plan listed on the website, but we'll figure something out. 🙂


Feel free to drop a question or feedback in the comment below. 👇


Thanks for the support. ❤️

Best,
Rok

text:
Hey Product Hunt fam! 
I’m the founder of Master Growbot, an AI sidekick crafted to make cannabis growing simpler and more rewarding. My journey started with Grownetics, the first cannabis AI company, where I led my team to millions in sales through grit, late nights, and a passion for breaking new ground. Then came a curveball: I was forced to resign by greedy VCs and a jealous co-founder who incorrectly thought they could succeed without my leadership. Their misjudgment lit a fire in me. I turned that energy into creating Master Growbot, a tool that’s already showing them up by empowering growers in ways they never imagined.

Why does this matter to you?
Picture this: a master grower right in your pocket, dishing out real-time, spot-on advice. That’s Master Growbot. With cutting-edge AI, it catches plant problems early, offers tailored tips, and helps you level up your growing game—all while making it fun and stress-free. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out, it’s your trusty companion for growing smarter and with confidence.

I get it—I’ve been there. I’ve fumbled through the ups and downs of growing, so I built Master Growbot to solve those headaches. And here’s the kicker: you can try it free until April 20, 2025. No catch, just pure support to help you thrive. Let’s shake up cannabis growing together! Got a question or a growing challenge? Drop it in the comments, and let’s tackle it as a community!

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 🚀

I built aicodeprep to make working with AI coding assistants way smoother. Instead of copy-pasting code file by file, this tool auto-selects relevant files, lets you tweak the list, and copies everything in one click—saving time and reducing token waste and improves accuracy.

💡 Why use it?
✅ Right-click in Windows/Mac to instantly gather code whenever you need to ask an AI about your project
✅ Auto-skips unnecessary files (git, node_modules, minified CSS, etc.)
✅ Saves you money by reducing token usage in AI chats
✅ Works with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and any other AI chat interface

We all use tools that try to automatically give the AI context but sometimes, they just don't work that well and you have to do it yourself to get better quality output. I built this for myself, and the "smart" auto-checkbox'ing of likely needed code files is to save time. Lots of other tools do a similar thing but all of them are command line only, and I love GUIs.

Would love your feedback! Let me know if you have any feature ideas or questions. 🚀🔥

Intuitive Interface: The platform boasts a clean and straightforward design, ensuring users of all ages and technical backgrounds can navigate and utilize the calculators with ease.​

Diverse Calculator Range: From determining your exact age with the Age Calculator to planning your finances using the Mortgage and Auto Loan Calculators, Online Calculator Plus covers a broad spectrum of calculation needs. Health-conscious users can benefit from the BMI Calculator, while webmasters can assess their site's performance using the Website SEO Calculator. ​

Accuracy and Speed: Leveraging advanced algorithms, the platform ensures that all calculations are both precise and delivered promptly, enhancing user productivity.​

Accessibility: No downloads or installations are required. Users can access all tools directly through the website, making it convenient for on-the-go calculations across various devices.​

Mobile-Friendly Design: The responsive design ensures optimal functionality and display on desktops, tablets, and smartphones, providing a seamless experience regardless of the device used.​

Online Calculator Plus is committed to simplifying complex computations, making it an invaluable resource for anyone seeking reliable and efficient online calculation tools.

text:
In its current version, the SCDA Facility Allocator takes into consideration the following user input:
- spatial market forecast, i.e. market demand by address (location, e.g. neighbourhood or city)
- candidate facilitiy list with investment need and operating expenses (rent), as well as capacity constraints
- average consumer tolerance with regards to distance to service facilitator

The SCDA Facility Allocator visualizes spatial demand distribution using maps and heatmaps, displaying results int he browser. Based on the available budget for facilitiy investments and operating expenses, the facility allocator furthermore decides on which facilities should be used - maximizing potential revenue subject to budgetary constraints.

Future version updates and upgrades are planned, including the following features:
- multi-tier networks, with supplier, distribution, and sales store facilities
- transport flow optimization
- deployment in the cloud

Currently, the app is deployable on MS Windows.

meta.parent_description: The SCDA Facility Allocator allows for optimal sales store and service facility allocation, taking into consideration spatial distribution of market demand, CAPEX and OPEX, and market reach by service facilitiy. Deployable on MS Windows.

standardized: The user's comment suggests that the SCDA Facility Allocator is a robust tool that currently considers multiple key factors, including spatial market forecast, facility investment needs, operating expenses, and consumer tolerance for distance to service facilitators, to optimize facility allocation and maximize potential revenue within budgetary constraints. The fact that it visualizes spatial demand distribution using maps and heatmaps, and decides on facility usage based on available budget, indicates a high level of functionality and user-friendliness. However, the user also hints at the potential for further growth and development, with planned updates and upgrades that will introduce features such as multi-tier networks, transport flow optimization, and cloud deployment, which will likely enhance the product's capabilities and appeal to a wider range of users. Overall, the tone of the comment implies a sense of excitement and anticipation for the product's future development, while also acknowledging its current strengths and value proposition as a powerful tool for optimal facility allocation, leveraging artificial intelligence to drive business decisions.

text:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Project G-Assist from NVIDIA, an experimental AI assistant that runs locally on your GeForce RTX PC! Think of it as a co-pilot specifically for managing and optimizing your system, especially for gaming.

With simple voice or text commands, G-Assist can:

⚙️ Optimize System: Adjust performance and power settings.
🎮 Tweak Game Settings: Get help finding the best settings for your games.
📊 Monitor Performance: Chart FPS, latency, temps, and other stats in real-time.

💡 Control Peripherals: Change lighting on supported Logitech, Corsair, MSI, and Nanoleaf devices.  
❓ Answer PC Questions: Get info about your hardware or NVIDIA software.

It uses a Llama-based SLM (8B parameters) running on your own GPU, making it responsive, free, and offline-capable. It's not meant to be a general chatbot like ChatGPT, but focused specifically on PC control and info.

What's particularly interesting is the plugin architecture. NVIDIA has released tools on GitHub for the community to build and share new functionalities for G-Assist (using Python or C++). They even provide a ChatGPT-powered "Plugin Builder" to help create them!  

It's available now as an experimental feature via the NVIDIA App (initially for desktop RTX GPUs).

meta.parent_description: Project G-Assist is an AI assistant powered by your GeForce RTX PC that helps you tune and optimize your system.

standardized: The user's enthusiasm for Project G-Assist is palpable, as they excitedly share the capabilities of this experimental AI assistant from NVIDIA, which leverages the power of GeForce RTX PCs to optimize system performance, particularly for gaming. The user highlights the assistant's ability to adjust performance and power settings, tweak game settings, and monitor performance in real-time, all through simple voice or text commands, showcasing the product's potential to enhance the gaming experience. Furthermore, the user notes the assistant's offline capability, responsiveness, and freedom from costs, thanks to its Llama-based SLM running on the user's own GPU, which suggests a high level of autonomy and reliability. The user also expresses interest in the plugin architecture, which allows the community to build and share new functionalities using Python or C++, and the provision of a ChatGPT-powered Plugin Builder, indicating a strong potential for community engagement and customization. Overall, the user's tone suggests that Project G-Assist has the potential to revolutionize the way users interact with and optimize their PCs, especially for gaming, and that its experimental release via the NVIDIA App is an exciting development worth exploring.

text:
Hi everyone!

Sharing TxGemma, a new family of open models from Google DeepMind, built on Gemma 2 and specifically designed to accelerate therapeutics development. This aims to tackle the slow, expensive drug discovery process using specialized AI.  

TxGemma comes in two flavors and multiple sizes (2B, 9B, 27B):

  1. TxGemma-Predic focuses on tasks like predicting molecule properties (toxicity, binding affinity, etc.) based on Therapeutic Data Commons benchmarks. The 27B version shows impressive performance, rivaling specialized models.

  2. TxGemma-Chat, on the other hand, adds conversational abilities, allowing you to ask why it made a prediction or discuss complex therapeutic data.  

Key aspects:

💊 Therapeutics Focus: Tailored for drug discovery and related biological tasks.
🧬 Gemma 2 Base: Leverages the efficient Gemma 2 architecture.
🧪 Fine-Tunable: Includes a Colab notebook showing how to adapt it to specific therapeutic data or tasks.

🤖 Agent Ready: Can be integrated as a tool within larger AI agent systems (demonstrated with Agentic-Tx).  
⚖️ Open Weights (Gemma License): Available on Hugging Face and Vertex AI, allowing broad research and development (check license terms).  

This will be a powerful and accessible toolkit for researchers and developers in biotech, pharma, and computational biology.

meta.parent_description: TxGemma is the open model based on Google's Gemma 2, specialized for therapeutics development. Predict molecule properties, analyze data, or chat about results. Available on HF & Vertex AI.

text:
Hello Product Hunt! 👋 Hope everyone is feeling great today. I’m excited to share something personal, Teamsaver.co.

Over the years, I’ve realized something simple. Teams don’t thrive because of better dashboards or tighter KPIs. They thrive when people feel seen, appreciated, and recognized for their efforts.

That’s the heart of Teamsaver.

It helps managers collect weekly updates from their team and turn them into public appreciation. These moments don’t just lift spirits, they live on in the team member’s profile and follow them through their career.

It’s amazing what a little appreciation in public can do. Happiness goes up. Trust builds.
And somewhere along the way, productivity finds its own rhythm.

We built Teamsaver to be light, joyful, and honest. A space where recognition isn’t a checkbox, but a culture that flows week by week.

If you manage a team, I hope you’ll give it a try. Appreciate one person this week and see what it creates.

I’d love to hear your thoughts. And if you use it today, I hope it makes someone’s day a little brighter. 🟡

meta.parent_description: A shared space to appreciate your team for their hard work. Recognize achievements—big or small—as team members share updates, receive public appreciation, and earn trait-based badges they can carry throughout their careers.

By positioning Teamsaver as a platform that facilitates public appreciation and recognition, the founder highlights the product's potential to boost team morale, trust, and productivity, creating a positive and uplifting work culture. The tone of the comment suggests that the founder is passionate about the impact that genuine recognition can have on individuals and teams, and is eager to share this vision with others, inviting managers to try out Teamsaver and experience the benefits of a culture of appreciation firsthand. Overall, the comment conveys a sense of enthusiasm and optimism about the potential of Teamsaver to make a meaningful difference in the way teams work and interact, and to bring a sense of joy and fulfillment to the workplace.

text:
🚀 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m excited to share TrustedBy.ai with you — a curated directory of AI tools that are actually used and trusted by professionals (mostly at enterprises), not just random listings from the latest AI hype cycle.

We built TrustedBy because we were constantly overwhelmed by endless AI directories filled with 1,000s of tools — most of which are either half-baked, abandoned, or irrelevant for real business needs. We realized: people don’t need more tools — they need the right tools.

So at TrustedBy.ai, we do the vetting for you. Every tool we list is:

✅ Used by real professionals in fields like HR, sales, marketing, compliance, law, and engineering
✅ Backed by strong teams or top-tier VC firms & raised Series A or B round (with real business/enterprise customers)
✅ Categorized by actual business use cases — no fluff
✅ Founded in recent years but not the legacy solutions that have added AI features

If you’re tired of wasting time digging through noise, TrustedBy helps you cut straight to what’s working in the real world.

We’d love your thoughts, feedback, and suggestions — and if you’ve used a great AI tool in your workflow, let us know. We’re always on the lookout to expand the directory with high-signal picks.

Thanks for checking it out 🙌
— TrustedBy team

The fact that TrustedBy.ai is focused on listing only AI tools that are actually used and trusted by professionals, and are backed by strong teams or top-tier VC firms, implies that the product is positioned as a reliable and efficient solution for businesses looking to leverage AI to improve their operations. text:
Hey everyone! I’m Lokesh, one of the makers of Neurally 👋

We built Neurally because we were tired of generic chatbots that give vague answers or say “I don’t know” way too often. Businesses have so much valuable content - websites, documents, product pages, videos - but most chatbots just ignore it.

With Neurally, we wanted to create an AI assistant that actually understands your business. You upload your content, and within minutes, you’ve got a chatbot that can answer real questions with real context. No prompt engineering, no technical setup.

We’re currently live with:
	•	Website widget
	•	WhatsApp AI chat integration
	•	Support for PDFs, sitemaps, text, and more
	•	Full customization of chatbot UI
	•	Live chatbot preview as you build

Would love for you to check it out, and if you have feedback, feature requests, or even harsh truths - I’m here for it all.

Thanks for stopping by!

Lokesh
Founder, Neurally

meta.parent_description: Neurally transforms your content into a product-aware AI assistant. Just plug in your data, deploy on your site or WhatsApp in minutes.

text:
Hi folks, Alex here! I'm an alum of the Stanford AI Lab and Y Combinator, and now the CEO of TalkToSales.

Today, I’m proud to announce the launch of TalkToSales, which pioneers a new way people can interact with computers.

TalkToSales adds AI assistants to websites: they can answer visitors' questions, give them live tours of the website or app, and even help them book follow-up calls and buy things right in the conversation.

Unlike traditional websites, which are the same for everyone who visits them, the TalkToSales assistant customizes the conversation and content shown to every visitor, whether the content is dynamic slides, a website/app tour, or both.

TalkToSales also lets the people behind a website offer to "drop in" in place of the AI assistant and talk with visitors directly, when visitors accept. Shopkeepers in physical stores have always been able to talk to customers as they browse, but it hasn't been possible to do this on the web until now. We think this could be quite useful for companies that do business online to have more personal engagement with web visitors.

We think TalkToSales assistants can be helpful for a number of use cases:

Software sales: the website itself can become the first sales call, answering visitors' questions, qualifying their good fit and intent, and booking follow-up calls for good leads.

Software onboarding and support: Imagine a Clippy that actually worked, talking to you over voice and actually taking actions in a web app for you as you ask it for how to do things.

E-commerce: Imagine having a personal shopper on e.g. the Home Depot website, where a virtual man in an orange apron could show you different dishwasher models and help you pick between them.

Real estate: Imagine going to an apartment building's website and having a virtual real estate agent answer your questions, give you virtual tours of apartments, and book you for a real-world tour.

(Any other ideas? We're all ears!)

We think TalkToSales assistants can also be very helpful from an analytics point of view - instead of just seeing who visits your page and for how long, imagine being able to see which questions people have, what objections prevent them from engaging deeper, etc. TalkToSales logs transcripts of conversations and the AI can surface patterns from those conversations from you.

Please try it out and let us know what you think! And if you know anyone else who'd be interested in this, I'd appreciate you sharing it with them.

meta.parent_description: TalkToSales puts an AI assistant on your website that talks to users about your offerings, gives them live tours of your website or app, and shows dynamic content as it becomes relevant. It also qualifies visitors as leads and books conversions as appropriate.

standardized: The founder of TalkToSales, Alex, is extremely enthusiastic about the launch of their product, which they believe revolutionizes the way people interact with websites by introducing AI-powered assistants that can engage with visitors in a highly personalized manner. According to Alex, TalkToSales has the potential to transform various industries, including software sales, e-commerce, and real estate, by providing a more human-like experience for website visitors, allowing them to ask questions, receive live tours, and even book follow-up calls or make purchases directly through the conversation. The founder is particularly excited about the ability for human representatives to "drop in" and take over the conversation from the AI assistant, enabling a level of personal engagement that was previously impossible on the web. Additionally, Alex highlights the analytics benefits of TalkToSales, which can provide valuable insights into visitor behavior, questions, and objections, allowing businesses to better understand their audience and optimize their sales and marketing strategies. Overall, the tone of the comment suggests that the founder is confident in the potential of TalkToSales to disrupt traditional website interactions and is eager to receive feedback and share the product with others.

text:
Hey, Product Hunt! I'm Saurav, creator of BrowserAI. We built this open-source SDK to democratize access to powerful AI capabilities by allowing developers to run LLMs directly in the browser with just 3 lines of code.

After seeing teams struggle with complex backend infrastructure just to implement basic AI features, we decided to create a solution that eliminates these barriers. BrowserAI handles everything from model loading to optimization while maintaining privacy since everything runs locally in the user's browser.

I'd love to hear your feedback and answer any questions about our implementation approach or future roadmap. Thanks for checking us out!

meta.parent_description: BrowserAI is an open-source JavaScript SDK that lets developers run powerful local LLMs like Llama, DeepSeek-Distill, and Kokoro directly in the browser with minimal code. It eliminates the need for complex backends while providing privacy.

standardized: The creator of BrowserAI, Saurav, expresses enthusiasm and a sense of problem-solving with the launch of this open-source SDK, which aims to make powerful AI capabilities more accessible to developers by allowing them to run large language models directly in the browser with minimal coding required. The motivation behind BrowserAI stems from the frustration of seeing development teams struggle with intricate backend infrastructure just to implement basic AI features, highlighting a significant pain point in the industry that this product seeks to address. By handling model loading to optimization and maintaining user privacy by running everything locally in the browser, BrowserAI presents itself as a streamlined solution that could potentially democratize access to AI technology, making it easier for developers to integrate AI into their projects without the need for complex backend setups. The tone suggests a sense of pride in the product's ability to simplify AI integration while prioritizing user privacy, and Saurav's invitation for feedback indicates a willingness to engage with the community and further refine the product based on user input and insights. Overall, BrowserAI appears to be positioned as a groundbreaking tool that could significantly lower the barriers to entry for developers looking to leverage AI in their applications, and its open-source nature, coupled with the ease of use, could make it an attractive solution for a wide range of developers and projects.

text:
Hey everyone, I don't expect this to get much engagement here. But I have to share Faye with the few who care about big corporations commoditising women's health.

No woman should have to break the bank just to monitor her menstrual cycle. And I'm tired of seeing period-tracking apps charge premiums for something as natural and as basic as this.

✨ Meet Faye - The privacy-first period tracker that actually understands you.

While others sell your data, Faye focuses on giving you the fastest most seamless cycle tracking experience for FREE. You can install Faye on your mobile device and use the app even when offline.

- Snappy One-Tap Logging: Log periods faster than sending a text (seriously, try it!)
- Real-time Predictions: Everything in the app happens offline. Every action and every result is instant.
- Symptom Trends: Spot trends in moods, cramps, cravings with Faye's smart analysis.
- Cycle Science: Understand follicular phases, ovulation windows, and more in plain English
- Your Rules: From Light mode to dark mode to discreet mode, you can customize everything
- AI analysis: Get optional scarily accurate AI analysis that adapt to YOUR unique patterns
- Password lock: Optional password lock to prevent unauthorised access
- Stealth Features: Use discreet mode to completely change the app UI and hide sensitive data behind a pseudo project management app
- Stress-Free Backups: One-tap JSON exports that even your grandma could use
- Live Cycle Syncing: Watch predictions update as you log in in real time.
- All data is stored on your device. Nothing on the server.

Faye is FREE. Not "free-to-start" - No hidden paywalls, NO ADS, no subscription nagging, no "premium features" bait-and-switch. Just exceptional privacy-first cycle tracking.

I built this primarily for my wife. I hope you can all benefit, too.

meta.parent_description: Track your menstrual cycle with complete privacy using Faye, the #1 FREE offline-first period tracker. Get accurate cycle predictions, symptom tracking, and detailed menstrual health insights for free. No hidden paywalls, NO ADS, no subscription nagging.

standardized: The user who created Faye, a free privacy-first period tracker, is driven by a strong sense of social responsibility and a desire to challenge the status quo of period-tracking apps that charge premiums for basic services, thereby making menstrual health monitoring inaccessible to many women. They express frustration with big corporations commodifying women's health and emphasize the importance of providing a fundamental service like period tracking without exploiting users' data or charging exorbitant fees. The creator's passion for Faye stems from a personal connection, having built the app primarily for their wife, and they hope that others can benefit from it as well. The app's features, such as snappy one-tap logging, real-time predictions, and symptom trends, demonstrate a commitment to providing a seamless and user-centric experience, while its focus on privacy, with all data stored locally on the device and no ads or hidden paywalls, sets it apart from other period-tracking apps. Overall, Faye's creator is motivated by a sense of empathy and a desire to empower women to take control of their menstrual health without sacrificing their privacy or financial well-being.

text:
👋 Hi Product Hunt!
I'm Zeke, founder of Harmonized, and after 7 months of hard work, I’m thrilled to introduce Harmonized + Particle!

Why I Built Harmonized
As someone with dyslexia, I’ve always struggled with writing and staying organized due to cluttered UI/UX and losing my ideas. During my first semester of college, I decided to build my own AI-powered doc editor, and after months of development and incredible feedback, I knew I had to share it.

✨ What is Harmonized?
Harmonized is an AI-powered document editor that helps you write, refine, and organize your work effortlessly:

✅ Generate content directly in your doc with Particle AI
✅ Rewrite paragraphs with AI-powered editing
✅ Summarize & understand your documents instantly
✅ Publish docs to the web in one click
✅ Freemium – No credit card required

🔥 What's Next For Harmonized?
💻 Multi-AI Integration (o1, GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini, Claude 3.5/3.7 Sonnet)
💻 Monetization for published docs – let users earn from their content
💻 Collaborative Documents for Users & Teams
💻 Eon – AI-powered calendar with Google & iOS Calendar integrations
💻 Smooth – AI task manager integrated with Eon
💻 And much more...

I can’t wait to see what you create with Harmonized!

Feel free to reach out on X and give me your thoughts @ZekeVoigt

text:
​Hey makers!

I present to you AICurriculums. A platform that aims to facilitate learning new things.

Embarking on a new learning journey can be daunting, especially with generic, one-size-fits-all approaches. AICurriculums harnesses the power of LLMs to craft personalized learning plans tailored to your unique goals, skill level, and schedule. Whether you're aiming to master the guitar, delve into coding, or explore any new skill, our intuitive platform provides structured guidance to keep you motivated and on track.

- Learn smarter, not harder – AI creates a curriculum based on your goals and schedule.
- No more guesswork – Get a step-by-step plan so you always know what to do next.
- Stay on track – Set goals, follow a structured path, and actually make progress.
- Track your growth – Keep up the momentum with streaks and progress tracking.
- Adapts as you improve – Your curriculum evolves with you, so you're always challenged.
- Learn anything – From coding to languages to business, pick a skill and get a plan.

Try it for free! Everyone starts with 25 free credits to create any learning plan they want.

I had made this tool a while back (back during the GPT 3.5 days), then started using it a lot for myself, especially for learning new languages! I then thought this could be helpful for others trying to learn new things, so here we are, the first app I launch commercially.

Kindly leave me suggestions, critiques, anything else you think might me pertinent.

Thank you!

text:
Excited to introduce Kataba on Product Hunt!

Kataba is a small project I’ve humbly built, inspired by my own experiences and personal reflections. The name ‘Kataba’ (كَتَبَ) comes from the Arabic root meaning ‘to write,’ symbolizing the act of reflection and recording one’s thoughts. Slowly, many of us have turned to AI into personal interactions, I wanted to create a space that’s not only private but also aligned with our Deen. Whether reflecting on sabr, tawakkul, or seeking tazkiyah, Kataba offers a compassionate and faith-conscious space for self-reflection.

It is still in Beta, and there may be bugs. Voice mode has not been released yet but will be soon. 

Couple roadmap items:
- Supporting Real time voice interactions.
- Supporting additional languages including Spanish, Arabic, Indonesian, Hindi and more.
- References to Quran and authentic Hadith.

I’d love to hear your thoughts! How do you see AI supporting emotional and spiritual well-being, let me know!

text:
Hello Product Hunt 👋


Today is a big day for us. We're excited to share Airial Travel with the Product Hunt community. Airial is the personal travel agent with AI superpowers. Simply describe your trip to Airial or drop in your favorite travel TikToks or IG reels and watch your dream trip come to life, fully planned and ready to book!


Sanjeev @sanjeev_shenoy1 and I co-founded Airial Travel a year ago to solve a problem we faced repeatedly. Being avid travelers, we were traveling for several months a year and spending multiple days planning and booking each trip. Hours and hours of research, browsing, watching videos, form-filling, spreadsheets, refinements etc. As we dug deeper, we realized that the scale and the intensity of this problem is stunning - hundreds of millions of trips are booked online every year and planning each of them takes over five hours on average.


Our vision “Just imagine your trip, and Airial it!” stems from our ultimate wish as travelers - AI that can figure out all the intricacies of trip planning for you - hotels, activities, flights, trains, transits, deals, date options, restaurants, interests, research, travel videos and everything else.


Airial is the only travel planner out there today which creates plans crafted to the last detail, like a a travel agent truly would. We pick flights, hotels, transportation and plan every single day of your trip in detail around these choices and your preferences. The defining features that set us apart from competition originate from the core beliefs that Airial is built on:

  • 📅 Detailed intricately crafted plans: Attention to detail makes trip plans incredible. Airial plans trips in a level of detail that is simply unmatched, taking care of hundreds of common sense constraints across thousands of variables in seconds.

  • 🚀 From Reels to Itineraries: TikTok / IG reels to Trips is work that millions do manually. We now enable all this in a click. This is the intersection of the two big trends in travel - AI and Socials.

  • 🏖️ Personalized Planning: Travel portals today are one-size-fits-all. We plan trips tailored to your specific interests - architecture tours, scenic hikes or samurai sword fighting lessons!

  • 👆 Actionable Itineraries: Just having a chatbot pick out one combination for you isn’t practically useful. Which was the last trip you planned that didn’t need any refinement? Every decision Airial makes for you is changeable via chat or UI controls.

  • 🌎 Discovery in context: As you plan your trip, Airial gives you the tools to discover incredible ideas and expert advice specific to your itinerary and interests which can be instantly imported into your trip.


Vacations are for relaxation. Planning them shouldn’t be an added burden. With Airial, planning trips is as easy as dreaming them up!

text:
Hello Fam! 😻

What a year it's been!

We're so happy to announce the newest version of Alice, built from the ground up. It's been quite a journey for us - from an AI sidekick and side project, working for us and our teams, to app that is now being used by thousands of creators, founders, builders.

Alice is UNLIKE any other AI assistant app. It's designed to work with your apps and APIs - currently with automation software like Make, Zapier, n8n, soon with MCP servers ⚡

Just try it out and see for yourself, how fast, responsive and reliable LLM client can be!

With Alice, you can also:
・Chat to multiple LLMs at once
・Create an army of assistants with unique skills
・Browse our Library of readymade ai agents
And much more!

Alice is ⚡ fast 🔐 secure and 👀 private - working with offline models and keeping all conversations only on your device.

Are you a developer?

Great news - you can connect any custom back-end to Alice, such as a company database / RAG, even with offline models. Or you can make Alice work with your API! And you can publish the app on our marketplace, too.

Alice is free to try, and after you use free credits, you can bring your own API keys, or buy our Unlimited AI plan with access to newest models.

Check out Alice - it's completely free 😃 on heyalice.app

And if it proves useful to you, here's the link valid only for the launch, with discount applied: https://easl.ink/jyEKu

text:
Hello! 👋

I'm Ajith, the creator of Supavoice. I built this tool to solve my own need for a simple voice-to-text app on Mac.

I've been personally using Supavoice daily for a week now, and it's transformed how I work:

• When I'm using Cursor or WindSurf, I dictate complex prompts instead of typing them
• For emails, I speak naturally and get a good first draft
• While chatting with Claude or ChatGPT, I can have more fluid conversations by speaking
• When inspiration strikes during a walk, I can quickly dictate notes

My favorite part is how it just works across any app. The formatting modes save me tons of editing time.

I'd love to hear how you end up using Supavoice in your workflow! What would you most like to dictate rather than type?

PS: Happy to answer any questions you might have!

text:
Hi everyone!


Sharing Mureka O1, their latest AI music generation model. It's truly impressive and promising!


The really interesting part of O1 is, it's the music reasoning model using Chain-of-Thought ("MusiCoT"). It plans the song structure first, leading to impressively coherent and musical results. It seems O1 surpasses Suno V4 in quality and has lower latency.


Honestly, the O1 model's ability to structure music beforehand makes a noticeable difference in quality. It feels less random and more intentional.

Beyond that, Mureka packs some standout customization features:

🎤 Vocal Cloning: Train the AI on your voice! They claim to be the first platform offering this custom timbre control.
🎼 Model Fine-tuning: Uniquely, you can fine-tune the V6 model on your private music library for custom styles.
🔌 API Access: For music generation, TTS, and voice cloning.
🔗 Song Reference: Use audio/YouTube links as prompts.
✂️ Editing Tools: Includes "Region Edit" and "Extend".

I am a big fan of Suno, but I do feel like this time Mureka is achieving something phenomenal.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community!

I'm excited to share MeshifAI with you today - a tool that makes creating 3D models with AI accessible to everyone, regardless of technical background.

What is MeshifAI?
A platform that transforms text prompts into high-quality 3D models in seconds. No more struggling with complex 3D modeling software or waiting days for a designer.

Key features:
- Text-to-3D: Simply describe what you want, and our AI generates it
- Real-time viewer: View and interact with your models instantly
- Adjustable variance: Control how closely the output follows your prompt
- Easy export: Download your models for use in any 3D software or game engine

Why I built it:
As a developer working with 3D and Game Development, I was frustrated by how much time it took to create or source models. I wanted to remove that bottleneck and democratize 3D creation.

I'm currently supporting the following platforms:

- Web UI
- JavaScript
- Unity (.NET)

And am planning on expanding to more platforms.

I'd love to hear your feedback and answer any questions in the comments below.

text:
Hi everyone!

Researcher & Analyst in M365 Copilot – these are two new reasoning agents Microsoft just introduced. Instead of just basic chat, these agents provide expert-level help right within your workflow.

Researcher tackles deep, multi-source research. It pulls info from your work data (emails, files, etc.) and the web to put together comprehensive reports, saving significant time on tasks like market analysis or strategy prep.

Analyst acts like a data scientist in your pocket. It takes raw data from spreadsheets and other sources, analyzes it (even using Python), and helps you find insights, create forecasts, or visualize patterns.

The idea is to have this specialized expertise readily available while you work, all integrated securely within M365.

These are rolling out starting in April via a new "Frontier" program for users with an M365 Copilot license.

text:
Hey everyone! We’re so excited to bring the next generation of Gyroscope to everyone.

This version makes our signature trackers even better — letting people easily track food, places, calories and much more — and also upgrades our AI coaching system to be about 100x more intelligent than the first version we released a few years ago.

The most common goal people have when signing up is losing bodyfat, so we’ve optimized the entire experience around that. With the new protocol (and free course), you’ll have everything needed to ensure that the weight loss comes from bodyfat rather than valuable muscle mass. Whether on GLP1 meds where this is essential, or just wanting to lose a few pounds after the holidays, we think this protocol can change the world if everyone follows it.

We just put the app up in the app store, so give it a try and let us know what you think!

PS: Since this is a common question: The app does require an iPhone right now, the android platform currently isn’t quite polished enough to meet the our quality bar—but hopefully one day in the future that will change

text:
Gyroscope: A Long-Time User's Perspective on its AI-Powered Evolution


I've been a Gyroscope user since pretty much the beginning, and it's been fascinating to watch it evolve. Back when I started, the term "AI" wasn't even part of the health tracking conversation!


For those who don't know, Gyroscope is an app that aims to be your comprehensive health guardian, pulling in data from various sources to give you a holistic view of your well-being. It tracks everything from your steps and sleep to your heart rate and even your mood.


Initially, Gyroscope was great for data aggregation and visualization. It neatly presented your health metrics, but it was largely up to you to interpret the data and draw conclusions.


The real game-changer has been the integration of AI. Now, Gyroscope isn't just passively collecting data; it's actively analyzing it, identifying patterns, and offering personalized insights. It's like having a personal health coach in your pocket!


Pros:

  • Comprehensive Tracking: Integrates with a wide range of apps and devices for a complete picture of your health.

  • AI-Powered Insights: The AI algorithms provide actionable recommendations based on your data.

  • Beautiful Visualizations: Gyroscope presents your data in a clear, engaging, and easy-to-understand way.

  • Personalized: The app learns your habits and preferences over time, making the insights even more relevant.

  • Long-term Tracking: Great for identifying trends and patterns over months and years.

Cons:

  • Subscription Cost: Gyroscope does have a subscription fee, which may be a barrier for some users. However, I believe the value it provides in terms of insights and motivation is well worth the cost.

Final Thoughts:


Gyroscope has come a long way since its early days. The addition of AI has transformed it from a simple data aggregator into a powerful tool for improving your health and well-being. If you're serious about tracking your health and want actionable insights, I highly recommend giving Gyroscope a try. To connect, my profile is: https://gyrosco.pe/andreapessotto/ :)

text: Hey Product Hunt, I'm Aliyan 👋 I am thrilled to finally launch Taskra! 🚀 Over the last month, I been working to eliminate the hassle of project planning—because let's be real, planning shouldn't take longer than executing. 🫠 The Problem Project planning today is a time-consuming mess—endless spreadsheets, scattered notes, manual timeline tracking, and way too much guessing. AI can help, but most tools just add more complexity instead of simplifying the process. We wanted to change that. Taskra generates structured project plans in seconds, so you can focus on execution instead of getting lost in planning chaos. ✨ What is Taskra? Taskra is an AI-powered project management tool that instantly creates timelines, milestones, tasks, and risk assessments based on your input. It's designed for startups, freelancers, and teams who need to plan fast and execute even faster. Here are three core features that make Taskra unique: 1️⃣ AI-Generated Project Plans Just enter your project details, and Taskra instantly builds a structured plan—complete with milestones, tasks, priorities, and potential risks. No more manual work. 2️⃣ Smart Prioritization & Calendar Integration Taskra helps you focus on what matters most by prioritizing tasks based on urgency and impact. Plus, the built-in calendar 🗓️ ensures you never miss a deadline. 3️⃣ One-Click Google Login & Instant Access No complicated setup. Just sign up with one click, and you’ll get 25 free credits 🎁 to test Taskra right away! And that's just the beginning! Taskra also includes project history tracking, PDF exports, and a simple, distraction-free workflow. 🚀 How to get started Try Taskra today for free! Sign up now and start turning your ideas into actionable project plans instantly. 📌 Get started here 👉 https://taskra.space/ Would love to hear your thoughts, feedback, and feature requests! Drop them in the comments. 🙏

text:
Hi everyone!

Super excited to introduce PixPal to the Product Hunt community!

The idea behind PixPal came from a simple thought: What if interacting with images was as easy as chatting? I wanted to create an AI tool that lets you ask questions about images, analyze them, remix them, and even generate new ones, all in a fun and effortless way. But why stop there? PixPal can also generate full blog articles - complete with images and code! Need a blog post? Just provide a topic, and the app will write the content, create a relevant image, and even generate the HTML/CSS so you can publish it instantly. It can also turn screenshots into functional code - Love a website or UI? Just upload a screenshot, and PixPal will generate the code to recreate it, with a live preview!


What makes PixPal special?
✅ No Sign-ups, No Paywalls, 100% Free – Just start using it! No restrictions.
💬 AI Chat – Ask any question, powered by GPT-4o it answers any query instantly.
🖼️ Deep Image Analysis – Upload an image, and PixPal will break it down, giving you detailed insights.
🎨 Remix Images – Instantly recreate your images with different styles or effects by simply describing what you want.
✨ AI Image Generation – Create completely new visuals from scratch, powered by FLUX.1

💻 Turn Screenshots into Code – Upload a UI screenshot and get fully functional code + preview!

📝 Generate Blog Post – Need a blog post? PixPal writes it, creates an image, and gives you the code + preview!

💾 Save & Reload – Your chats & creations are always accessible!
📱 Works on Any Device (Mobile-First Design) – A smooth, fast experience whether you're on a phone, tablet, or desktop.
♾️ Unlimited Chat & Image Creations – No daily limits, no hidden fees, just keep creating!

Built for creative minds who want AI-powered visuals & content without complexity. Whether you need quick AI-generated graphics, website elements, or even a full blog post, PixPal makes it effortless.

What do you think? What features you'd like to see next? Would love to hear your thoughts!

text:
Hello everyone!


Quick details on who I am: A software engineer at heart, since I was 14 years old (now 34).

This is my first iOS app that I am selling on the market. I have been in the tech business since 2014 helping clients with their app and web development. I are striving to provide products that people can love using and make their life easier.

I absolutely love hearing all the good and bad feedback. Please take a look and if you have any questions let us know.



Below is a list of the key features, with more on the way:

• Smart Progression - Words automatically highlight as you read, with intelligent tracking that ensures smooth progression even if you skip words.
• Auto-Scrolling - Content scrolls automatically as you speak, eliminating manual scrolling.
• Note AI - Create or edit your notes using AI. Tasks such as fixing grammar errors or summarizing a note have never been easier.
• Note Text Scanner - Scan text using your camera and automatically create a new note or edit an existing note.
• Note Card Mode - Organize your presentations into folders and seamlessly transition between notes for flawless delivery.
• Organizational Tools - Create folders, add titles, and keep all your presentations organized.
• Speech & Video Capturing - Record yourself while reading highlighted text for professional-looking presentations and practice sessions.
• Customizable Experience - Personalize highlight colors, text appearance, font size, and style to match your preferences.
• Voice Playback - Choose from multiple voices to hear your notes read aloud and highlighted at adjustable speeds and volumes.
• Biometric Authentication - Secure your notes using Face ID and Touch ID.


Want to know what is coming next? Here are a few on the list. If you have any suggestions, please let us know!


Future Features:

• Cloud sync notes and folders.

• More AI features, such as text scanning, preset voices that sound more human-like and importing text from multiple file formats like Word Docs & PDFs.

• Real time collaboration.

• Save photos when using text scanner.



Note: If anyone wants full access for one month for free, please let me know! I can get you a promo code.

text:
Can we all just admit it? Job listings suck.

They’re stuffed with words—'team player,' 'self-starter,' 'dynamic environment'—but say absolutely nothing useful. It’s like reading a corporate buzzword bingo card. How did we let it get this bad?

Searching for a job on sites like LinkedIn feels like wading through a swamp of doublespeak, hoping for a shred of truth. That’s why I built DeLinkedIn: a Chrome extension that cuts the crap and rewrites job posts with the brutal honesty you deserve.

‘Fast-paced environment’? Now it’s ‘You’ll never catch your breath.’
‘Wearing many hats’? That’s ‘One salary, five jobs.’
‘Collaborative culture’? Say hello to ‘Endless meetings, no decisions.’

Download it, try it, and share the translations that made you laugh out loud!

meta.parent_description: DelinkedIn decodes corporate jargon, reveals hidden expectations, and exposes red flags in job postings - with just the right amount of sarcasm and wit.

standardized: The user's sentiment towards traditional job listing platforms, such as LinkedIn, is one of frustration and disillusionment, with the feeling that these sites are flooded with vague and misleading corporate buzzwords that fail to provide any meaningful information to job seekers. This frustration is what drove the creation of DelinkedIn, a Chrome extension that utilizes artificial intelligence to cut through the jargon and provide brutally honest translations of job postings, aiming to entertain and inform users by revealing the often humorous and unvarnished truth behind these listings. The tone of the comment suggests that the user believes DelinkedIn is a much-needed solution to the problem of opaque job listings, and that its sarcastic and witty approach is a refreshing change from the usual corporate doublespeak, making the job search process more transparent and enjoyable. Overall, the user's enthusiasm for DelinkedIn implies that the product has the potential to resonate with others who share similar frustrations with traditional job search platforms.

text: Hey Product Hunt community! 👋 Excited to share AIHubMatrix, a project born from my own frustration juggling multiple AI chat interfaces and losing context when switching between models like GPT, Claude, Gemini, and local LLMs. AIHubMatrix solves this by providing a single, powerful, and organized interface to interact with virtually *any* AI model seamlessly. ✨ **What makes AIHubMatrix special?** * 🔄 **Dynamic Model Switching:** The killer feature! Change models *mid-conversation* without losing your flow. Compare AI responses directly. * 🎛️ **Granular Message Control:** Don't just delete – *exclude* messages from the AI's context to experiment, then include them back if needed. * 📁 **Folder Organization:** Structure your chats hierarchically, just like your file system. Drag & drop supported! * 👁️ **Universal Vision:** Get image analysis even from text-only models, thanks to automatic Google Vision integration. * 🔌 **Broad Provider Support:** Works with OpenAI (incl. Assistants), Anthropic, Google Gemini, DeepSeek, Grok, local models (Ollama, etc.), and more are planned. Configure any compatible API! * 💾 **Conversation Cache:** Pre-load specific context or reference files into a conversation. * 🛠️ **Developer Tools:** Includes request preview, debug panel, and more. 🚀 **Demo Info:** This is a public demo hosted for you to try out! * **Available Models (No Key Needed):** DeepSeek R1, Gemini 2.0/2.5 Pro Experimental. * **Other Models:** Pre-configured templates are available, but require your *own* API keys via the "Configure Models" section. * The project is **open source**! 🔗 **Links:** * Try the Demo: https://www.aihubmatrix.com/ [O tu URL de demo pública] * GitHub Repo: https://github.com/cescanue/aihu... I'd love for you to give AIHubMatrix a try and share your feedback! What features are crucial for you? Which AI providers should be prioritized next? Thanks for checking it out! 🙏 - Carlos

text:
Can AI Make Good Music?

My answer is an unequivocal yes- and that’s why I co-founded Flowhop AI, where we’re using the latest generative tech to create killer lofi hip-hop beats.

If the words “AI” and “hip-hop” in the same sentence are enough to pique your interest, feel free to check it out now. But if you like a good origin story, read on.

The Blissful Years

I was fortunate to grow up in a musical household and started playing music at a young age. I stayed active in bands from high school through my thirties.

Despite my love for music, I realized early on that it wasn’t an ideal way to make a living. For that, I turned to coding.

The thing about coding is it demands long stretches of uninterrupted screen time. And like many developers, I needed a soundtrack.

For years, that soundtrack could be just about anything: bebop jazz, thrash metal, gritty hip-hop, hardcore punk—even some country. The genre didn’t matter. I could listen to whatever I liked and still stay focused, productive, and incrementally happier.

The Turning Point

Then, a few years ago- though I’m not sure exactly when- something strange happened.

After a lifetime of voracious and wonderfully promiscuous music consumption, I found I could no longer listen to most music while working. It had become a distraction. Especially hip-hop, with its vivid imagery and clever wordplay, pulled my attention away from the work.

This was a bummer, to say the least, but it led to my discovery of lofi hip-hop.

The instrumental, often chilled-out, beats were perfect. It became my go-to music whenever I needed to lock in at the keyboard for a few hours.

The Problem

Chances are, some of you are also fans of lofi hip-hop. A quick search on YouTube will confirm its popularity. But after a couple of years listening to the top channels, I started to get bored.

I heard the same tracks a bit too often, and many of the beats shared a bit too much of the same sound palette.

I wanted more: more variety, more diversity, and more music that sounded like the golden era of sample-based hip-hop I grew up loving.

AI Changes the Game

A few months ago, I started playing around with the new wave of AI music-generation tools. I wasn’t trying to start anything- I was just curious.

The early results? Pretty incredible.

Soon I found myself wondering, "Can this thing make lofi hip-hop?"

After more focused experimentation, I got my answer. Not only could it make lofi beats- some of them were really, really good. It could even make tracks that echoed the soulful, sample-heavy vibe of golden-era hip-hop.

That’s when the lightbulb went off.

Flowhop AI

Once the vision became clear, I started generating songs like a madman—and recruited one of my best friends (a fellow musician and technologist) to help polish the results for release.

At Flowhop, we’re building the biggest and best catalog of lofi hip-hop beats on the planet- music for focus, study, creativity, and flow.

Whether you’re coding, cramming, writing, or slaying monsters in your favorite game, we want to be your soundtrack.

Enjoy!

text:
Hey Producthunters! Tomas here, CEO of Scene.

Before Scene, we spent 7+ years designing and building websites as an agency. Over time, the pattern became clear:
Websites had matured. Clients came to us with similar needs. Best practices and repeating modules emerged.
The websites themselves had become a commodity.

But building them still felt like a painful relay race.
Designers moodboarding in one tool, designing in another, building in yet another.
Project managers coordinating feedback across endless threads.
Every project felt like starting from scratch. Every update, a new sprint.

While some websites justify the time and complexity of custom delivery. Many don’t.
A well-structured, on-brand site—focused on clarity and content—can outperform one bloated with unnecessary distractions.

With the advent of AI and the immense value it’s unlocking, at Scene, we envision a new way most websites are going to be delivered from now on—the smart way. One where designers, agency teams, and anyone else come together into one place without switching tools, and one where AI empowers ideation but doesn’t limit customisations nor creativity.

Introducing Scene 2.0 - a modular AI web builder that empowers designers, agency teams, and anyone to ideate, build, and publish from a single shared canvas:

  • One canvas to ideate, moodboard, build, and ship. No silos.

  • AI that ideates and builds website layouts, copy, and images. Designers take it from there.

  • Smart defaults—global themes, auto-layout, responsive modules—so teams focus on intent, not implementation.

  • Ready to be published at all times, fully responsive

We believe websites should be clever—not hard, slow, or stressful. Thanks for checking out Scene 2.0. We’re just getting started.

PS: Massive thanks to our early users who shaped 2.0 with us, and to @chrismessina for helping us bring Scene back to PH!

This new approach empowers designers, agency teams, and individuals to collaborate seamlessly in one place, leveraging AI to streamline ideation, layout, and content creation, while still allowing for customization and creativity. The overall tone suggests that Scene 2.0 has the potential to significantly improve productivity and user experience in website building, and the company is excited to bring this innovative solution to the market, with a vision of redefining the future of website creation.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋 I’m Brandon, co-founder of Paragon. Today, I’m excited to introduce ActionKit - an API that enables you to instantly add 1000+ integration actions to your AI agent product.


Why ActionKit?


Product builders are racing to build AI agent functionality into their applications, but building every single 3rd-party action takes too much engineering time. Not only do you need to handle the authentication for every integration, but you also need to write custom code for every single action in those 3rd-party applications. These actions also need to have LLM-optimized descriptions and properly documented input parameters so your agent can use them properly.


What makes ActionKit best-in-class?

  • Add 1000+ actions across dozens of integrations with a few lines of code

  • LLM agnostic - plug & play with any AI agent framework

  • AI agent optimized action & input parameter descriptions

  • Load tested for enterprise scale (1M+ requests/day)

  • Designed for multi-tenant SaaS - enable users to seamlessly auth their 3rd-party accounts directly in your application

  • Support your users’ custom objects/fields across every integration

  • Integrated into an end-to-end platform for integrations that can handle every use case, from RAG ingestion to AI agent tool calling

Trusted by enterprise AI companies including AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai, Paragon will save you months of engineering every year on integrations so you can focus on your core product.Try it now and let us know what you think! Drop your questions and thoughts in the comments - we’ll be here all day!

meta.parent_description: With a single API call, ActionKit (by Paragon) equips your product's AI agents with 1000+ integration actions across CRMs, ticketing platforms, email, Slack, and more. Paragon is trusted by enterprise AI companies like AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai.

text:
Hey PH!


It’s clear that the closer we’re getting to AGI, the closer we’re getting to a future where all humans are shaping our digital worlds directly. Gone are the days of thinking of code line by line, we’ll have AI agents producing code “by the kilo”. With Kilo Code, we’re humbly throwing our hat in the ring with a new AI agent.

There are already a million AI agent companies out there, why another one? Simple: we’re an impatient bunch. We believe that by an extreme focus on speed (speed of building features, speed of growing our team, speed of experimentation, speed of the product itself), we can quickly add value.

We’ve been living this extreme focus on speed already:

  • Two weeks ago, I dropped everything in my life to build the first version.

  • By now we’ve assembled a team of 10.

  • Day one, we forked the Roo Code VSCode extension (which itself is a fork of Cline).

  • Since then, we shipped 10 small improvements.

  • Made the home page of hacker news.

  • By tomorrow, we’ll have fixed two of your requests.

  • Next week, we’ll do 10 more improvements.

The goal is to create the most user-friendly AI coding agent, as quickly as possible.


Most importantly, we want to build this with you. We would love your continuous feedback (here but also on Github and Discord), and we have a free tier (with $15 in free tokens a month!) in order to thank you—and for the best feedback we’ll give out more free tokens.

Check the homepage for up to date information on how to get access to the free tier.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community! 👋


I'm Amanda, founder and CEO of Redactable. We're incredibly excited to share our AI-powered redaction platform with you today!


The journey of Redactable began when I was working as a loan consultant and realized something alarming – those black boxes I was drawing over my clients' sensitive information weren't actually protecting their data. Anyone with basic technical skills could access what was underneath. This wasn't just a small oversight – it was a massive privacy and security gap affecting countless professionals handling sensitive documents.


We built Redactable to solve this problem once and for all. Our platform doesn't just visually hide information—it permanently removes sensitive data, including hidden data and metadata that most people don't even know exists. And we've made it 98% faster than traditional tools.


What I'm most proud of is that we're democratizing document redaction. Before Redactable, redaction was incredibly time-consuming or required expensive enterprise solutions. Now, professionals across legal, healthcare, finance, government, and other sectors can protect sensitive information efficiently and reliably – from any browser, without downloads or complex training.


I'd love to hear your thoughts and answer any questions about Redactable. And if you've ever struggled with document redaction, I'd be curious to learn about your experience! 🚀

meta.parent_description: Redactable uses AI to find and permanently remove sensitive information from documents—unlike traditional methods that leave data vulnerable to bad actors. Save 98% of time while ensuring protection across legal, healthcare, and financial sectors.

standardized: The founder of Redactable, Amanda, expresses her enthusiasm for introducing the AI-powered redaction platform to the community, highlighting the significant problem it solves in protecting sensitive information in documents. She shares her personal experience as a loan consultant, where she discovered that traditional methods of redacting sensitive information, such as drawing black boxes, were ineffective and posed a massive privacy and security risk. This concern is what drove her to create Redactable, which not only visually hides but permanently removes sensitive data, including hidden data and metadata, making it a more secure and efficient solution. Amanda takes pride in democratizing document redaction, making it accessible and affordable for professionals across various sectors, including legal, healthcare, and finance, allowing them to protect sensitive information efficiently and reliably without requiring expensive enterprise solutions or complex training. Overall, the tone of the comment conveys a sense of excitement, passion, and pride in the product, emphasizing its potential to make a significant impact in the industry by providing a faster, more secure, and more accessible solution for document redaction.

text:
Hi Product Hunt!


I’m Boris - Growth at Redactable. Our users often tell us how they struggled before finding us—spending hours manually blacking out text, only to discover the sensitive data was still accessible beneath those black boxes. Even worse, hidden metadata kept exposing their clients' information.


What drives us is making proper data protection accessible to everyone. We've built Redactable to slash redaction time by 98% compared to the old-school methods, and we've made it super easy to keep track of what's been redacted with a clean paper trail that keeps auditors happy.


When users tell us they've transformed multi-day redaction projects into minutes while eliminating data exposure risks, we know we're solving a real problem. If you're handling sensitive documents, we'd love to hear how we can help you protect data more effectively.


Share your feedback, and help us to make our platform better! 🤗

text:
👋 Hello Product Hunt!


This is for all anime character lovers (and OTAKU) to make our dreams come true… take our favs anywhere.


What is EmemeAI?

EmemeAI is an AI character hub where you can create interactive, auto-animated 3D AI characters, and export them into games, social media, and external apps.


Why EmemeAI?

  • 3D AI Chatbots: Upload a VRM file (you can make one easily using VRoid Studio—no 3D skills needed!), and bring your favorite characters to life with AI conversations.

  • Generative Motion: Your AI characters automatically move and animate in 3D based on the context of their speech.

  • Export Anywhere: Currently supports VRChat (how to play) and our sandbox AI game EmemeTown (steam), with YouTube Live and Unity API support coming soon.

🎮 Are you a game/app developer interested in integrating EmemeAI?

We’d love to chat → info@ememe.ai


...and yep, we even put out a press release today – feels kinda surreal but exciting to share this with the world 🥹

Ever since I was 5, I had a huge crush on Tuxedo Mask from Sailor Moon.
Since then, anime characters have always been part of my life—and now, we're building a world where you can share your own memories and adventures with AI characters across platforms.


Thanks so much for reading.

I’d love to hear what kind of AI character you’d create 💖

#EmemeAI

text:
Hi everyone!

You can now use Voice and Video Chat directly in Qwen Chat! Powering these new multimodal interactions is Qwen's latest open-source model: Qwen2.5-Omni.

This "omni" model is a single system that understands text, audio, images, and video, while outputting both text and natural-sounding audio.

Key aspects:

🔄 End-to-End Multimodal: A single "Thinker-Talker" architecture designed for seamless input/output across modalities.
💬 Real-Time Interaction: Built for streaming, enabling smooth voice and video chat experiences.
🗣️ Natural Speech Output: Claims strong performance in speech generation quality.
💪 Strong Across Modalities: Performs well on benchmarks for vision, audio, and text tasks.
🔓 Openly Available with Apache 2.0 license: Released on Hugging Face, ModelScope, and GitHub, with API access via DashScope.

The Qwen team believes this type of omni model is key for the future of AI agents. While this is still just the 7B version, it's impressive to see this level of multimodality in an open model.

Head over to Qwen Chat, toggle the new voice & video chat button, and experience it!

text:
Hi Product Hunt! 👋


Owen from SciPhi here, we're excited to be launching R2R and our SciPhi Cloud API today.


Simply put, we built R2R because traditional RAG wasn't cutting it for complex research tasks. It's our open-source, agentic retrieval system designed for multi-step reasoning across your docs and the web, complete with citations. R2R is containerized with a simple REST API, so you can add programatic deep research capabilities to your apps.


SciPhi Cloud is available if you want to avoid the infra headache (free tier available!).


We're here all day to answer questions – technical, practical, or otherwise. What are you building that needs smarter retrieval?

Explore R2R on GitHub or sign up at app.sciphi.ai.


Looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋


I'm Markham Nolan, co-founder of NOAN. Our vision is make entrepreneurs & teams feel superhuman instead of overwhelmed as they go about their business-building journey, so we built a superhuman business partner to help them realize their dreams. 🚀


Using NOAN's knowledge system and AI assistant streamlines & simplifies the complexities of entrepreneurship, allowing entrepreneurs concentrate on what truly matters – bringing their vision to life.


What sets NOAN apart:


🤖 Active AI Partner: Your AI Assistant always knows your business. It can pull insights from data, help you automate processes, and compress all your repetitive go-to-market functions seamlessly. It’s your 24/7 brainstorming partner, editor-in-chief, legal assistant, head of operations, HR lead and more. You'll talk to them like a real team-mate, and they’ll answer like your star performer.


🔀 AI Portability: Compare results from different LLMs in seconds. No need to maintain your presence & data across them all. No reminding ChatGPT or Claude who you are and what you do. No need for multiple paid accounts.


🧠 AI-Guided Workflows: Workflows in ‘Smart Blocks’ guide users as they create structure & strategy - FAST. After a few initial steps, the AI Assistant can offer nuanced, tailored business advice, ensuring your strategy is robust, specific and innovative.


🔌 Zapier Integration: Our Zapier app connects your AI assistant to over 7,000 apps, so you can further automate your workflows and integrate seamlessly with the tools you already use.


🎨 NOAN Create: Hone your AI assistant with 11 modes to create any document, strategy or communication you need, always brand-aligned and strategically optimized. No need for complex prompts - NOAN already knows your business inside out.


We built NOAN for the ambitious, the innovators, the strivers - the people who say 'If only I could clone myself'. If that sounds like you, NOAN is for you.


For a limited time, we've opened up a free 7-day trial. Once we hit our limit, we'll close it off.
Beyond that, we're offering an exclusive 50% discount on your first three months with the code PH50. 🎉

text:
🚀 Hey Product Hunt!

I’m Sai Mohit, founder of Reachfast.ai — and I’m thrilled to finally share what we’ve been building

If you’ve ever found the perfect lead or candidate on LinkedIn…
...only to wait 2–5 days for a connection request or InMail reply — you already know the pain.

In sales and recruiting, speed = revenue.

That’s why we built Reachfast — the fastest way to connect with anyone on LinkedIn.

Drop in a LinkedIn URL.

We return verified phone numbers and emails — so you can skip the waiting game and get a “yes” or “no” in less than 5 minutes.


💥 What makes Reachfast different?

✅ 10–30% more phone number accuracy than other tools
✅ 10–40% more phone number coverage across 190+ countries
✅ 385M+ professionals — from CXOs to ICs, across every major industry
✅ Works for Sales, Recruiting, Partnerships, and BizDev


🔍 Key Features

📞 LinkedIn URL Enrichment – Just paste a profile, get direct contact details
🌎 Global Coverage – US (180M+), India (75M+), Europe (200M+), and beyond
🏢 Any Role, Any Industry – CEOs, VPs, CHROs, Developers — across Tech, Finance, Healthcare, Manufacturing & more
🔌 CRM/ATS Integration via API – Enrich data within your CRM, ATS, or workflows
🎯 100% Accuracy Guarantee – If a number doesn’t work, you don’t pay. Simple.


We’re not just another data provider.

Our edge lies in our unique data union partnerships and AI-driven scraping of public LinkedIn data — which gives us superior coverage others simply can’t match.

Reachfast is already powering thousands of conversations that would’ve otherwise been lost to “Seen” or “No Response.”

We'd love your support, feedback, or just a simple hello 🙏

Ask me anything about how we built it, or how you can use it for your team.

Let’s #reachfast 🚀
— Sai

text:
👋 Hey Hunters!

We're excited to introduce React Native ExecuTorch - bringing AI models directly to edge devices for React Native!
We have been tinkering around running AI models on edge devices for a while.
Our overarching goals since day one were to enable more private, more environmentally friendly, and less resource-intensive model inference on mobile devices for the React Native community.
Leveraging the power of the ExecuTorch ecosystem, we were able to bring LLMs, computer vision models like object detection and classification, OCR, and speech-to-text capabilities to run on-device for React Native devs. No more API calls or cloud dependencies for your AI features!

The journey has just begun, and we cannot wait to see what the future holds.
We hope that our open source work will enable many people to build amazing apps!
If there are any use cases on your mind that you would see fit for our library, please do reach out! Check out our GitHub repo to get started!

Happy coding!

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋


I'm Omar, founder of Mira Migo, and I'm thrilled to launch here today!


When a few teachers approached me 5 weeks ago for help transitioning careers, I quickly realized how overwhelming and repetitive the process was:

  • Narrowing down what skills they actually have

  • Finding meaningful, interesting careers they qualify for

  • Making endless resume edits

Honestly, it felt manual and didn't scale at all.

Current solutions rely heavily on generic career quizzes and outdated advice, resulting in people picking the wrong jobs, feeling lost, and wasting years in roles that don't fit their interests or personality.


And here's the bigger problem: the rise of AI means careers aren't about fitting into traditional 9-to-5 roles anymore. Instead, aligning careers with genuine interests and unique strengths is becoming crucial. Yet today, 75% of high school students and 55% of recent university graduates feel completely unprepared to confidently choose a career.


➡️ Mira Migo helps you confidently discover careers you'll genuinely enjoy in just 5 minutes.


Unlike traditional career tests or resume builders, Mira Migo combines the proven Holland RIASEC framework (trusted globally for career guidance) with a smart analysis of your actual resume. This gives you personalized, actionable career paths tailored specifically to your interests, personality, and real experience.


This unique approach allows you to:

→ 🎯Find personalized career matches instantly—no more guesswork or generic suggestions.

→ 🗺️ Map out your actionable skills clearly, highlighting exactly where to focus your career development.

→ 🌟 Stay future-proof in the age of AI, aligning your career path to your genuine interests, ensuring relevance and enjoyment.

→ 💡 Free tier + one-time paid feature, no hidden subscriptions or recurring fees. Clear, simple value.


Our mission is straightforward: help people avoid wasted years, find clarity fast, and pursue careers they genuinely love. I personally felt this pain when I graduated from university, and I've seen so many others struggle—new and experienced alike. Mira Migo is my way of addressing this head-on.


Super excited to launch today and hear your thoughts, suggestions, and feedback! 🔥


(P.S. Big thanks to the early testers who helped refine Mira Migo!)

text:
We in our professional and personal lives get a lot of documents that we need to sign, from a simple consent form from our kid's school, to a vendor contract or a share holding agreement. However, the access to legal review is time consuming and costly, so majority of the times, we sign agreements and documents based on 'trust'. However, when trust is broken that is where our signed documents do not help us as we did not review them thoroughly. For example, you signed an NDA thinking that you should not talk about any confidential matter, however, you did realise that the NDA stopped you from even taking the name of the company and now they are suing you because you just took their name. Similarly, you signed a consent form for your child's trip but did not realise that you have waived all rights for mishaps happening due to negligence on the part of school.

Personas is an AI powered tool which uses vectors to analyse each document in detail. The AI generates the levers based on each document type, where the levers are key aspects under which the document needs to be reviewed. The system also seeks your preferences for each aspect so that the system processes based on your expectations. Finally, in under 2 mins you get the entire document reviewed with each aspect marked as Red, Green or Amber based on the severity of the issue. The best part, if you review such documents regularly, like NDAs coming from various customers, vendors etc, you can create a persona with your preferences and every time a new NDA comes, you can get it reviewed based on your persona with a single click of a button.

Give it a try and let me know if you think it would help you in being safe from signing documents with clauses which can be detrimental to you in the long run.
