text:
Hi Product Hunt!

I'm Jacob. Me and my team have spent the last 8 years turning academic MPC cryptography papers into production systems that secure digital assets. I/we've come from the largest players in the industry such as Bitfinex, Tether, Binance, FTX, Monzo, Saxo Bank, Deltec bank and more. I've seen firsthand how challenging crypto security can be - even for institutions with dedicated teams.

Our team has spent the last 8 years developing MPC cryptography, turning academic papers into battle-tested security systems. We've also helped companies recover from attacks and implement better security.

The problem we're solving: Crypto remains the wild west. It's difficult to interact with web3 safely without accidentally signing transactions that could steal your funds. We believe AI is the missing piece. IO AI Wallet uses conversational AI to abstract away blockchain complexities while our Guardian agent provides real-time protection against scams and malicious contracts.

What makes us different:
- Institution-grade MPC security (not just seed phrases)
- Cryptographic multi-approval system (not just prompts)
- Flexible key-sharing configurations for different security needs
- Built by a team that has secured billions in digital assets

As we look ahead, we're building this to support fully autonomous AI agents that can operate securely in web3 with cryptographic constraints.

Retweet this tweet and receive a $50 coupon when we go live.

Looking forward to your feedback and questions!

Join Waitlist → https://campaign.iofinnet.com/ai...

meta.parent_description: Talk to your AI to handle complex crypto transactions while our MPC technology provides institutional-grade security. Guardian agents scan for threats in real-time, letting you interact safely with web3 through natural conversation.

He emphasizes that the current state of crypto is akin to the "wild west," implying a sense of urgency and necessity for a secure solution, and believes that AI is the key to addressing this issue. The AI-Powered Crypto Wallet is positioned as a game-changer, leveraging conversational AI and real-time protection to abstract away blockchain complexities and safeguard users against scams and malicious contracts. What sets this product apart, according to Jacob, is its institution-grade MPC security, cryptographic multi-approval system, and flexible key-sharing configurations, which are a direct result of his team's experience in securing billions of dollars in digital assets. Overall, the tone is one of confidence and authority, with Jacob and his team appearing to be uniquely qualified to tackle the complex security challenges in the crypto space, and their product, AI-Powered Crypto Wallet, is poised to make a significant impact in the web3 ecosystem.

text:
Arcana

AI-Powered Monetization: Native GenAI Ads for GenAI Apps.


The Problem We're Solving

GenAI apps are exploding, but monetization options are limited. Subscription fatigue is real, and traditional ads destroy the immersive AI experience users love. Developers are caught between revenue needs and preserving UX.


Our Solution

Arcana seamlessly integrates contextually relevant ads into AI-generated content. Our ads feel like natural extensions of the conversation, not disruptive interruptions.


How It Works

  • Our platform analyzes the context and intent of AI outputs.

  • Relevant, native ads are placed within the generated content.

  • Users get helpful suggestions, not jarring banner ads.

  • Developers earn revenue without sacrificing experience.

  • Just a few lines of code to integrate through our Codex SDK.


Early Results

  • 8 publishers are already live on our platform.

  • 150+ ads in our network, with this number growing week on week.

  • 50+ developers scheduled integration meetings in just two weeks.

  • Zero monthly fees – simple revenue-sharing model.


For Developers

Want to monetize your GenAI app without compromising experience? Early adopters get premium support and higher revenue share percentages. If you like this and we want to use Arcana in your project, please fill the form out: https://forms.gle/qWfFPpSaw5g51avt8


For Advertisers

Reach premium users who are actively engaging with cutting-edge AI tools with ads that feel native to the experience.

We built Arcana to be the monetization layer for the GenAI ecosystem. Try it today and help shape the future! If you want to advertise on Arcana, email us at founders@arcana.ad

Moving into a house that had been painted and re-painted over 20 years, I always needed to match the right paint to cover scuffs or repairs.

I built an app that can identify paint colors (with a certain degree of confidence) from walls for various manufacturers and show you closely related colors from other paint manufacturers.

The biggest challenge was using AI & computer vision to do a real-time live preview of colors on your walls. The results are solid, but I'm continuing to work on improving them further.

text:
Hello Product Hunt!
I'm David — a designer/developer, deeply interested in automation. This is my first launch here, so... be gentle. 😅


So here’s what happened: I had over 300 SVG images that needed background removal. Manually? That’s two days of my life I’d never get back. AI can totally handle it now — but the question was how?

The real problem? How do you actually process the files?
Do you install a model locally? Use what interface? Write a Python script to crawl a folder? What if it’s too slow, or the model isn’t the right one? And what about ChatGPT... do I just feed it 10 files at a time? That would also take forever.

I figured there has to be a better way. A simple, fast and reliable batch tool, that lets everyday people use powerful AI models without the hassle.

So I built it... and called it "Shovel" — a simple tool for a high tech job. Because sometimes, you just want to shovel your problems into the machine and watch them get handled.


Let me know if you have such use cases as well. I can't be the only one with tons of files to edit. 😀

meta.parent_description: Need to do complicated edits, format conversion, translation, cleanup, summarisation, or analysis on large number of files? Wanna try running it through AI models? But ChatGPT only takes a few files at a time... You need a better tool for the job.

standardized: The founder of Shovel, David, has expressed a sentiment of frustration and inefficiency with the current methods of utilizing AI models for batch file processing, which motivated him to create a simple and reliable tool to address this issue. He recounts a personal experience where he had to remove backgrounds from over 300 SVG images, a task that would have taken him two days to complete manually, and notes that while AI can handle such tasks, the existing interfaces and methods, such as installing models locally or using ChatGPT, are cumbersome and time-consuming. This experience led him to develop Shovel, a tool designed to enable everyday users to leverage powerful AI models without the hassle, highlighting a significant pain point in the productivity and developer tools space, particularly when it comes to working with large numbers of files and leveraging artificial intelligence. The tone of the comment suggests that David is enthusiastic about the potential of Shovel to solve a common problem that many users, including himself, face, and is seeking validation and feedback from the community on the usefulness of his product.

Hello PH! I'm the founder of Nodespark and Course Generator Pro 👋


We're so excited to finally launch Course Generator Pro on Product Hunt!

Course Generator Pro is a platform that is redefining how authors create interactive courses. As a solopreneur, I'm really proud of what i have achieved, and our users love it! We’re thrilled to share it here with the wider PH community.


🤔 What is Course Generator Pro?

It is a simple platform that allows you to generate, edit and sell courses within minutes, this reduces the effort, time and cost authors need to put into creating the base content. Allowing authors to focus on fleshing out the course to deliver real value


🎯 Who is it for?

Course Generator Pro is for course creators, content creators and businesses basically, anyone and any team that is tasked with creating a course.


📖 The Story Behind Pulse

A few months back I was running an agency, in an attempt to attract leads we began creating courses as lead magnets. But we were losing time, so we started hiring freelancers then we lost money. Since the courses, we're creating so many leads, I decided to use an AI course generator, but all of them were build for corporate training and not course authoring for e-learning, so that is why I built Course Generator Pro.


✨ Key Features & Capabilities 

✅Course Generation - Course Generator Pro goes beyond being an advanced AI course generator and user-friendly authoring tool. Allowing you to distribute your educational content in minutes.

✅Form Opt-In - Use generated courses as lead magnets to collect leads, or to showcase the value of your coaching & training programs, boosting motivation.

✅Pay-Wall Integration - Get paid by selling courses to individuals through payment wall (powered by PayPal) or provide e-learning content in SCORM/PDF to organizations.

✅LMS Export - You can quickly integrate your courses onto any webpage using simple iframe code, or export the course as

SCORM/PDF for LMS integration.


You can sign up at https://coursegenerator.pro/signup and try it yourself for free! And I love feedback. Please drop questions or comments below. I'd be happy to connect with you.


Thanks for your time!

text:
Hi everyone!

Check out something very clever from Cloudflare: AI Labyrinth. It's a new approach to fighting unwanted AI scraping bots, and it actually uses their own tools against them!

Here's the idea: when Cloudflare detects a suspicious bot, AI Labyrinth automatically creates a network of fake web pages, filled with AI-generated content. These pages are linked together, but they're invisible to real users and have no SEO value (they're specifically designed not to be indexed).

The goal is to:

⏳ Waste Bot Resources: Make the bots waste time and computing power crawling useless content.
🤖 Identify Bad Bots: Any crawler that follows these links is definitely a bot, allowing Cloudflare to fingerprint it and improve their bot detection.
🙌 Protect Your Site: Without impacting real users or your SEO.

It's all done with a simple toggle in the Cloudflare dashboard – no complex configuration needed.

This is a fascinating example of using AI defensively.  It's a bit like a next-generation honeypot, but instead of just a single hidden link, it's a whole labyrinth of AI-generated nonsense.

meta.parent_description: Cloudflare AI Labyrinth uses AI-generated content to trap and identify malicious AI bots scraping your website. Simple toggle to enable, no configuration needed.

standardized: The user is extremely enthusiastic about Cloudflare AI Labyrinth, praising its innovative approach to combating unwanted AI scraping bots by utilizing their own tactics against them. They appreciate how the product cleverly creates a network of fake web pages filled with AI-generated content, which not only wastes the bots' resources but also helps identify and fingerprint malicious bots, ultimately protecting the website without impacting real users or search engine optimization. The user finds it fascinating that this is all achieved with a simple toggle in the Cloudflare dashboard, requiring no complex configuration, and views it as a next-generation honeypot that showcases the defensive potential of artificial intelligence. Overall, the user's tone suggests that Cloudflare AI Labyrinth is a game-changer in the realm of website security, offering a unique and effective solution to a significant problem faced by website owners.

👋 Hey Product Hunt community! I'm thrilled to introduce MakeCareer.ai — an AI-powered job matching platform designed to simplify career transitions and eliminate resume fatigue. 

I built this after seeing firsthand how overwhelming job boards can be — especially for people transitioning from federal roles or simply looking to move into the private sector. I wanted to create a smarter, faster way to connect people to high-paying jobs without all the traditional friction. 

With just your role, our AI springs into action — optimizing your resume and matching you with the right jobs instantly. No endless searches, no resume stress — just real opportunities in seconds. 

I’d love your feedback on the platform!👇 

What feature would you like to see next? 

What’s your biggest frustration with job search platforms today? 

How can we make AI job matching even more personalized? 

💬 Let’s chat in the comments — I’m here all day answering your questions and listening to your ideas. 
 Thanks so much for your support 🙏 

Vincent @makecareerAI

text:
Hey Product Hunt!

I Just launched a website that generates you a highly personalized meditation guide - because generic "breathe and be present" meditation guides are about as useful as a chocolate teapot.

I built this after one too many meditation apps told me to "observe my thoughts like clouds" while my upstairs neighbor was apparently teaching their elephant to riverdance at 2AM.

Serotonin generates weirdly specific meditation guides for whatever chaos you're dealing with.

Type in your actual problem - "my boss is a micromanaging nightmare" or "I can't stop doomscrolling Twitter" - and get guidance that doesn't pretend your specific brand of suffering is solved by counting breaths.

No more one-size-fits-all zen guide. This is meditation that acknowledges your reality, however messy it is.

Try it out and tell me the strangest situation you've used it for. I'll be here answering questions and probably meditating on another launch anxiety.

meta.parent_description: Generate Personalized Meditation Guide.

standardized: The founder of Generate Meditation has expressed frustration with traditional meditation guides that fail to account for the complexities and nuances of real-life situations, instead offering generic advice that can come across as insensitive or unhelpful. This sentiment is reflected in their experience with meditation apps that suggest observing thoughts like clouds, which can be difficult to do in chaotic environments, such as when dealing with noisy neighbors. As a result, they created Generate Meditation, a personalized meditation guide that uses artificial intelligence to generate tailored guidance based on the user's specific problems or challenges, such as a difficult boss or social media addiction. The founder's tone suggests a sense of empathy and understanding for individuals who are struggling with unique issues, and a desire to provide a more realistic and effective approach to meditation that acknowledges the messiness of everyday life. Overall, the founder's comment conveys a sense of excitement and passion for their product, which they believe offers a more personalized and relevant alternative to traditional meditation guides.

text:
Hey Product Hunt! 👋

I’m thrilled to launch PerfectAICV, a tool that helps you create the perfect CV for each job post — using AI.

🎯 The Problem
Most job seekers send the same CV to every job. But recruiters only spend 6-7 seconds on a CV before deciding. Tailored CVs stand out — generic ones don’t.

ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems) also reject 75% of CVs due to missing keywords.

💡 The Solution — PerfectAICV

We make it easy to:
✨ Tailor your CV to each job post using AI
🧠 Generate an Interview Pack: Questions, topics, and tips
📄 Choose from clean, professional templates
⏱ Done in minutes — no writing, no formatting headaches

⚙️ How It Works
Upload your current CV and job post
AI tailors your CV with relevant keywords and highlights
Get an AI-generated Interview Prep Pack
Download your CV in PDF — ready to apply

🤖 Built with ChatGPT
Fun fact: Over 90% of the code, UI, database, and prompts were developed with the help of ChatGPT. This is an AI-powered product that was built with AI — from idea to launch.

💼 Who It’s For
Job seekers, freelancers, career switchers — anyone who wants to stand out in 6 seconds or less.

I’d love your feedback, suggestions, and support 💬
Let’s help more people land their dream jobs faster with the power of AI.

🔗 perfectaicv.com

Thanks,
Adnan Khan

text:
Hey PHers! 👋


I'm Luke, thrilled to introduce Effie - an all-in-one content creation suite that seamlessly integrates minimalist writing, mind mapping, and intelligent AI assistance.


What inspired me to create Effie?


As a content creator, I often found myself struggling with existing tools:

  1. So-called "immersive writing" apps like Ulysses or Bear are still cluttered with buttons. Not exactly distraction-free, right?

  2. These apps often lack Windows and Android versions. They take the easy route with iCloud sync, leaving many users out in the cold.

  3. While outlining tools like Workflowy exist, they fall short in truly streamlining the writing process.

  4. The AI support in most writing tools feels disconnected. I was tired of copying text between multiple windows.

I thought, "There has to be a better way!"
That's when Effie was born. :)


How Effie transforms your writing experience:

  1. Truly distraction-free: Our writing area is as clean as a blank sheet of paper - not a single button in sight.

  2. Seamless cross-platform experience: Write effortlessly across all your devices with automatic syncing. No platform left behind!

  3. Integrated outlining and mind mapping: Clarify your thoughts and structure your ideas without switching tools.

  4. Your intelligent writing companion: Our AI chat sits right beside your document, ready to inspire when you need it most. It can analyze your writing style, discover similar authors, provide professional editor's feedback, and more - all without leaving your writing space.

Exclusive for PHers: 21-day Effie membership

Claim here: https://www.effie.pro/getcode/?code=ph9effie


Effie isn't just another tool – it's your creative companion that understands and enhances your writing journey.
Try it and transform your content creation process!


Cheers,
Luke

text:
👋 Hi Product Hunt community! Super excited to share Solver with you today.


🔍 WHY WE BUILT THIS


As engineering leaders at Apple and Samsung, we faced overwhelming backlogs with more tasks than our teams could complete.


We spent countless hours on routine coding tasks that took time away from higher-value creative work.


That frustration led us to build Solver - an autonomous coding agent that works while you don't.


⚙️ HOW IT WORKS


Solver is a self-driving software development tool that operates directly in your Git repositories.


You assign it a task, walk away, and come back to find a complete solution ready for your review - either as a pull request or a branch you can iterate on.


The experience is like "vibe coding" - you describe what you want in natural language, and Solver handles the implementation details.


Unlike tools that just complete your sentences or make suggestions, Solver autonomously handles entire development workflows.


It understands requirements, writes tests, implements features, fixes bugs, and prepares code for your approval.


📈 WHICH PROBLEMS WE'RE REALLY GOOD AT


Solver excels at tackling complex development tasks, implementing conventional software patterns, bootstrapping new projects, and enabling rapid prototyping.


It's great at fixing bugs when you can point to error logs or describe the issue clearly.


Need to create a quick prototype? Add authentication to your app? Implement a new API endpoint? These are perfect Solver tasks.


We're especially strong with Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, and actively support Go and Rust ecosystems, though we work with many languages.


🤝 WHY WE'RE HERE


We built Solver for developers, but product managers and other team members started using it too.


We're engaging with the Product Hunt community because many of you work across technical and non-technical roles.


Your feedback will directly shape our roadmap as we consider which features to prioritize for different types of users.


🚀 GETTING STARTED


Sign up through our homepage at https://solverai.com or go straight to the app at https://app.solverai.com.


We'll be around all day to answer questions and would love to hear your thoughts!


Special thanks to @chrismessina for hunting us!


- Mark, Dan, and the Solver team

The founders' excitement and emphasis on Solver's ability to handle entire development workflows, from writing tests to preparing code for approval, indicate a strong sense of confidence in the product's potential to revolutionize the way developers work. Furthermore, the fact that Solver has been successfully used not only by developers but also by product managers and other team members implies that the product has a broad appeal and can be a valuable tool for a wide range of users, which is likely to be a key factor in shaping its roadmap and feature prioritization. Overall, the tone of the founders' comment conveys a sense of passion and commitment to solving a real problem in the software development industry, and their engagement with the community suggests a willingness to listen to feedback and iterate on the product to meet the needs of its users.

text:
Hi Product Hunt community 👋


Today, we're introducing the next evolution of Needle. A thoughtful solution to a problem we've all experienced: the disconnect between our knowledge and our tools.


While searching across apps is valuable, we realized something important was missing... the ability to act on what you find. With Needle Knowledge Threader, we've built a bridge between discovery and action.


In a workspace fragmented across Google Drive, Slack, Notion, and Jira, Needle now provides a unified command center. Our new write capabilities allow you to not just find information, but to update, transform, and direct it precisely where it needs to go; All from a single conversation.


What makes Needle Knowledge Threader different:


🔄 Two-way connection: Needle doesn't just read from your apps. It can write back to them, creating a complete information loop.


🧠 Chat-powered automation: Build and execute mini-automations directly in your chat interface. No complex setup required. Just describe what you need, and Needle handles the rest.


💡 Agentic workflows: Initiate sophisticated multi-step processes across your tools with simple conversational commands. Needle works autonomously to complete tasks that would normally require multiple manual steps.


We built this because we needed it ourselves. A quiet but powerful tool that reduces the friction between knowledge and action. No more context switching, just seamless work that adapts to how you communicate naturally.

We're grateful for the opportunity to share Needle with the Product Hunt community and look forward to your thoughts on how we can make it even better.


With appreciation,

The Needle Team - @oeken , @bugraaydingoz , @jaredpolivka & @jan_heimes


Also, shoutout to @rohanrecommends for being a great hunter!

text:
Hi everyone 👋 Philip here from tiptap.dev! I'm excited to introduce our AI Suggestion extension.

We built this feature because we realized that developers need more than just grammar checking in their editor, they need complete flexibility to build a powerful AI-driven suggestion engine.


Key Features:


📐 Fully Customizable Rules:
Define rules globally, per-document, per-user, or allow your end-users to create their own.


🎨 Fully Customizable UI:
Tailor exactly how suggestions appear in your editor’s interface to match your app’s design and UX.


🔀 Multiple Replacement Options:
Present multiple AI-generated suggestions, letting users choose the best fit for their content.


🔒 Prevent Certain Content:
Lock specific content to exclude it from AI-generated suggestions.


🤖 Custom AI Models:
Effortlessly integrate your own AI models alongside traditional methods (e.g., dictionary-based rules).


🚀 Optimized Performance:
Preload suggestions for minimal latency and improved UX.


🛡️ Security & Privacy:
Secure API-generated suggestions. Your rules and content are never stored in Tiptap Cloud.


🔄 Real-time Suggestion Updates:
Suggestions update automatically as users write, delivering smooth, responsive interactions.


⚡ Easy, Instant Setup:
Get started in minutes using our ready-to-go example code.

We genuinely want your thoughts:

  • What additional use cases can you imagine?

  • What else would make it even more valuable to your workflow?

We would love to hear your feedback and join our welcoming community on Discord: https://tiptap.dev/discord

Cheers ✌️
Philip

text:
Hey Product Hunt 👋,

This is Devashish, Co-founder and CEO of Kommunicate. 

We’re excited to introduce Kommunicate's AI-Powered Email Ticketing 🚀—a game-changer for customer support teams looking to automate email responses, handle repetitive queries, and boost productivity!


At Kommunicate, we’ve always strived to make life easier for customer support teams. This product is built with YOU in mind. With AI-Powered Email Ticketing, we’ve taken automation to the next level. Here’s how it works:

  • Automate FAQs: Set up an AI-powered bot that can answer your customers' frequently asked questions right from the email. You can train the bot on your website, documents (PDF, Word, Spreadsheets), and even help articles from Zendesk and Salesforce.


  • Guardrails for Accuracy: No more worrying about AI giving wrong or made-up answers! If the AI isn’t sure, it will escalate the issue to a human agent, ensuring your customers get accurate, trustworthy responses.

  • AI Summary & Insights: Support agents will get an AI-generated summary of the entire email thread—saving tons of time. Plus, managers can get real-time insights into their team’s performance, with AI suggesting areas of improvement.


  • Multi-Language Support: Your support agents can now reply in any language—the AI will translate the response for you! Supporting global customers just got a lot easier 🌍

  • AI Helps Fetch Answers: The AI can fetch answers directly from your knowledge base, documents, and even your CRM, ensuring agents have all the info they need at their fingertips.

Why we built this:

A lot of our customers asked for an easy way to manage all customer queries from one place, and now you can manage support from email, chat, and omnichannel platforms like WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger, and more—all within Kommunicate. This makes us the one-stop platform for customer support teams everywhere.

Our goal with this product is to empower customer support agents and teams—not just as problem solvers, but as revenue-generating heroes within their organizations. We all know that great service keeps customers loyal and happy—and that’s what we aim to enable with this launch.

We hope this will help elevate customer support to the next level, making your team more efficient, faster, and more impactful. Can’t wait to hear what you think! 👏


Feel free to ask any questions in the comments below!


Cheers,

Devashish Mamgain

Co-founder & CEO, Kommunicate

text:
Hi Product Hunt Community 👋🏻

OAK was built with a simple vision: to make AI integration effortless for developers and businesses. After a decade of building digital companies and agencies, we saw the struggles first-hand—fragmented tools, slow workflows, and rigid systems that made deploying AI feel like a daunting task. So, we set out to change that.

With OAK, you get a platform designed to eliminate complexity. Our modular design, intuitive APIs, and seamless UI components empower your team to move from idea to production faster than ever. Whether you’re crafting a smart assistant or building an AI-powered customer experience, OAK gives you the flexibility and scalability to bring your vision to life—without the hassle.

But we’re just getting started—and we want YOU to be part of it! Your feedback is invaluable as we continue to build and improve OAK. Join our community on Discord, share your thoughts, and help shape the future of AI integration.

🌐 GitHub: https://github.com/byarcnine/open-agent-kit-core
📦 NPM: https://www.npmjs.com/package/@o...
📚 Developer Documentation: https://docs.open-agent-kit.com
💬 Discord: https://discord.gg/NqGpphH8Ge
🐦 X: https://x.com/arc_nine_ai

Together, let’s make AI integration effortless. Your ideas and feedback matter—jump in and shape the future with us!

text:
👋 Hey Product Hunt! I’m Bap, Co-founder at Prompteus.


I’m thrilled to introduce Prompteus — a complete solution to build, deploy, and scale AI workflows.


Over the past few years, I’ve built products with my team for governments and Fortune 500s in highly regulated industries. When LLMs exploded, we started integrating them into everything — and the same pain points kept popping up:

  • How do I log requests and track costs?

  • How do I switch models without rewriting my app?

  • How can I make sure the response never says a specific word?

That’s why we built Prompteus.


Instead of hardcoding AI calls all over your stack, Prompteus gives you a visual workflow editor to design, manage, and deploy AI logic — no infra, no spaghetti prompts, no DevOps overhead.


We call these workflows Neurons. You drag and drop building blocks (like model calls, conditionals, and transformations) and deploy them as secure API endpoints. They work from your frontend, backend, anywhere. You can even chain Neurons together.


✨ Highlights:

  • Multi-provider orchestration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Mistral, Cohere, Google…). Change models without changing a line of code.

  • Adaptive semantic caching to skip redundant LLM calls. Save on execution time and request cost!

  • Built-in auth, rate limiting, access controls — call your Neurons from your frontend if you'd like.

  • Detailed per-request logs, and cost analysis down to the microdollar (yup, we had to come up with that one!)

  • Powerful guardrails: catch input/output patterns before they hit the model. A great use case is to remove sensitive information before AI calls.


We’ve designed Prompteus so non-devs can contribute. No YAML. No redeploying a whole project for every config tweak.


There’s a generous forever free tier to get started, and we’re already testing some cool new features like tool calling, MCP server support, and more with early users.


Check out the docs, watch our videos, try it out, and tell us what you think. We’d love your feedback — AMA below!


— bap & the Prompteus team

text:
👋 Hey Product Hunt!

We’re thrilled to launch Dropgala — a Chrome extension designed to simplify and supercharge the way you work with screenshots.

If you’ve ever taken a screenshot and then lost it in a chaotic folder—or wasted time digging through random filenames—you’re not alone. We built Dropgala to fix exactly that.

🔍 What is Dropgala?
Dropgala is your all-in-one screenshot manager:

📸 Capture full page, visible screen, or selected area in one click.
✏️ Annotate instantly with arrows, text, blur, and highlights.
🧠 AI-powered OCR & search — extract text from screenshots and search using natural language (even if you forgot the exact words).
📂 Organize with folders, tags, and notes that are actually useful.
🔗 Share screenshots or entire folders with short links, perfect for teams.
🔒 Secure your screenshots with optional password protection.
💡 Why we built it:
We were constantly juggling screenshots across tools, cloud drives, Slack, and endless tabs. Dropgala brings everything into one space, searchable and shareable — without any friction.

👥 Who it’s for:
Developers & QA testers
Designers & marketers
Content creators & educators
Freelancers & remote teams
Anyone who takes screenshots regularly
We’ve poured our heart into making Dropgala simple, fast, and genuinely useful. We’re just getting started, and your feedback means the world to us.

💬 We’d love to hear what you think, what we can improve, and what features you'd love to see next.

Thanks so much for your support — and happy snapping! 🚀

— The Dropgala Team

📌 "I've spent thousands on AI tools and countless hours copy-pasting between apps, yet my AI content STILL sounds generic and robotic."


Hi Product Hunters! 👋 I'm Sehind Hemzani, founder of NodeflowAI, and that frustration is exactly why we built this tool.


The problem? Current AI tools operate in isolation. They don't understand YOUR sources, YOUR voice, or YOUR knowledge ecosystem.


NodeflowAI solves this with a revolutionary visual approach to AI:


1️⃣ CONNECT - Drop YouTube videos, TikTok clips, PDFs and websites into your visual workspace
2️⃣ MAP - Create interactive node connections that preserve context between sources
3️⃣ CREATE - Generate content that actually sounds like YOU, not generic AI


What makes us different:


🧠 VISUAL THINKING - See your knowledge connections in a beautiful, intuitive mind map
⚡ VOICE MATCHING - AI that analyzes and replicates your unique communication style
🔄 MULTI-MODEL - Seamlessly switch between ChatGPT, Claude, and more without losing context
🚀 CONTENT TRANSFORMATION - Turn a YouTube video into a Twitter thread, blog post, or sales page in one click


Real users report:



"Cut my content creation time by 70%"

"Finally, AI content that sounds like ME, not a robot"


I'll be here all day with the team answering questions! What's your biggest content creation challenge right now?

text:
Hey, fellow Makers and Hunters!

This is my first PH launch ever 🎉.

It all started in October last year.


I used LLMs daily for text translations and proofreading. As it usually goes, I found copying text back and forth between my email app and ChatGPT annoying.

What should have been just a small experimental project to explore productivity hacks kept going because people found it interesting when I talked about it. It was a sign that I needed to finish it, and here we are.


How Kaiboard works?

  1. Download the desktop app

  2. Define a shortcut and a prompt that you find useful

  3. Copy text and press the shortcut

  4. The copied text and prompt are sent to the LLM

  5. Wait a bit and paste the result


If you are a productivity freak and you use LLM chatting every day, then give it a shot.
I would like to hear which of your repetitive tasks can be simplified using Kaiboard.


Sandro

text:
We ran our own ecom ans SaaS brand.

Scaling was brutal.

The more orders we got, the more support tickets flooded in.

More agents meant more overhead, more training, more churn - and still, nobody was online 24/7.

We tried chatbots. They sucked.

Even the “AI-powered” ones felt like glorified FAQ widgets.

So we built Lynk - not a chatbot, but a true AI support agent.

🧠 Powered by state-of-the-art language models, fine-tuned on massive real-world datasets.

💬 Handles complex requests, across channels: WhatsApp, email, live chat.

📈 Knows your products, sends stats, and remembers customer context like a pro.

You get 200 fully-automated resolutions/month, saving you hours — and thousands in support costs.


Let Lynk work while you sleep! ;))

text:
Zysu is launching our first feature with a much bigger goal of turning content creators into a platform!

How?
We read everything like chat, social media events, and soon we will even make our voice capture available to everyone. We use an AI to summarize and track activity over time. Zysu allows users to request in plain English what it should say or do. The bot will use its memory and recent activity to interact! Followers can even compete for its attention! We had to build a super efficient system to make our free tier possible, this was a much harder problem than it looks.

Who?
We are working to support every social media platform. We listen to our users, and currently have a lot of video game streamers. We support useful features they requested for YouTube, Discord, and Twitch. Anyone can still sign up and try things out!

What's Next?
1) Browser plugin for voice capture during streams
2) AI bot that can be summoned to chats on Twitch and Discord. YouTube if users demand it.
3) AI content creator finder chat
4) AI content creator chat and notification based helper designed to offer real time advice and funding opportunities that don't bother your followers

Can Anyone Ask for Features?
Totally! We only want to build what people want. Just note that we have to give some priority to our paying customers.

text:
Hello, Product Hunt community 👋
I'm thrilled to introduce AITextChecker.pro - the essential tool for verifying text authenticity in today's AI-dominated content landscape! 🚀
Our free platform helps you maintain content originality and credibility in a world where AI-generated text is becoming increasingly prevalent. Whether you're a content creator, educator, or business professional, our tools ensure your work remains authentic and stands out from AI-generated content.
What We Offer
👋 Advanced AI Detection Technology: Our powerful detection engine can analyze up to 25,000 characters at once, surpassing many competitors in the market. The tool provides detailed analysis with confidence scores to help you understand exactly how much of your content might be AI-generated.
👋 User-Friendly Interface: We've designed AITextChecker.pro with simplicity in mind. Just paste your text, click analyze, and get instant results. No complicated settings or technical knowledge required - making it accessible for everyone from students to professional content creators.
Why Choose AITextChecker.pro?
Our platform uses cutting-edge algorithms specifically designed to identify patterns common in AI-generated content. This level of precision is crucial for maintaining content integrity, improving SEO performance, and ensuring academic honesty.
AITextChecker.pro doesn't just identify potential AI content - it helps you understand why certain text might be flagged, giving you the insights needed to improve your writing and maintain authenticity in your work.
Who Should Use AITextChecker.pro?
👋 Content Creators and Marketers: Ensure your blog posts, articles, and marketing materials are original and engaging. Stand out from competitors using AI-generated content by proving your authentic human voice.
👋 Educators and Academic Institutions: Combat AI-assisted plagiarism and maintain academic integrity by verifying student submissions. Our tool helps uphold educational standards in an era where AI writing tools are increasingly accessible.
👋 Publishers and Editors: Maintain publication quality by screening submissions for AI-generated content. Preserve your reputation for authentic, high-quality writing.
👋 Businesses and Professionals: Verify the authenticity of important communications, reports, and documents. Ensure your company's voice remains genuine and human in all professional contexts.
👋 SEO Specialists: As search engines increasingly penalize AI-generated content, our tool helps ensure your content strategy remains effective and compliant with evolving search algorithms.
Best of all, AITextChecker.pro is completely free to use! We believe in making content verification accessible to everyone who needs it.
We're excited to be part of your content creation journey and look forward to your feedback!

text:
Hi everyone!

Qwen2.5-VL-32B is the latest open-source vision-language model from the Alibaba Qwen team! This is a big deal because it's a 32B parameter model that's aiming for top-tier performance in both text and vision, and it's been optimized with reinforcement learning.

Key aspects:

🖼️ Vision + Language: It's not just a language model; it can understand and reason about images and videos.
🧠 32B Parameters: A good balance of power and efficiency – large enough to be capable, but not so huge that it's impossible to run.
🚀 Reinforcement Learning: They've used RL to improve its subjective performance (how well it aligns with human preferences) and its math/reasoning abilities.
🗣️ Instruction-Tuned: Specifically designed for following instructions and engaging in conversations.
🔓 Open Source with Apache 2.0. Freely available for research and commercial use.

It achieves top-tier performance for its size, and the focus on both vision and reasoning is really interesting.

You can already try it out in Qwen Chat.

meta.parent_description: Qwen2.5-VL-32B is the open-source 32B vision-language model. Combines strong language understanding with image/video analysis. Optimized with RL.

standardized: The user's enthusiasm for Qwen2.5-VL-32B is palpable, as they highlight the model's impressive capabilities, including its ability to understand and reason about images and videos, making it a standout in the field of artificial intelligence. The fact that it has 32 billion parameters strikes a balance between power and efficiency, allowing it to be capable without being impractically large, which is a significant advantage. The use of reinforcement learning to improve the model's performance, particularly in aligning with human preferences and enhancing its math and reasoning abilities, is also seen as a major strength. Furthermore, the model's instruction-tuned design and open-source nature, licensed under Apache 2.0, make it an attractive option for both research and commercial applications. Overall, the user is impressed by Qwen2.5-VL-32B's top-tier performance and its unique focus on both vision and reasoning, and they are excited that it is already available for testing in Qwen Chat, demonstrating a high level of satisfaction and anticipation for the model's potential impact.

text:
Brain Overload? Let AI Be Your "Second Brain"

Every day, 60,000+ thoughts flash through your mind, most vanishing instantly... 
Every day, you're bombarded with 1 billion bits of visual information. Information anxiety is real. We all have the same 24 hours—why do some people create so much more value?

In this era of time fragmentation, you need a 24/7 thought manager!

【UNLOCKING GOD-TIER FEATURES】
◆ Instant Content Distillation 
Long articles, links, images, Word, PDF—throw it all at us! Content instantly transforms into pure gold. Say goodbye to "save and forget" syndrome.

◆ Smart Classification System 
Based on the PARA method (Projects, Areas, Resources, Archives), our AI automatically finds a home for your notes. Escape folder hell with our forever-simple, single-tier organization.

◆ Auto-Tagging That Just Works 
The AI reads your content and intent, generating spot-on tags. Searching becomes ridiculously easy—if you can think it, you can find it!

◆ Micro-Writing, Macro-Output 
Casually drop life fragments into the app, and AI generates complete journal entries. Today's "Memory Canvas" is ready—reliving your experiences has never hit different like this!

◆ Foreign Text? No Problem 
Foreign content making your brain melt? Copy → Paste → Send. Foreign text instantly becomes a summary in your language. Barrier-free access to global information—just that simple!

Our philosophy: When AI enters everyday life, everyone can create something extraordinary.

Hey Product Hunt community! I’m David, a solo developer who’s been building Navigable AI for the past 8 months. Navigable AI is a no-code LLM fine-tuning platform that helps you easily build & integrate an intelligent AI assistant into your product. Here’s what the assistant does:

  • 🧭 AI-Suggested Navigation: Guides users to the most relevant pages in your app using suggestions.

  • 🤖 Automate Actions: Lets the AI perform actions on behalf of your users using LLM tool calling, while re-using existing business logic.

  • 😄 Context-Aware Responses: Let's you create fine-tuned models to understand your product and deliver precise answers, using your product documentation.

With our platform and SDKs, building and integrating a fine-tuned assistant that does all of these things is super easy, all while keeping costs low (more than 80% savings)!

Who’s it for?

  • Products looking to build an AI Assistant to help users find the right features.

  • Websites needing a simple Q&A bot that answers questions with precision.

  • Freelancers and service providers who want to create and integrate AI chatbots with minimal effort and cost.

What's our story?
LLMs became popular, but most products can only do so much with LLMs, summaries & simple content generation mainly. We were looking for other use cases when we realized that LLMs are smart enough to guide users, but only if it knows your product inside-out. For this, we decided to go with the LLM fine-tuning approach. With insights from my partners, we built Navigable AI to simplify the LLM fine-tuning process using a no-code approach, taking care of the heavyweight tasks and avoiding common pitfalls. A side-effect benefit of this process was huge reduction in cost. Because we are able to use a smaller LLM for fine-tuning to get good results, we are saving big on the inference costs.

What do we need?
We’re eager for feedback on both our product idea and execution. If you have any suggestions or questions, please drop them here. And if you like what you see, feel free to share it with others! Also, If you need a customized LLM fine-tuning solution, we can make it happen. Just get in touch and we'll help you out.

Thanks for checking out Navigable AI. We can’t wait to hear your thoughts! 🚀

text:
Hi everyone!

Sharing Reka Flash 3, a new open-source language model from Reka that gives you something unusual: control over how long the model "thinks" before answering!

Most LLMs have a fixed reasoning process. With Reka Flash 3, you can use <reasoning> </reasoning> tags in your prompt to tell the model to spend more time on complex problems.

It's like giving it a "thinking budget." And even with this extra thinking time, it's still fast – performance comparable to GPT-4o mini, but with a much smaller (21B parameter) and open-source (Apache 2.0) model.

Explore it yourself in Reka Space.

meta.parent_description: Reka Flash 3 is the open-source 21B LLM. You can control the reasoning depth of it! Use tags to adjust "thinking time" for complex tasks.

standardized: The user's enthusiasm for Reka Flash 3 is palpable, as they highlight the unique feature of being able to control the model's "thinking time" before responding, which sets it apart from other language models with fixed reasoning processes. By allowing users to allocate a "thinking budget" using specific tags, Reka Flash 3 provides a level of customization and flexibility that is not typically found in other large language models, and this is seen as a major advantage. Additionally, the fact that Reka Flash 3 achieves performance comparable to more established models like GPT-4o mini, despite having a smaller parameter size and being open-source, is a significant point of excitement and praise. Overall, the user's tone suggests that Reka Flash 3 is a game-changer in the field of artificial intelligence, offering a powerful and adaptable tool that can be explored and utilized in the Reka Space platform.

Hey everyone — I’m Tim, founder of Archaide.

A few years ago, I was juggling a full-time tech job, running a business, and managing my family’s $200K retirement account. I had a trading strategy I believed in, but no time to execute it consistently. I started missing trades, making emotional decisions, and realized something had to change.

So I quit everything and taught myself how to code.

The first thing I built was a trading bot — just to solve my own problem.

Then word spread. Over the next 3 years, my team built bots for hedge funds, influencers, and high-income traders who were all facing the same issue: time, inconsistency, and burnout.

Now we’ve packaged that into Archaide — an AI agent that lets anyone automate their trading strategy with natural language prompts. No code. Fully customizable. Hosted, monitored, and backed by real quant devs.

This is for the builders, hustlers, and traders who want leverage. Appreciate your support 🙏

text:
Hi, I'm Huss.

English is not my first language, and it takes me a long time to respond to messages on Slack—not because I'm slow (ok, that's part of it) but because of the language barrier. Instead of just focusing on conveying my message, I often spend more time making sure it sounds like it came from an educated adult rather than a 3rd grade kiddo.

No matter how creative or brilliant an idea is, people can misunderstand or even ignore it if the message doesn't come across well. It's pretty understandable, right? If your writing sounds like a third grader's, people subconsciously judge your intelligence.

I know there are plenty of products out there that can help with this, but I'm a Slacker -- I mean, a big fan of Slack (not an actual slacker, literally). I love Slack and want a tool that integrates seamlessly with it. I want to improve the experience, type faster, and customize my message tone depending on who I'm chatting with. Sure, you can get a lot of these features for free from ChatGPT or other tools, but constantly switching windows, copying and pasting, and manually prompting every time is a pain. I want to do it quickly with no extra steps. That's why I built this tool—for myself and for others.

I was a Principal Engineer at a Fortune 500 company that takes customer data security seriously by encrypting everything. Working with encrypted data is a PITA, but after dealing with it for so long, it has become second nature to me. Now, I'm addicted to this pain (yeah, it's contagious). All of our products encrypt customer data before storing it in the database, and we rotate keys regularly.

You've probably heard companies brag about encrypting data at rest and in transit. That comes out of the box with cloud-managed services—but it doesn't mean their employees can't access your data. I'm not saying they'll do anything shady (but who really knows? ahem... me ta). With our approach, data is encrypted using AES-256 before it even reaches the database, making it virtually impossible for anyone to extract meaningful information.

One more thing -- this particular product doesn't store your messages permanently. They're encrypted in the cache layer for only a short time before the TTL kicks them out. If you disable the preview feature, we won't even cache them. Your messages will just pass through… like your ex.

meta.parent_description: This app instantly corrects your grammar and refines your language before you post. Chat effortlessly like a native speaker - or even better.

standardized: The founder of Elegant Chat, Huss, has expressed a deep personal understanding of the challenges that non-native English speakers face when communicating on platforms like Slack, where the pressure to convey ideas clearly and professionally can be overwhelming. He has developed Elegant Chat to address this issue, leveraging artificial intelligence to instantly correct grammar and refine language, allowing users to chat effortlessly and confidently, regardless of their language proficiency. What's more, Huss has prioritized data security, drawing from his experience as a Principal Engineer at a Fortune 500 company, by implementing robust encryption measures, including AES-256 encryption, to protect user data, and ensuring that messages are not stored permanently, but rather cached temporarily before being deleted. This suggests that Elegant Chat is not only designed to enhance the user experience, but also to provide a secure and trustworthy environment for communication, which is a key differentiator in the messaging space. Overall, Huss's passion for creating a seamless and secure communication tool is evident, and his personal experience has driven the development of Elegant Chat, which aims to empower users to communicate effectively and without barriers.

text:
👋 Hi Product Hunt!

I'm Aishwarya, co-founder of Inferless with @nilesh_agarwal22 . We're thrilled to officially launch Inferless today!

Background Story: Two years ago, while running an AI-powered app startup, we hit a big wall: deploying AI models was expensive, complicated, and involved lots of idle GPU costs. The process simply didn’t make sense, so we decided to fix it ourselves.

Inferless is a Serverless GPU inference platform that helps developers deploy AI models effortlessly:

✅ Instant Deployments: Deploy any ML model within minutes—no hassle of managing infrastructure.
✅ Ultra-Low Cold Starts: Optimized for instant model loading
✅ Auto-Scaling & Cost-Efficient: Scale instantly from one to millions and only pay for what you actually use.
✅ Flexible Deployment: Use our UI, CLI, or run models remotely—however you prefer.

Since our private beta, we've processed millions of API requests and helped customers like Cleanlab, Spoofsense, Omi, Ushur etc move their production workloads to us.

And now, Inferless is open for everyone—no waitlists, just sign up and deploy instantly!

Feel free to ask me anything in the comments or provide any feedback. Your feedback and support mean the world. 🙌

Helpful links:

  • Docs: docs.inferless.com

  • Website: inferless.com

Looking forward to see what you ship with Inferless! Also, thank you @fmerian for hunting us! 💚

text:
We hope everyone gives Zapier MCP a try! It's very simple: you generate your URL, configure your actions, and configure your client of choice (eg. Cursor, Windsurf, etc).


This was also a really fun product to build and has a little bit of history: originally, this codebase powered OpenAI plugins, which were based on OpenAPI specs defining APIs. While that didn't quite take off, we rebranded it and reused the stack for AI actions, which was an API-first approach to that same technology. While we saw some usage and excitement, models just weren't great at using tools at the time, and the pattern wasn't really normalized yet. That seems to be changing with MCP, and that's why we're really excited to launch this.

Third time's the charm!

Hey Product Hunt community,
I'm Aishwarya, a marketing manager at @Podcastle. Today is a very exciting day for us!

I'm happy to launch Podcastle's AI Voices hub, powered by our proprietary AI model, Asyncflow v1.0. With this new model, we can offer our customers more than 1,000 AI voices that can narrate their text. We’ve designed Asyncflow v1.0 to keep training and inference costs low while building a high-quality voice model, giving us a unique advantage over competitors.

1000+ Voices to choose from
You can now convert text to speech in seconds and have the option to choose from our expansive library. We have tried to cover different use cases and accents and styles so every user can find the unique voice they are looking for.

Clone your voice
We have also relaunched our Voice Cloning feature, which allows you to create a high-quality clone in seconds by uploading a recording or recording your voice for 10 seconds.

Go direct with our AI voice API
Our optimised speech model delivers premium voice quality and natural expressiveness without the premium price tag.

We look forward to your feedback and questions in the comments about Podcastle AI.

text:
Hi Product Hunt community 👋🏻 

I’m Tiffany from Mintlify, and we’re excited to introduce mcpt—a curated registry for MCP servers.

What is an MCP server?

MCP (Model Context Protocol) is an emerging standard that enables AI tools to interact with external data sources, like an API for LLMs. MCP servers act as intermediaries, providing structured data to AI applications.

Why build a registry?

Right now, it’s hard to find reliable servers and explore what’s possible because the MCP ecosystem is so fragmented. mcpt offers a curated registry with official and up-to-date servers, making it easier to experiment with new technology.

Try it out and let us know what you think, or if you have suggestions on servers to add!

Overall, the feedback implies that mcpt has the potential to fill a significant gap in the market, and its curated registry could become a go-to resource for developers working with AI applications and external data sources.

text:
Hey ProductHunt! I’m Quentin, one of the founders of the open-source search engine Meilisearch. Our goal is to make it easy for developers to ship good search UX, so I’m excited to launch Meilisearch AI today with the builders community here.


Meilisearch started when I was working in ecommerce and felt like the search options were either heavyweight like Elasticsearch or paid solutions with opaque pricing. We thought there was room for something transparent and dev-friendly that just works for most search use cases out of the box. Meilisearch AI is another step in this direction.


Our key features are:

🔎 Full-text search with simple, expressive ranking rules

🧠 AI-powered hybrid, semantic, and multi-modal search

⚡️ Sub 50ms latency, optimized for end user search


We’re excited to stabilize AI-powered search to allow developers to integrate fast and relevant search, retrieval-augmented generation, and recommendations in their apps. Building upon a year of open-source beta, our managed offer comes with the scalability, security, and monitoring you need to stay focused on building, not managing infrastructure.


For the occasion, we’re offering 2 months of free Meilisearch Cloud subscription. Use the ✨ "MeiliAI" ✨ coupon to get started.


We can’t wait to hear your thoughts!


For more details on our launch, check out: https://meilisearch.com/launch-week


Happy building 🚀

text:
Hi everyone!

Check out SmolDocling, a new open-source vision-language model from Hugging Face and IBM Research! True to its name, it's incredibly small – only 256M parameters! – yet it's designed for full, end-to-end document conversion.

You feed it an image of a document page (a scanned PDF, a photo, etc.), and it outputs a structured representation (called "DocTags") that includes everything:

📝 Text (OCR): It extracts the text, of course.
📑 Layout: It understands the page layout (paragraphs, headings, lists, etc.).
📊 Tables: It extracts table structure and content.
💻 Code: It recognizes and formats code blocks (with indentation!).
➕ Equations: It handles mathematical formulas.
🖼️ Figures: It identifies figures and links captions.

The key is that it does all of this in a single model, end-to-end, unlike traditional approaches that use separate OCR, layout analysis, and table extraction tools. And it does it with a model that's tiny compared to most VLMs.

It's built on SmolVLM (also open-source) and achieves competitive results with models many times its size.

You can try SmolDocling yourself here.

meta.parent_description: SmolDocling, from Hugging Face and IBM Research, is the ultra-compact (256M) open VLM for end-to-end document conversion. Extracts text, layout, tables, code, and more from images.

standardized: The user's enthusiasm for SmolDocling is palpable, as they highlight the model's incredibly small size of 256M parameters, which is a significant advantage in the field of vision-language models. Despite its compact nature, SmolDocling is capable of performing full, end-to-end document conversion, extracting a wide range of information from images, including text, layout, tables, code, equations, and figures, all in a single model. This integrated approach sets it apart from traditional methods that rely on separate tools for each function, and the user notes that it achieves competitive results with much larger models, thanks to its foundation on the open-source SmolVLM. The user's tone suggests that they are impressed by SmolDocling's efficiency and effectiveness, and they encourage others to try it out, indicating a high level of satisfaction with the product's performance and potential applications. Overall, the user's comment conveys a sense of excitement and admiration for SmolDocling's innovative approach to document conversion, and its potential to make a significant impact in the field of artificial intelligence and development.

text:
Your IP, your rules.

Hi Product Hunt! 👋 Gardo here, Sr. PM for the IP Portal.


I'm thrilled to introduce you to the IP Portal (Beta), our innovative platform that empowers creators by providing a seamless way to protect, license, and monetize their intellectual property (IP) across the internet.​

What is the IP Portal? 👀

The IP Portal is a user-friendly platform that allows IP creators to:​

  • Protect their IP by registering it securely 

  • License their IP with customizable terms, enabling others to use their creations legally, without the legal hassle and costs

  • Monetize their IP through automated licensing agreements, ensuring they receive fair compensation

Why did we build this? 🎯

Creators today have more ways than ever to publish work—but way fewer tools to actually protect it, license it, or get paid for it. And with AI remixing everything in sight, the gaps in today’s IP system are only getting wider.


The IP Portal makes it simple to register your work, define how others can use it, and earn directly—no middlemen, no legal guesswork. It’s built to give creators defensibility and control in an age where both are getting harder to hold onto.

Current Status: Beta Launch 🚀

We're excited to announce that the IP Portal is currently in open beta. This means you can start using it today to register and monetize your IP, as well as dispute infringing IP. However, please note:​

  • We know it’s not perfect—and that’s by design. We launched the beta early so we can build in the open, get feedback fast, and improve with the community. Features like better search, bulk uploads, and smoother UX are already in motion—keep it coming.

  • Upcoming Features: Our roadmap includes simplifying the registration process, eliminating the need for crypto-specific logins, introducing gas-free transactions, and enhancing user onboarding to make the platform more accessible.​

Note: You’ll need IP tokens to use the IP Portal. Simply click to register IP on the homepage and select ‘Get some IP first’ for step-by-step guidance on acquiring IP tokens. (Registration takes <0.1 IP tokens)

Join Us on This Journey

We invite you to:

1️⃣ Register on the IP Portal,

2️⃣ Provide feedback, and

3️⃣ Follow us on X to join our community of people taking control of their creativity


Your insights will help shape the future of the platform.​ We look forward to seeing you again in 6 months when we're out of Beta!


Thanks for your support, and we look forward to your thoughts and suggestions!

text: Hi everyone, I'm Robert Keus, a social entrepreneur from the Netherlands, and I'm thrilled to introduce GreenPT to the Product Hunt community! As the founder of Brthrs (brthrs.nl/en), a social agency, and digitaaltoegankelijk.nl, an accessibility company, I've always been passionate about using technology to drive positive change. With GreenPT, we're on a mission to revolutionize the way we interact with AI, while minimizing our environmental footprint. GreenPT is the only Green GPT Chat that's hosted in Europe, powered by sustainable energy, and built with open-source tech and a lot of love. We've combined sustainable infrastructure with efficient AI models to minimize environmental impact while maximizing performance. You can learn more about our approach on our dedicated sustainability page (https://greenpt.ai/sustainability ). Our product offers a range of powerful features, including advanced reasoning, vision analysis, code generation, and multilingual processing. We've two models, GreenL and GreenR, which work together to make AI smarter and more reliable. GreenL excels in content generation, visual analysis, and multilingual tasks, while GreenR specializes in complex problem-solving and code generation. I'd love to invite you all to join the conversation and ask me any questions you may have about GreenPT. What do you think about our approach to sustainable AI? What features or aspects of the product resonate with you? Let's chat! I'm looking forward to hearing your feedback and learning from your experiences.

text: 👋 Hey Hunters, I’m Jasmin, Co-founder of Gemoo. We’re back with something completely new. Today, we’re introducing Gemoo, an AI-powered video editing tool that makes content creation effortless. 🎬 What’s New in the All-New Gemoo? Gemoo eliminates tedious editing by automating subtitles, B-roll, cuts, and effects, allowing you to create polished, high-quality videos in minutes. Here’s how: - AI-Powered B-Roll Insertion – Stop searching for stock footage. Gemoo analyzes your video and auto-inserts relevant B-roll to make your content more dynamic. - Auto Subtitles & Custom Captions – No more manual transcription. Gemoo generates accurate subtitles instantly in 100+ languages, complete with customizable templates that fit your brand. - Smart Effects & Dynamic Zooms – Need to emphasize key points? Gemoo automatically adds zoom-ins, motion effects, and trendy visuals to keep your audience engaged. - Edit Video by Editing Text – No timeline needed! Gemoo allows you to edit your videos as easily as a Google Doc. Simply modify or delete text in the transcript to trim the corresponding video segments. - Turn Long Videos into Viral Clips – AI detects key moments in your video and helps you cut them into short, engaging clips—perfect for YouTube Shorts, TikTok, and Instagram Reels. - AI Titles, Descriptions & Hashtags – Let AI generate optimized video titles, descriptions, and hashtags to improve discoverability and engagement across YouTube, TikTok, and more. 💡 Why We Completely Transformed Gemoo When we first launched Gemoo, it was built as a video messaging tool for communication and collaboration. But as we listened to our users and studied the evolving video landscape, we realized something: content creators, marketers, and businesses needed better, faster ways to create compelling videos. Traditional editing is time-consuming. Searching for B-roll, manually adding captions, cutting clips for different platforms—it all adds up to hours of work. We wanted to remove the friction from the video creation process and let AI handle the heavy lifting. So, instead of just iterating on the old Gemoo, we boldly decided to rebuild it from scratch—with AI-driven video editing at its core. The result? A completely new, smarter, and more intuitive Gemoo. One that makes video editing as fast and effortless as possible, without sacrificing creativity. 💼 Who Is Gemoo For? ✅ Content Creators & YouTubers – Create high-quality videos faster and focus on growing your audience. ✅ Social Media Marketers – Boost engagement with polished, AI-enhanced videos optimized for every platform. ✅ Educators & Course Creators – Turn lectures into engaging lessons with auto-subtitles and perfect B-roll footage. ✅ Businesses & Agencies – Scale your video production without increasing your editing workload. 🔍 So, What’s Next? We’re thrilled to bring the new Gemoo to you today, and we’d love your feedback! 💡 You can try Gemoo for free today – no credit card required. Just upload a video, let AI handle the tedious tasks, and see how much faster and easier video creation can be. We’d love to hear from you! Drop your thoughts, feedback, or questions in the comments. We’re here all day answering questions and taking notes to keep improving. 👉 Try Gemoo now: https://gemoo.com/ 💲What’s more? We’ve prepared an exclusive 20% off coupon for the Product Hunters: PH20OFF. Enter it at checkout to unlock full access to Gemoo. Thanks, Product Hunt! We can’t wait to see what you create with Gemoo! ❤️ Best, Jasmin Gemoo Team

Hey Product Hunt community!

I built Myparser because I got many requests for an simple way to extract structured data from documents. Myparser is a sister product to Myreader (https://myreader.ai), which has already processed over 100k documents in the past two years.


With Myparser, you can:

✓ Upload Any Document Type:
• Invoices, receipts, bank statements
• Resumes, academic transcripts
• Contracts, legal agreements
• Medical records, insurance forms
• Real estate documents, foreclosure notices
• And many more!

✓ Customize Your Extraction:
Simply select or define the fields you need, and Myparser will extract text, numbers, line items, and tables with precision.

✓ Instant Structured Data:
Get your results in clean, CSV format—ready for analysis or integration into your workflow.

Give it a try, and let me know what you think!

text:
Hey Product Hunt community,


I’m excited to introduce ChatterKB – an AI-powered platform that transforms the way you interact with your knowledge. The idea for ChatterKB was born from two real-world challenges I encountered while working with an agency. First, I was asked if there was a way to transform documents—like video transcripts—into a branded, shareable chatbot. Second, the agency couldn’t understand why there wasn’t an affordable solution that enabled their team to quickly find insights during client calls or while drafting emails based on previously created content. This sparked the creation of ChatterKB—a tool that lets you build an interactive, AI-driven repository of ideas and insights, much like an evolving newsletter or your own personal assistant, available in both public and private modes. For the tech-savvy, think of it as a RAG as a Service with reporting and branding.


Two Powerful Solutions in One Platform


For Teams

• Accelerated Analysis: Upload your documents and chat your way to insights in minutes, not hours.

• Enhanced Collaboration: Pin key findings, share real-time reports, and keep your team aligned.

• Data-Driven Decisions: Uncover hidden connections within your documents to empower smarter strategies.


For Creators

• 24/7 Engagement: Convert your content into an interactive hub where your audience can ask questions anytime.

• Custom Branding: Tailor the look and feel to match your personal or brand style.

• Monetization Options: Choose from free offerings or premium subscription tiers to even generate revenue from your expertise.


Powerful Features & Integrations

• Seamless Integration: Import content directly from Notion, Google Drive, and more.

• Advanced AI Models: Powered by leading models like LLama 3.3 and Claude 3.7 Sonnet, delivering precise and nuanced responses.

• Flexible Pricing: Start free with up to 30 monthly chats and one knowledge base, or upgrade to the Plus plan at $30/month for more capacity and features.


ChatterKB is all about unlocking and sharing the power of your knowledge—whether it’s for boosting team productivity or engaging your audience in a fresh, interactive way.

meta.parent_description: Chat with your documents, extract insights, and share your expertise interactively—all in one seamless platform. Create dashboards for teams or brand your content and share it.

standardized: The founder of ChatterKB is extremely enthusiastic about introducing their AI-powered platform, which aims to revolutionize the way users interact with their knowledge by transforming documents into interactive, shareable chatbots. This innovative solution was born out of the founder's personal experience with two significant challenges while working with an agency, highlighting the need for a tool that can quickly extract insights from documents and enable teams to find information efficiently during client calls or while drafting emails. ChatterKB appears to be a game-changer, offering a unique combination of accelerated analysis, enhanced collaboration, and data-driven decision-making capabilities for teams, as well as 24/7 engagement, custom branding, and monetization options for creators. The platform's seamless integration with popular tools like Notion and Google Drive, advanced AI models, and flexible pricing plans are notable features that set it apart from other productivity and SaaS solutions. Overall, the founder's tone suggests that ChatterKB has the potential to unlock and share the power of knowledge in a fresh and interactive way, making it an exciting development in the realms of productivity and artificial intelligence.

text:
Hey Product Hunt community!

I’m Ezequiel, founder of FlickFlick. Ever wanted to upload 1200 posts a month and 10x your personal brand across 5 sub-accounts on 4 platforms—without hiring massive teams? We automate everything—viral scripts, editing, distribution—so you can handle it all in one Trello board and stay focused on what truly matters.

Why We Built FlickFlick

We spoke with countless creators who wanted to scale but kept hitting the same roadblocks: no time, lack of clarity, high costs, and the headache of juggling multiple freelancers. 
That’s why we created FlickFlick—to remove the operational grind and give you predictable, scalable growth.

What Are the Core Benefits?

Publish 20x More Content
Create up to 1,200 pieces of content monthly without burning out.

5x Your Traffic & Sales
Reach new audiences daily, boost your leads, and increase revenue.

Save Up to 90% on Costs
Skip hiring large teams; our solution does it all in one place.

Become a Recognized Authority
Consistent, omnichannel content enhances your credibility.

Work Less, Earn More
Delegate production and distribution to focus on your vision.

How FlickFlick Works?

Pre-Production
We manage ideation, viral scriptwriting, and professional editing.
Post-Production & Distribution
We recycle, adapt, and schedule 40 pieces daily across 5 sub-accounts and 4 major platforms.
Monetization
Every piece points back to your funnels, growing traffic and sales automatically.

What Exactly Do Our customers Get?
20 Secondary Accounts (5 sub-accounts × 4 platforms)
1,200 Monthly Posts (40 per day)
60 Professionally Edited Videos
60 Viral Scripts geared for engagement
AI-Driven Traffic Flows to your funnels
4 Monthly Metric Reports for data insights
One Simple Trello Dashboard to see it all at a glance

Why FlickFlick?
We saw the same pain points in our community:

“I need predictable audience growth without doing it all myself.”
“I tried hiring VAs and big teams; it took more time to manage them.”
“I hate switching between tools and still missing deadlines.”
“I want to delegate, but fear losing authenticity.”
“I want a consistent brand voice with room for creativity.”

FlickFlick tackles these by automating the heavy lifting, letting you stay creative and in control.

Ready to Start?
Check us out at flickflick.framer.website. Have questions or feedback? Drop a comment below—we’d love to hear your thoughts!

text: Hey Hunters 👋 I used to do cold outreach for my previous SaaS and it absolutely sucked. I was sending 50-100 DMs per day and getting no results. text:
Hey Product Hunt, Tommy from timeOS here! 🚀

First, big applause to @benln for hunting us 💜

Today, we’re thrilled to launch timeOS 2.0, a brand new way to interface and interact with time. 

Our mission: to create an autonomous productivity system. 

Imagine a productivity tool that manages itself, needing no extra effort from you. An tool that is always on, always guides you throughout your day, and always there exactly when you need it most. 

What is timeOS? It's an AI-powered New Tab page and a proactive executive assistant that captures everything from your day and get you ready to your next meeting with useful context and workflow automation right when you need it. 

with timeOS 2.0, you get: 

🧠 Get ready in seconds: Before your meeting begins, timeOS provides enriched context from your Gmail, LinedIn, and past meetings. This means no last-minute scrambling — just an accurate, AI-powered brief with all you need to know.

🎧 Talk to Prep (closed beta): Imagine effortlessly interacting with your meeting reminders—simply click and ask, 'What was discussed in our last meeting?' or 'Please reschedule and send an email.'

📝 Autonomous Note-Taking: Minutes after your meetings, receive personalized, accurate notes. Our AI leverages templates created by a community of productivity experts, ensuring you always have the best insights at your fingertips.

🔄 Deep Integrations: With timeOS, you can automatically sync and organize knowledge and workflows across all your favorite tools like Notion, Asana, and Slack.

🌟 Tab to the future: Evolution: Each interaction with timeOS makes your New Tab page smarter, more personalized, and more intuitive, turning it into a repository of your most useful data over time.

-----

🎉 Exclusive Launch Offer for Product Hunt: Enjoy 50% off timeOS until the end of this month!

At timeOS, our vision is to automate your productivity, and helping you break the laws of time!

We’re eager to hear your feedback about this version.

Thank you for checking us out!

YOLO (You only launch once!)
Cheers,
Tommy 🚀

meta.parent_description: An AI-powered New Tab page to help you prepare for your next meeting. Hover over events to access relevant context from Gmail, past meeting notes, and LinkedIn. Tap to talk with AI directly from the meeting reminder and get ready in seconds. 🔮

standardized: The founder of timeOS, Tommy, is extremely enthusiastic about the launch of timeOS 2.0, a cutting-edge productivity tool that leverages artificial intelligence to create an autonomous system, aiming to revolutionize the way users manage their time. With a clear vision to automate productivity, timeOS 2.0 is designed to be an always-on, proactive executive assistant that captures and provides useful context and workflow automation, making it an indispensable tool for users. The founder's tone suggests a strong sense of excitement and confidence in the product's capabilities, which include features such as enriched context for meetings, effortless interaction with meeting reminders, autonomous note-taking, and deep integrations with popular tools like Notion, Asana, and Slack. Overall, the sentiment expressed is overwhelmingly positive, with the founder eager to receive feedback and encouraging users to experience the benefits of timeOS 2.0, which promises to help users "break the laws of time" and achieve a new level of productivity.

There are some challenges which are kind of left unanswered due to the lack of knowledge - like anxiety, bad habits, sleeplessness, procrastination and more things like that. text:
Hey Product Hunt!

We're thrilled to introduce ChatCam, your real-time, free GPT-4 AI Camera assistant! 🚀

In our complex world, we often struggle to fully grasp our surroundings. Despite having powerful cameras in our pockets, we lack the ability to instantly access deeper insights about what we see. ChatCam bridges this gap, transforming how we interact with and understand the world around us. It's not just about understanding everything but about having the power to dive deep when you want to, making it a go-to tool for curious minds.

With ChatCam, you can get instant help on any topic by simply pointing your camera and asking questions. Our goal is to make AI interactions as seamless and intuitive as possible, providing you with a video-call-like experience without any sign-up or subscription required.

We’d love to hear your feedback and are here to answer any questions you might have. Thank you for checking out ChatCam and for your support!

Happy exploring! 📸
